text.1396: [03] 403^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati? tattha ^a^P0.0210^ea^ katame   ^a^T0.0283^ea^ anuppannaa  kusalaa dhammaa? tii.ni kusalamuulaani -- alobho, adoso, amoho. ta.msampayutto  vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho. ta.msamu.t.thaana.m kaayakamma.m,  vaciikamma.m, manokamma.m -- ime vuccanti ``anuppannaa kusalaa dhammaa''. iti imesa.m  anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m  pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1397: [03] 404^b^.^eb^ chanda.m janetiiti...pe0... vaayamatiiti...pe0... viiriya.m aarabhatiiti...pe0...  citta.m pagga.nhaatiiti...pe0... padahatiiti. tattha katama.m padhaana.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho ^a^V0.0236^ea^  ...pe0... sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m vuccati ``padhaana.m''. iminaa padhaanena upeto hoti...pe0...  samannaagato. tena vuccati ``padahatii''ti.
text.1398: [03] 405^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya  vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati  padahati? tattha katame uppannaa kusalaa dhammaa? tii.ni kusalamuulaani -- alobho,  adoso, amoho. ta.msampayutto vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho,  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho ^a^M0.0219^ea^, ta.msamu.t.thaana.m kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m manokamma.m -- ime  vuccanti ``uppannaa kusalaa dhammaa''. iti imesa.m uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m  .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1399: [03] 406^b^.^eb^ .thitiyaati. yaa .thiti so asammoso, yo asammoso so bhiyyobhaavo   ^a^T0.0284^ea^, yo bhiyyobhaavo ta.m vepulla.m, ya.m vepulla.m saa bhaavanaa, yaa bhaavanaa saa paaripuurii.
text.14: [03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m sukhuma.m? itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro {kaba.li.mkaaro (sii0 syaa0)} aahaaro -- ida.m vuccati  ruupa.m sukhuma.m.
text.140: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi aacayagaamii, atthi apacayagaamii, atthi nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1400: [03] 407^b^.^eb^ chanda.m janetiiti...pe0... vaayamatiiti...pe0... viiriya.m aarabhatiiti...pe0...  citta.m pagga.nhaatiiti...pe0... padahatiiti. tattha katama.m padhaana.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo -- ida.m vuccati ``padhaana.m''. iminaa padhaanena upeto hoti...pe0...  samannaagato. tena vuccati ``padahatii''ti.
text.1403: [03] 408^b^.^eb^ cattaaro ^a^P0.0211^ea^ sammappadhaanaa -- idha bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati,  uppannaana.m paapakaana.m ^a^V0.0237^ea^ akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati  citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti  vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa  asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1404: [03] 409^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye  lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m ^a^T0.0285^ea^ di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya  bhuumiyaa pattiyaa ^a^M0.0220^ea^ vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1405: [03] 410^b^.^eb^ chanda.m janetiiti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikataa kattukamyataa  kusalo dhammacchando -- aya.m vuccati ``chando''. ima.m chanda.m janeti sa~njaneti u.t.thapeti  samu.t.thapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chanda.m janetii''ti.
text.1406: [03] 411^b^.^eb^ vaayamatiiti. tattha katamo vaayaamo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``vaayaamo''.  iminaa vaayaamena upeto hoti samupeto upaagato samupaagato upapanno sampanno samannaagato.  tena vuccati ``vaayamatii''ti.
text.1407: [03] 412^b^.^eb^ viiriya.m aarabhatiiti. tattha katama.m viiriya.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m ^a^P0.0212^ea^ vuccati  ``viiriya.m''. ima.m viiriya.m aarabhati samaarabhati aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti.  tena vuccati ``viiriya.m aarabhatii''ti.
text.1408: [03] 413^b^.^eb^ citta.m ^a^T0.0286^ea^ pagga.nhaatiiti. tattha katama.m citta.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0...  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^V0.0238^ea^ -- ida.m vuccati ``citta.m''. ima.m citta.m pagga.nhaati sampagga.nhaati  upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena vuccati ``citta.m pagga.nhaatii''ti.
text.1409: [03] 414^b^.^eb^ padahatiiti. tattha katama.m sammappadhaana.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m vuccati ``sammappadhaana.m''.  avasesaa dhammaa sammappadhaanasampayuttaa.
text.1410: [03] 415^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti  vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye ^a^M0.0221^ea^ uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti  vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1411: [03] 416^b^.^eb^ chanda.m ^a^P0.0213^ea^ janetiiti...pe0... vaayamatiiti...pe0... viiriya.m aarabhatiiti...pe0...  citta.m pagga.nhaatiiti...pe0... padahatiiti. tattha katama.m sammappadhaana.m? yo cetasiko  viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  ida.m vuccati ``sammappadhaana.m''. avasesaa dhammaa ^a^T0.0287^ea^ sammappadhaanasampayuttaa.
text.1412: [03] 417^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m  aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1413: [03] 418^b^.^eb^ chanda.m janetiiti...pe0... vaayamatiiti...pe0... viiriya.m aarabhatiiti...pe0...  citta.m pagga.nhaatiiti...pe0... padahatiiti. tattha katama.m sammappadhaana.m? yo cetasiko  viiriyaarambho ^a^V0.0239^ea^ ...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  ida.m vuccati ``sammappadhaana.m''. avasesaa dhammaa sammappadhaanasampayuttaa.
text.1414: [03] 419^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya  vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati  padahati? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m  di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye uppannaana.m kusalaana.m  dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya ^a^T0.0288^ea^ vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti  vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.
text.1415: [03] 420^b^.^eb^ .thitiyaati ^a^M0.0222^ea^. yaa .thiti so asammoso, yo asammoso so bhiyyobhaavo,  yo bhiyyobhaavo ta.m vepulla.m, ya.m vepulla.m saa bhaavanaa, yaa bhaavanaa saa paaripuurii.
text.1416: [03] 421^b^.^eb^ chanda.m janetiiti. tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikataa kattukamyataa  kusalo dhammacchando -- aya.m vuccati ``chando''. ima.m chanda.m janeti sa~njaneti u.t.thapeti  samu.t.thapeti nibbatteti abhinibbatteti. tena vuccati ``chanda.m janetii''ti.
text.1417: [03] 422^b^.^eb^ vaayamatiiti. tattha katamo vaayaamo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``vaayaamo''.  iminaa vaayaamena upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``vaayamatii''ti.
text.1418: [03] 423^b^.^eb^ viiriya.m aarabhatiiti. tattha katama.m viiriya.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m vuccati ``viiriya.m''.  ima.m viiriya.m aarabhati samaarabhati aasevati ^a^P0.0214^ea^ bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tena  vuccati ``viiriya.m aarabhatii''ti.
text.1419: [03] 424^b^.^eb^ citta.m pagga.nhaatiiti. tattha katama.m citta.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0...  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^V0.0240^ea^ -- ida.m vuccati ``citta.m''. ima.m citta.m pagga.nhaati sampagga.nhaati  upatthambheti paccupatthambheti. tena ^a^T0.0289^ea^ vuccati ``citta.m pagga.nhaatii''ti.
text.142: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sa.myojaniyo, atthi asa.myojaniyo.
text.1420: [03] 425^b^.^eb^ padahatiiti. tattha katama.m sammappadhaana.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0...  sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m vuccati ``sammappadhaana.m''.  avasesaa dhammaa sammappadhaanasampayuttaa.
text.1421: [03] 426^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m sammappadhaana.m? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko  viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  ida.m vuccati ``sammappadhaana.m''. avasesaa dhammaa sammappadhaanasampayuttaa.
text.1424: [03] 427^b^.^eb^ cattaaro ^a^M0.0223^ea^ sammappadhaanaa -- idha bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati,  uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m  dhammaana.m uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya  vepullaaya ^a^T0.0290^ea^ bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati  padahati.
text.1425: [03] 428^b^.^eb^ catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.1427: [03] 429^b^.^eb^ kusalaayeva ^a^V0.0241^ea^. siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa. vipaakadhammadhammaa ^a^P0.0215^ea^. anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa.  siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.  siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. apacayagaamino. sekkhaa.  appamaa.naa. appamaa.naaramma.naa. pa.niitaa. sammattaniyataa. na maggaaramma.naa. maggahetukaa.  siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa maggaadhipatinoti. siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa,  na vattabbaa uppaadinoti. siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. na vattabbaa  atiitaaramma.naatipi, anaagataaramma.naatipi, paccuppannaaramma.naatipi. siyaa ajjhattaa,  siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. bahiddhaaramma.naa. anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.1429: [03] 430^b^.^eb^ na hetuu. sahetukaa. hetusampayuttaa. na vattabbaa hetuu ceva sahetukaa caati,  sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu. na vattabbaa hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caati, hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetuu. na ^a^M0.0224^ea^ hetuu sahetukaa. sappaccayaa. sa"nkhataa. anidassanaa.  appa.tighaa. aruupaa ^a^T0.0291^ea^. lokuttaraa. kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.  no aasavaa. anaasavaa. aasavavippayuttaa. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva saasavaa caatipi,  saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caatipi,  aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. aasavavippayuttaa. anaasavaa. no sa.myojanaa...pe0...  no ganthaa...pe0... no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa...pe0...  no paraamaasaa...pe0... saaramma.naa. no cittaa. cetasikaa. cittasampayuttaa.  cittasa.msa.t.thaa. cittasamu.t.thaanaa. cittasahabhuno. cittaanuparivattino. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa.  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. baahiraa. no upaadaa.  anupaadinnaa. no upaadaanaa...pe0... no kilesaa...pe0... na dassanena pahaatabbaa.  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa ^a^V0.0242^ea^. siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. siyaa  sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. siyaa  sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.  na kaamaavacaraa. na ruupaavacaraa. na aruupaavacaraa. apariyaapannaa. niyyaanikaa.  niyataa. anuttaraa. ara.naati.
text.143: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sekkho, atthi asekkho, atthi nevasekkhanaasekkho...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1434: [03] 431^b^.^eb^ cattaaro ^a^M0.0225^ea^ ^a^P0.0216^ea^ ^a^V0.0243^ea^ iddhipaadaa -- idha bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m  iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m  iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti.
text.1436: [03] 432^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti? chanda.m ce  bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m, labhati cittassekaggata.m {cittassa ekaggata.m (sii0  syaa0)} -- aya.m vuccati ``chandasamaadhi''.  so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m  pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, anuppannaana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati  padahati, uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya  bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.  ime vuccanti ``padhaanasa"nkhaaraa''. iti aya~nca chandasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa. tadekajjha.m  abhisa~n~nahitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarotveva sa"nkhya.m {sa"nkha.m (sii0)} gacchati.
text.1437: [03] 433^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0244^ea^ katamo chando? yo chando chandikataa kattukamyataa kusalo dhammacchando --  aya.m vuccati ``chando''.
text.1438: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0217^ea^ katamo samaadhi? yaa ^a^T0.0293^ea^ cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m  vuccati ``samaadhi''.
text.1439: [03] tattha katamo padhaanasa"nkhaaro? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo .thiti asithilaparakkamataa anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa  dhurasampaggaaho ^a^M0.0226^ea^ viiriya.m viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m sammaavaayaamo -- aya.m  vuccati ``padhaanasa"nkhaaro''. iti iminaa ca chandena, iminaa ca samaadhinaa, iminaa ca  padhaanasa"nkhaarena upeto hoti samupeto upaagato samupaagato upapanno sampanno samannaagato.  tena vuccati ``chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato''ti.
text.1440: [03] 434^b^.^eb^ iddhiiti. yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m iddhi samiddhi ijjhanaa samijjhanaa laabho pa.tilaabho patti  sampatti phusanaa sacchikiriyaa upasampadaa.
text.1442: [03] ``iddhipaada.m bhaavetii''ti. te dhamme aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tena vuccati  ``iddhipaada.m bhaavetii''ti.
text.1444: [03] 435^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti? viiriya.m  ce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m labhati cittassekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati  ``viiriyasamaadhi''. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m ^a^V0.0245^ea^ pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya...pe0...   uppannaana.m ^a^T0.0294^ea^  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa  chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti  ``padhaanasa"nkhaaraa''. iti aya~nca viiriyasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa; tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa  abhisa"nkhipitvaa viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarotveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.
text.1445: [03] 436^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m viiriya.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo --  ida.m vuccati ``viiriya.m''.
text.1446: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0218^ea^ katamo samaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro  avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m  vuccati ``samaadhi''.
text.1447: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0227^ea^ katamo padhaanasa"nkhaaro? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo --  aya.m vuccati ``padhaanasa"nkhaaro''. iti iminaa ca viiriyena, iminaa ca samaadhinaa, iminaa  ca padhaanasa"nkhaarena upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato''ti.
text.1448: [03] 437^b^.^eb^ iddhiiti. yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m iddhi samiddhi ijjhanaa samijjhanaa laabho pa.tilaabho patti  sampatti phusanaa sacchikiriyaa upasampadaa.
text.145: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sa.myojanasampayutto, atthi sa.myojanavippayutto ^a^T0.0028^ea^.
text.1450: [03] iddhipaada.m bhaavetiiti. te dhamme aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipaada.m  bhaavetii''ti.
text.1452: [03] 438^b^.^eb^ katha~nca ^a^T0.0295^ea^ ^a^V0.0246^ea^ bhikkhu cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m   iddhipaada.m bhaaveti? citta.m  ce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m labhati cittassekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati  ``cittasamaadhi''. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m  janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m  dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa  chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime vuccanti  ``padhaanasa"nkhaaraa''. iti aya~nca cittasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa; tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa  abhisa"nkhipitvaa cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarotveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.
text.1453: [03] 439^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m citta.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0... tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  ida.m vuccati ``citta.m''.
text.1454: [03] tattha katamo samaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m  vuccati ``samaadhi''.
text.1455: [03] tattha katamo padhaanasa"nkhaaro? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo --  aya.m vuccati ``padhaanasa"nkhaaro''. iti iminaa ca cittena, iminaa ca samaadhinaa, iminaa  ca padhaanasa"nkhaarena ^a^P0.0219^ea^ upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato''ti.
text.1456: [03] 440^b^.^eb^ iddhiiti ^a^M0.0228^ea^. yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m iddhi samiddhi ijjhanaa samijjhanaa   ^a^T0.0296^ea^ laabho pa.tilaabho patti sampatti phusanaa sacchikiriyaa upasampadaa.

text.1460: [03] 441^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti? viima.msa.m  ce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa labhati samaadhi.m labhati cittassekaggata.m -- aya.m vuccati  ``viima.msaasamaadhi''. so anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya  chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m paapakaana.m  akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya...pe0...  uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya  paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. ime  vuccanti ``padhaanasa"nkhaaraa''. iti aya~nca viima.msaasamaadhi, ime ca padhaanasa"nkhaaraa; tadekajjha.m  abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarotveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati.
text.1461: [03] 442^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa viima.msaa? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi --  aya.m vuccati ``viima.msaa''.
text.1462: [03] tattha katamo samaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi -- aya.m  vuccati ``samaadhi''.
text.1463: [03] tattha katamo padhaanasa"nkhaaro? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho ^a^T0.0297^ea^ ...pe0... sammaavaayaamo --  aya.m vuccati ``padhaanasa"nkhaaro''. iti imaaya ca viima.msaaya, iminaa ca samaadhinaa, iminaa  ca padhaanasa"nkhaarena upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagato''ti.

text.1471: [03] 445^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti? idha bhikkhu  yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya  pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati  dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m   ^a^T0.0298^ea^ bhaaveti.
text.1472: [03] 446^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo chando? yo chando chandikataa kattukamyataa kusalo dhammacchando --  aya.m vuccati ``chando''.

text.15: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ruupa.m hiina.m? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m u~n~naata.m ava~n~naata.m hii.lita.m  paribhuuta.m acittiikata.m hiina.m hiinamata.m hiinasammata.m ani.t.tha.m akanta.m amanaapa.m, ruupaa saddaa  gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m hiina.m.
text.1501: [03] iddhipaada.m bhaavetiiti. te dhamme aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tena vuccati ``iddhipaada.m  bhaavetii''ti.
text.1502: [03] 457^b^.^eb^ cattaaro iddhipaadaa -- chandiddhipaado, viiriyiddhipaado, cittiddhipaado, viima.msiddhipaado.
text.1503: [03] 458^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo chandiddhipaado? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya ^a^T0.0302^ea^ bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yo tasmi.m samaye chando  chandikataa kattukamyataa kusalo dhammacchando -- aya.m vuccati ``chandiddhipaado''.  avasesaa dhammaa chandiddhipaadasampayuttaa.
text.1504: [03] 459^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo viiriyiddhipaado? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^M0.0233^ea^ viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  yo tasmi.m samaye cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``viiriyiddhipaado''. avasesaa dhammaa viiriyiddhipaadasampayuttaa.
text.1505: [03] 460^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo cittiddhipaado? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m ^a^P0.0224^ea^ apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi ^a^V0.0253^ea^ ...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  ya.m tasmi.m samaye citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0... tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m vuccati  ``cittiddhipaado''. avasesaa dhammaa cittiddhipaadasampayuttaa.
text.1506: [03] 461^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo viima.msiddhipaado? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja ^a^T0.0303^ea^ viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yaa  tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``viima.msiddhipaado''. avasesaa dhammaa viima.msiddhipaadasampayuttaa.
text.1509: [03] 462^b^.^eb^ cattaaro iddhipaadaa -- idha bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m  bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m  iddhipaada.m bhaaveti.
text.151: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi ganthaniyo, atthi aganthaniyo.
text.1510: [03] 463^b^.^eb^ catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.1512: [03] 464^b^.^eb^ kusalaayeva. siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa. vipaakadhammadhammaa. anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa.  siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa ^a^M0.0234^ea^, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.  siyaa ^a^V0.0254^ea^ piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. apacayagaamino. sekkhaa.  appamaa.naa. appamaa.naaramma.naa. pa.niitaa. sammattaniyataa. na maggaaramma.naa, maggahetukaa,  na maggaadhipatino. siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, na vattabbaa uppaadinoti. siyaa  atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. na vattabbaa atiitaaramma.naatipi,   anaagataaramma.naatipi ^a^T0.0304^ea^, paccuppannaaramma.naatipi. siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa,   siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. bahiddhaaramma.naa. anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.1514: [03] 465^b^.^eb^ viima.msiddhipaado ^a^P0.0225^ea^ hetu, tayo iddhipaadaa na hetuu. sahetukaa.  hetusampayuttaa. viima.msiddhipaado hetu ceva sahetuko ca, tayo iddhipaadaa na vattabbaa  hetuu ceva sahetukaa caati, sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu. viima.msiddhipaado hetu  ceva hetusampayutto ca, tayo iddhipaadaa na vattabbaa hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caati,  hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu. tayo iddhipaadaa na hetuu sahetukaa, viima.msiddhipaado  na vattabbo na hetu sahetukotipi, na hetu ahetukotipi. sappaccayaa. sa"nkhataa.  anidassanaa. appa.tighaa. aruupaa. lokuttaraa. kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci  na vi~n~neyyaa. no aasavaa. anaasavaa. aasavavippayuttaa. na vattabbaa aasavaa  ceva saasavaa caatipi, saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva  aasavasampayuttaa caatipi, aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. aasavavippayuttaa.  anaasavaa.
text.1515: [03] no sa.myojanaa...pe0... no ganthaa...pe0... no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0...  no niivara.naa...pe0... no paraamaasaa...pe0... saaramma.naa. tayo iddhipaadaa no cittaa,  cittiddhipaado ^a^T0.0305^ea^ citta.m. tayo iddhipaadaa cetasikaa, cittiddhipaado acetasiko.  tayo iddhipaadaa cittasampayuttaa, cittiddhipaado na vattabbo cittena sampayuttotipi,  cittena vippayuttotipi. tayo iddhipaadaa cittasa.msa.t.thaa, cittiddhipaado na vattabbo  cittena sa.msa.t.thotipi, cittena visa.msa.t.thotipi. tayo iddhipaadaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa, cittiddhipaado  no cittasamu.t.thaano ^a^M0.0235^ea^. tayo iddhipaadaa cittasahabhuno, cittiddhipaado no  cittasahabhuu. tayo iddhipaadaa cittaanuparivattino ^a^V0.0255^ea^, cittiddhipaado no cittaanuparivatti.  tayo iddhipaadaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa, cittiddhipaado no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano. tayo  iddhipaadaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno, cittiddhipaado no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. tayo  iddhipaadaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino, cittiddhipaado no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti.
text.1516: [03] tayo iddhipaadaa baahiraa, cittiddhipaado ajjhattiko. no upaadaa. anupaadinnaa.  no upaadaanaa...pe0... no kilesaa...pe0... na dassanena pahaatabbaa. na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa. na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. siyaa savitakkaa,  siyaa avitakkaa. siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa ^a^P0.0226^ea^. siyaa sappiitikaa,  siyaa appiitikaa. siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. siyaa sukhasahagataa,  siyaa na sukhasahagataa. siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa. na   kaamaavacaraa ^a^T0.0306^ea^. na ruupaavacaraa. na aruupaavacaraa. apariyaapannaa. niyyaanikaa.   niyataa. anuttaraa. ara.naati.
text.152: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi hiino, atthi majjhimo, atthi pa.niito...pe0.... eva.m  dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1521: [03] 466^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^M0.0236^ea^ ^a^P0.0227^ea^ ^a^V0.0256^ea^ bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo,  viiriyasambojjha"ngo, piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1522: [03] 467^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu satimaa hoti paramena satinepakkena  samannaagato, cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa hoti anussaritaa -- aya.m vuccati  ``satisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1523: [03] so tathaa sato viharanto ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinati pavicarati pariviima.msamaapajjati -- aya.m  vuccati ``dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo''.
text.1524: [03] tassa ta.m dhamma.m pa~n~naaya pavicinato pavicarato pariviima.msamaapajjato aaraddha.m hoti viiriya.m  asalliina.m -- aya.m vuccati ``viiriyasambojjha"ngo''.
text.1525: [03] aaraddhaviiriyassa uppajjati piiti niraamisaa -- aya.m vuccati ``piitisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1526: [03] piitimanassa kaayopi passambhati, cittampi passambhati -- aya.m vuccati ``passaddhisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1527: [03] passaddhakaayassa ^a^V0.0257^ea^ sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati -- aya.m vuccati   ``samaadhisambojjha"ngo'' ^a^T0.0307^ea^.
text.1528: [03] so tathaa samaahita.m citta.m saadhuka.m ajjhupekkhitaa hoti -- aya.m vuccati ``upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''.
text.1529: [03] 468^b^.^eb^ satta bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo,  piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1530: [03] 469^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0228^ea^ katamo satisambojjha"ngo? atthi ajjhatta.m dhammesu sati, atthi  bahiddhaa dhammesu sati. yadapi ajjhatta.m dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yadapi bahiddhaa ^a^M0.0237^ea^ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjha"ngo  abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1531: [03] tattha katamo dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo? atthi ajjhatta.m dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhaa dhammesu  pavicayo. yadapi ajjhatta.m dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yadapi bahiddhaa dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1532: [03] tattha katamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo? atthi kaayika.m viiriya.m, atthi cetasika.m viiriya.m.  yadapi kaayika.m viiriya.m tadapi viiriyasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya  sa.mvattati. yadapi cetasika.m viiriya.m tadapi viiriyasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati ^a^T0.0308^ea^.
text.1533: [03] tattha katamo piitisambojjha"ngo? atthi savitakkasavicaaraa piiti, atthi avitakkaavicaaraa  piiti. yadapi savitakkasavicaaraa piiti tadapi piitisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya  nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yadapi avitakkaavicaaraa piiti tadapi piitisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1534: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0258^ea^ katamo passaddhisambojjha"ngo? atthi kaayapassaddhi {kaayappassaddhi (syaa0  ka0)}, atthi cittapassaddhi {cittappassaddhi (syaa0 ka0)}. yadapi  kaayapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.  yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1535: [03] tattha katamo samaadhisambojjha"ngo? atthi savitakko savicaaro samaadhi, atthi avitakko  avicaaro samaadhi. yadapi savitakko savicaaro samaadhi tadapi samaadhisambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yadapi avitakko avicaaro samaadhi tadapi samaadhisambojjha"ngo  abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1536: [03] tattha katamo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo? atthi ajjhatta.m dhammesu upekkhaa, atthi bahiddhaa  dhammesu upekkhaa. yadapi ajjhatta.m dhammesu upekkhaa tadapi upekkhaasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya  sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. yadapi ^a^M0.0238^ea^ bahiddhaa dhammesu upekkhaa tadapi   ^a^T0.0309^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati.
text.1537: [03] 470^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^P0.0229^ea^ bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo,  piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1538: [03] 471^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m  viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...pe0...  viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti...  samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m  nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m.
text.154: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi ganthasampayutto, atthi ganthavippayutto.
text.1541: [03] 472^b^.^eb^ satta ^a^V0.0259^ea^ bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo,  piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1542: [03] 473^b^.^eb^ tattha katame satta bojjha"ngaa? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m  samaye satta bojjha"ngaa honti -- satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1543: [03] 474^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? yaa sati anussati...pe0... sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``satisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1544: [03] tattha ^a^T0.0310^ea^ ^a^M0.0239^ea^ katamo dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho  dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati  ``dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo''.
text.1545: [03] tattha katamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo  viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``viiriyasambojjha"ngo''.
text.1546: [03] tattha katamo piitisambojjha"ngo? yaa piiti paamojja.m aamodanaa pamodanaa haaso pahaaso vitti  odagya.m {odagga.m (sii0) dha0 sa0 9} attamanataa cittassa piitisambojjha"ngo -- aya.m vuccati ``piitisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1547: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0230^ea^ katamo passaddhisambojjha"ngo? yaa vedanaakkhandhassa sa~n~naakkhandhassa sa"nkhaarakkhandhassa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandhassa passaddhi pa.tippassaddhi passambhanaa pa.tippassambhanaa pa.tippassambhitatta.m passaddhisambojjha"ngo --  aya.m vuccati ``passaddhisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1548: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0260^ea^ katamo samaadhisambojjha"ngo? yaa cittassa .thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``samaadhisambojjha"ngo''.
text.1549: [03] tattha katamo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo? yaa upekkhaa upekkhanaa ajjhupekkhanaa majjhattataa cittassa  upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- aya.m vuccati ``upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''. ime vuccanti satta  bojjha"ngaa. avasesaa dhammaa sattahi bojjha"ngehi ^a^T0.0311^ea^ sampayuttaa.
text.155: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi micchattaniyato, atthi sammattaniyato, atthi aniyato...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1551: [03] 476^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yaa  tasmi.m samaye sati anussati sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m vuccati ``satisambojjha"ngo''. avasesaa dhammaa satisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0...  avasesaa dhammaa ^a^M0.0240^ea^ dhammavicayasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa viiriyasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0...  avasesaa dhammaa piitisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa passaddhisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0...  avasesaa dhammaa samaadhisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa.
text.1552: [03] tattha katamo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yaa tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa  upekkhanaa ajjhupekkhanaa majjhattataa cittassa upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- aya.m vuccati ``upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''.  avasesaa dhammaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa.
text.1554: [03] 478^b^.^eb^ tattha katame satta bojjha"ngaa? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi ^a^V0.0261^ea^ ...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yo  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti -- ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva  lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, tasmi.m samaye  satta bojjha"ngaa honti -- satisambojjha"ngo...pe0... upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1555: [03] 479^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo satisambojjha"ngo? yaa sati anussati...pe0... sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``satisambojjha"ngo''...pe0....
text.1556: [03] tattha katamo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo? yaa upekkhaa upekkhanaa ajjhupekkhanaa majjhattataa cittassa  upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- aya.m vuccati ``upekkhaasambojjha"ngo''. ime vuccanti ``satta  bojjha"ngaa''. avasesaa dhammaa sattahi bojjha"ngehi sampayuttaa.
text.1558: [03] 481^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0241^ea^ katamo satisambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m ^a^T0.0313^ea^ upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva  lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yaa tasmi.m samaye sati  anussati sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``satisambojjha"ngo''.  avasesaa dhammaa satisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa dhammavicayasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa  ^a^P0.0232^ea^ ...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa viiriyasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa  dhammaa piitisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa passaddhisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa...pe0...  avasesaa dhammaa samaadhisambojjha"ngasampayuttaa.
text.1559: [03] tattha katamo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m ^a^V0.0262^ea^ apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa  jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, yaa tasmi.m samaye upekkhaa upekkhanaa  ajjhupekkhanaa majjhattataa cittassa upekkhaasambojjha"ngo -- aya.m vuccati   ``upekkhaasambojjha"ngo'' ^a^T0.0314^ea^. avasesaa dhammaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngasampayuttaa.
text.1562: [03] 482^b^.^eb^ satta bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo,  piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
text.1563: [03] 483^b^.^eb^ sattanna.m ^a^M0.0242^ea^ bojjha"ngaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.1565: [03] 484^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. piitisambojjha"ngo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto;  cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.  siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa. anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa.  siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.  piitisambojjha"ngo na piitisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhaasahagato; cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa piitisahagataa,  siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa.  neva dassanena ^a^V0.0263^ea^ na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. siyaa apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino.  siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa. appamaa.naa. appamaa.naaramma.naa. pa.niitaa. siyaa  sammattaniyataa ^a^P0.0233^ea^, siyaa aniyataa. na maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa,  siyaa maggaadhipatino; siyaa na vattabbaa maggahetukaatipi, maggaadhipatinotipi. siyaa  uppannaa, siyaa ^a^T0.0315^ea^ anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino. siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa  paccuppannaa. na vattabbaa atiitaaramma.naatipi, anaagataaramma.naatipi, paccuppannaaramma.naatipi.  siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. bahiddhaaramma.naa. anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.1567: [03] 485^b^.^eb^ dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo hetu, cha bojjha"ngaa hetusampayuttaa. dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo  hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjha"ngaa na vattabbaa hetuu ceva sahetukaa caati, sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetuu. dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjha"ngaa  na vattabbaa hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caati, hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu. cha  bojjha"ngaa na hetuu sahetukaa, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo na vattabbo na hetusahetukotipi,  na hetuahetukotipi. sappaccayaa. sa"nkhataa. anidassanaa. appa.tighaa. aruupaa.  lokuttaraa. kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci ^a^M0.0243^ea^ na vi~n~neyyaa. no aasavaa.  anaasavaa aasavavippayuttaa. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva saasavaa caatipi, saasavaa ceva  no ca aasavaatipi. aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caatipi, aasavasampayuttaa ceva no  ca aasavaatipi. aasavavippayuttaa. anaasavaa. no sa.myojanaa...pe0... no ganthaa...pe0...  no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa...pe0... no paraamaasaa...pe0...  saaramma.naa. no cittaa. cetasikaa. cittasampayuttaa. cittasa.msa.t.thaa ^a^T0.0316^ea^. cittasamu.t.thaanaa.  cittasahabhuno. cittaanuparivattino. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno.  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. baahiraa. no upaadaa. anupaadinnaa. no upaadaanaa...pe0...  no kilesaa...pe0... na dassanena pahaatabbaa. na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. na dassanena  pahaatabbahetukaa. na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa.  siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa.
text.1568: [03] piitisambojjha"ngo ^a^V0.0264^ea^ appiitiko, cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa.  piitisambojjha"ngo na piitisahagato, cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa.  piitisambojjha"ngo sukhasahagato, cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa ^a^P0.0234^ea^ sukhasahagataa, siyaa na  sukhasahagataa. piitisambojjha"ngo na upekkhaasahagato, cha bojjha"ngaa siyaa upekkhaasahagataa,  siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa. na kaamaavacaraa. na ruupaavacaraa. na aruupaavacaraa. apariyaapannaa.  siyaa niyyaanikaa, siyaa aniyyaanikaa. siyaa niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. anuttaraa.  ara.naati.
text.157: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo, atthi ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyo.
text.1573: [03] 486^b^.^eb^ ariyo ^a^T0.0317^ea^ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ ^a^P0.0235^ea^ ^a^V0.0265^ea^ a.t.tha"ngiko   maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo,   sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.1574: [03] 487^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? dukkhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe  ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''.
text.1575: [03] tattha katamo sammaasa"nkappo? nekkhammasa"nkappo, abyaapaadasa"nkappo, avihi.msaasa"nkappo -- aya.m  vuccati ``sammaasa"nkappo''.
text.1576: [03] tattha katamaa sammaavaacaa? musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya  vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaacaa''.
text.1577: [03] tattha katamo sammaakammanto? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa  verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaakammanto''.
text.1578: [03] tattha katamo sammaaaajiivo? idha ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivika.m  kappeti -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaaaajiivo''.
text.1579: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0266^ea^ katamo sammaavaayaamo? idha bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m  anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m  paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m ^a^T0.0318^ea^ aarabhati citta.m  pagga.nhaati padahati, anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati  viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati, uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya  bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati  citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaayaamo''.
text.158: [03] tividhena ^a^P0.0025^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi maggaaramma.no, atthi maggahetuko, atthi  maggaadhipati...pe0.... eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1580: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0236^ea^ katamaa sammaasati? idha bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati  aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m, vedanaasu ^a^M0.0245^ea^  vedanaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m,  citte cittaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m,  dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m --  aya.m vuccati ``sammaasati''.
text.1581: [03] tattha katamo sammaasamaadhi? idha bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati;  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m  samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako  ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa  ^a^T0.0319^ea^ aacikkhanti ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja   viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa   adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati -- aya.m vuccati   ``sammaasamaadhi''.
text.1582: [03] 488^b^.^eb^ ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa,  sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.1583: [03] 489^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? idha bhikkhu sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m  viraaganissita.m ^a^V0.0267^ea^ nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m, sammaasa"nkappa.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaavaaca.m  bhaaveti...pe0... sammaakammanta.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaaaajiiva.m bhaaveti...pe0...  sammaavaayaama.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasati.m bhaaveti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.m bhaaveti  vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m.
text.1586: [03] 490^b^.^eb^ a.t.tha"ngiko maggo -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto,  sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.1587: [03] 491^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0246^ea^ katamo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m ^a^P0.0237^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye a.t.tha"ngiko maggo hoti -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.
text.1588: [03] 492^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0320^ea^ katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho   dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''.
text.1589: [03] tattha katamo sammaasa"nkappo? yo takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa byappanaa cetaso  abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasa"nkappo''.
text.1590: [03] tattha katamaa sammaavaacaa? yaa catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii  akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaavaacaa magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaacaa''.
text.1591: [03] tattha katamo sammaakammanto? yaa tiihi kaayaduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati  verama.nii ^a^V0.0268^ea^ akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaakammanto  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaakammanto''.
text.1592: [03] tattha katamo sammaaaajiivo? yaa micchaaaajiivaa aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii akiriyaa  akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaaaajiivo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m vuccati ``sammaaaajiivo''.
text.1593: [03] tattha katamo sammaavaayaamo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m ^a^T0.0321^ea^ vuccati ``sammaavaayaamo''.
text.1594: [03] tattha katamaa sammaasati? yaa sati anussati...pe0... sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasati''.
text.1595: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0247^ea^ katamo sammaasamaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi  samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''. aya.m  vuccati ``a.t.tha"ngiko maggo''. avasesaa dhammaa a.t.tha"ngikena maggena sampayuttaa.
text.1596: [03] 493^b^.^eb^ pa~nca"ngiko maggo -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati,  sammaasamaadhi.
text.1597: [03] 494^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0238^ea^ katamo pa~nca"ngiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye pa~nca"ngiko maggo hoti -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo,  sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.1598: [03] 495^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0269^ea^ katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo  sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''.
text.1599: [03] tattha katamo sammaasa"nkappo? yo takko vitakko...pe0... sammaasa"nkappo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasa"nkappo''.
text.16: [03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m pa.niita.m? ya.m ruupa.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m anu~n~naata.m anava~n~naata.m ahii.lita.m  aparibhuuta.m cittiikata.m pa.niita.m pa.niitamata.m pa.niitasammata.m i.t.tha.m kanta.m manaapa.m, ruupaa saddaa  gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m pa.niita.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana ^a^T0.0003^ea^ ruupa.m upaadaayupaadaaya  ruupa.m hiina.m pa.niita.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.160: [03] duvidhena ^a^V0.0026^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi oghaniyo, atthi anoghaniyo.
text.1600: [03] tattha katamo ^a^T0.0322^ea^ sammaavaayaamo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaayaamo''.
text.1601: [03] tattha katamaa sammaasati? yaa sati anussati...pe0... sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasati''.
text.1602: [03] tattha katamo sammaasamaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''. aya.m vuccati ``pa~nca"ngiko  maggo''. avasesaa dhammaa pa~nca"ngikena maggena sampayuttaa.
text.1603: [03] 496^b^.^eb^ pa~nca"ngiko maggo -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati,  sammaasamaadhi.
text.1604: [03] 497^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0248^ea^ katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''. avasesaa dhammaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa  sampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa sammaasa"nkappena sampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa  sammaavaayaamena sampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa sammaasatiyaa sampayuttaa.
text.1605: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0239^ea^ katamo sammaasamaadhi? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya ^a^T0.0323^ea^ pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, yaa  tasmi.m samaye ^a^V0.0270^ea^ cittassa .thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''. avasesaa dhammaa sammaasamaadhinaa sampayuttaa.
text.1607: [03] 499^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m  bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m  samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa  kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, tasmi.m samaye a.t.tha"ngiko  maggo hoti -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati ``a.t.tha"ngiko maggo''.  avasesaa dhammaa a.t.tha"ngikena maggena sampayuttaa.
text.1608: [03] 500^b^.^eb^ pa~nca"ngiko maggo -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati,  sammaasamaadhi.
text.1609: [03] 501^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo pa~nca"ngiko maggo? idha ^a^P0.0240^ea^ bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m ^a^T0.0324^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharati ^a^M0.0249^ea^ dukkhapa.tipada.m  dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammaa  kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva  kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m,  tasmi.m samaye pa~nca"ngiko maggo hoti -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo,  sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi. aya.m vuccati ``pa~nca"ngiko maggo''. avasesaa dhammaa  pa~nca"ngikena maggena sampayuttaa.
text.161: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi uppanno, atthi anuppanno, atthi uppaadii...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1610: [03] 502^b^.^eb^ pa~nca"ngiko maggo -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati,  sammaasamaadhi.
text.1611: [03] 503^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0271^ea^ katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo hoti. ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa  jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m  upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, yaa tasmi.m samaye pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0...  amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m  vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''. avasesaa dhammaa sammaadi.t.thiyaa sampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa  dhammaa sammaasa"nkappena ^a^T0.0325^ea^ sampayuttaa...pe0... avasesaa dhammaa sammaavaayaamena sampayuttaa...pe0...  avasesaa dhammaa sammaasatiyaa sampayuttaa.
text.1612: [01] tattha katamo sammaasamaadhi? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m jhaana.m bhaaveti  niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa vivicceva kaamehi...pe0...  pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m, tasmi.m samaye phasso  hoti...pe0... avikkhepo ^a^P0.0241^ea^ hoti. ime dhammaa kusalaa. tasseva lokuttarassa  kusalassa jhaanassa katattaa bhaavitattaa vipaaka.m vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m  jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m su~n~nata.m, yaa tasmi.m samaye cittassa  .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro avikkhepo avisaaha.tamaanasataa ^a^M0.0250^ea^ samatho  samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''. avasesaa dhammaa sammaasamaadhinaa sampayuttaa.
text.1615: [03] 504^b^.^eb^ ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa,  sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.1616: [03] 505^b^.^eb^ a.t.thanna.m ^a^V0.0272^ea^ magga"ngaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.1618: [03] 506^b^.^eb^ siyaa kusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. sammaasa"nkappo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto;  satta magga"ngaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa ^a^T0.0326^ea^, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.  siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa. anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa.  sammaasa"nkappo avitakkavicaaramatto; satta magga"ngaa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa  avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. sammaasa"nkappo piitisahagato, sukhasahagato,  na upekkhaasahagato; satta magga"ngaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa.  neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  siyaa apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa.  appamaa.naa. appamaa.naaramma.naa. pa.niitaa. siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa.  na maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa, siyaa maggaadhipatino; siyaa na vattabbaa maggahetukaatipi,  maggaadhipatinotipi. siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino. siyaa atiitaa,  siyaa anaagataa, siyaa ^a^M0.0251^ea^ paccuppannaa. na vattabbaa atiitaaramma.naatipi, anaagataaramma.naatipi,  paccuppannaaramma.naatipi. siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. bahiddhaaramma.naa.  anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.1620: [03] 507^b^.^eb^ sammaadi.t.thi ^a^P0.0242^ea^ hetu, satta magga"ngaa na hetuu. sahetukaa. hetusampayuttaa.  sammaadi.t.thi hetu ceva sahetukaa ca, satta magga"ngaa na vattabbaa hetuu ceva sahetukaa  caati, sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu. sammaadi.t.thi hetu ceva hetusampayuttaa ca, satta  magga"ngaa ^a^T0.0327^ea^ na vattabbaa hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caati, hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu.  satta magga"ngaa na hetuu sahetukaa, sammaadi.t.thi na vattabbaa na hetu sahetukaatipi,  na hetu ahetukaatipi.
text.1621: [03] sappaccayaa ^a^V0.0273^ea^. sa"nkhataa. anidassanaa. appa.tighaa. aruupaa. lokuttaraa. kenaci vi~n~neyyaa,  kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.1622: [03] no aasavaa. anaasavaa. aasavavippayuttaa. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva saasavaa caatipi,  saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. na vattabbaa aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caatipi,  aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaatipi. aasavavippayuttaa. anaasavaa.
text.1623: [03] no sa.myojanaa...pe0... no ganthaa...pe0... no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0...  no niivara.naa...pe0... no paraamaasaa...pe0... saaramma.naa. no cittaa. cetasikaa.  cittasampayuttaa. cittasa.msa.t.thaa. cittasamu.t.thaanaa. cittasahabhuno. cittaanuparivattino.  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.  baahiraa. no upaadaa. anupaadinnaa.
text.1624: [03] no upaadaanaa...pe0... no kilesaa...pe0... na dassanena pahaatabbaa. na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa. na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. sammaasa"nkappo  avitakko, satta magga"ngaa siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa. sammaasa"nkappo savicaaro,  satta magga"ngaa siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. sammaasa"nkappo sappiitiko ^a^M0.0252^ea^,  satta magga"ngaa siyaa ^a^T0.0328^ea^ sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. sammaasa"nkappo piitisahagato,  satta magga"ngaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. sammaasa"nkappo sukhasahagato,  satta magga"ngaa siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. sammaasa"nkappo na upekkhaasahagato,  satta magga"ngaa siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa. na ^a^P0.0243^ea^ kaamaavacaraa.  na ruupaavacaraa. na aruupaavacaraa. apariyaapannaa. siyaa niyyaanikaa, siyaa aniyyaanikaa.  siyaa niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. anuttaraa. ara.naati.
text.1629: [03] 508^b^.^eb^ idha ^a^M0.0253^ea^ ^a^P0.0244^ea^ ^a^V0.0274^ea^ bhikkhu paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati, aacaaragocarasampanno,  a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu indriyesu guttadvaaro  bhojane matta~n~nuu pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyutto saatacca.m nepakka.m bodhipakkhikaana.m  dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto. so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti,  aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite {sammi~njite (sii0 syaa0)} pasaarite sampajaanakaarii  hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite  sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii ^a^T0.0329^ea^ hoti, gate .thite nisinne  sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti. so vivitta.m senaasana.m  bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m  palaalapu~nja.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m vijanavaata.m manussaraahasseyyaka.m {manussaraahaseyyaka.m (sii0  syaa0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m.  so ara~n~nagato vaa rukkhamuulagato vaa su~n~naagaaragato vaa nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa  uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena  cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto  viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m  pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti.  uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto ^a^P0.0245^ea^, uddhaccakukkuccaa  citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii  kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti. so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya  cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi ^a^V0.0275^ea^ vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati;  vitakkavicaaraana.m ^a^M0.0254^ea^ vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m  avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa  upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa  aacikkhanti ^a^T0.0330^ea^ -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa  adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; sabbaso  ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa ``ananto  aakaaso''ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati; sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma ``ananta.m vi~n~naa.na''nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati; sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m  samatikkamma ``natthi ki~ncii''ti aaki~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati; sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.
text.163: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho ^a^T0.0029^ea^ -- atthi oghasampayutto, atthi oghavippayutto.
text.1631: [03] 509^b^.^eb^ ``idhaa''ti imissaa di.t.thiyaa, imissaa khantiyaa, imissaa ruciyaa, imasmi.m aadaaye,  imasmi.m dhamme, imasmi.m vinaye, imasmi.m dhammavinaye, imasmi.m paavacane, imasmi.m brahmacariye,  imasmi.m satthusaasane. tena vuccati ``idhaa''ti.
text.1632: [03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``bhikkhuu''ti sama~n~naaya bhikkhu, pa.ti~n~naaya bhikkhu, bhikkhatiiti bhikkhu, bhikkhakoti  bhikkhu, bhikkhaacariya.m ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu, bhinnapa.tadharoti bhikkhu, bhindati  paapake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu, bhinnattaa paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m bhikkhu,  odhiso ^a^P0.0246^ea^ kilesaana.m pahaanaa bhikkhu, anodhiso kilesaana.m pahaanaa  bhikkhu, sekkho bhikkhu, asekkho bhikkhu, nevasekkhanaasekkho ^a^T0.0331^ea^ bhikkhu, aggo  bhikkhu, bhadro bhikkhu, ma.n.do bhikkhu, saaro bhikkhu, samaggena sa"nghena ~natticatutthena  kammena akuppena .thaanaarahena upasampanno bhikkhu.
text.1633: [03] 511^b^.^eb^ ``paatimokkha''nti siila.m pati.t.thaa aadi cara.na.m sa.myamo sa.mvaro mokkha.m paamokkha.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa. sa.mvaroti. kaayiko ^a^M0.0255^ea^ aviitikkamo,  vaacasiko aviitikkamo ^a^V0.0276^ea^, kaayikavaacasiko aviitikkamo. sa.mvutoti. iminaa  paatimokkhasa.mvarena upeto hoti samupeto upaagato samupaagato upapanno sampanno samannaagato.  tena vuccati ``paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto''ti.
text.1634: [03] 512^b^.^eb^ ``viharatii''ti iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapeti carati viharati. tena  vuccati ``viharatii''ti.
text.1636: [03] tattha katamo anaacaaro? kaayiko viitikkamo, vaacasiko viitikkamo, kaayikavaacasiko  viitikkamo -- aya.m vuccati ``anaacaaro''. sabbampi dussiilya.m anaacaaro. idhekacco  ve.ludaanena vaa pattadaanena vaa pupphadaanena vaa phaladaanena vaa sinaanadaanena vaa dantaka.t.thadaanena  vaa caa.tukamyataaya vaa muggasuupyataaya {muggasuppataaya (sii0)} vaa paaribha.tayataaya vaa ja"nghapesanikena vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena  vaa buddhapa.tiku.t.thena micchaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappeti -- aya.m vuccati ``anaacaaro''.
text.1637: [03] tattha katamo aacaaro? kaayiko aviitikkamo, vaacasiko aviitikkamo, kaayikavaacasiko  aviitikkamo -- aya.m vuccati ``aacaaro'' ^a^T0.0332^ea^. sabbopi siilasa.mvaro aacaaro. idhekacco  na ve.ludaanena na pattadaanena na pupphadaanena na phaladaanena na sinaanadaanena na dantaka.t.thadaanena  na caa.tukamyataaya na muggasuupyataaya na paaribha.tayataaya na ja"nghapesanikena na a~n~natara~n~natarena  buddhapa.tiku.t.thena micchaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappeti -- aya.m vuccati ``aacaaro''.
text.1639: [03] tattha katamo agocaro? idhekacco ^a^P0.0247^ea^ vesiyaagocaro vaa hoti vidhavaagocaro  vaa thullakumaarigocaro vaa pa.n.dakagocaro vaa bhikkhunigocaro vaa paanaagaaragocaro  vaa, sa.msa.t.tho viharati raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi ananulomikena  sa.msaggena ^a^M0.0256^ea^; yaani vaa ^a^V0.0277^ea^ pana taani kulaani assaddhaani appasannaani anopaanabhuutaani  akkosakaparibhaasakaani anatthakaamaani ahitakaamaani aphaasukakaamaani ayogakkhemakaamaani  bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m, tathaaruupaani kulaani sevati bhajati  payirupaasati -- aya.m vuccati ``agocaro''.
text.164: [03] tividhena ^a^M0.0024^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi atiito, atthi anaagato, atthi paccuppanno...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.1640: [03] tattha katamo gocaro? idhekacco na vesiyaagocaro hoti na vidhavaagocaro na thullakumaarigocaro  na pa.n.dakagocaro na bhikkhunigocaro na paanaagaaragocaro, asa.msa.t.tho viharati raajuuhi raajamahaamattehi  titthiyehi titthiyasaavakehi ananulomikena sa.msaggena; yaani vaa pana taani kulaani  saddhaani pasannaani opaanabhuutaani kaasaavapajjotaani isivaatapa.tivaataani atthakaamaani  hitakaamaani phaasukakaamaani yogakkhemakaamaani bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m  upaasikaana.m, tathaaruupaani kulaani sevati bhajati payirupaasati -- aya.m vuccati  ^a^T0.0333^ea^ ``gocaro''. iti iminaa ca aacaarena iminaa ca gocarena upeto   hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``aacaaragocarasampanno''ti.
text.1641: [03] 515^b^.^eb^ ``a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii''ti tattha katame a.numattaa vajjaa? yaani  taani vajjaani appamattakaani oramattakaani lahusaani lahusammataani sa.myamakara.niiyaani  sa.mvarakara.niiyaani cittuppaadakara.niiyaani manasikaarapa.tibaddhaani -- ime vuccanti ``a.numattaa  vajjaa''. iti imesu a.numattesu vajjesu vajjadassaavii ca hoti bhayadassaavii ca aadiinavadassaavii  ca nissara.nadassaavii ca. tena vuccati ``a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii''ti.
text.1642: [03] 516^b^.^eb^ ``samaadaaya ^a^P0.0248^ea^ sikkhati sikkhaapadesuu''ti tattha katamaa sikkhaa? catasso  sikkhaa -- bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhusikkhaa, bhikkhuniina.m bhikkhunisikkhaa, upaasakaana.m upaasakasikkhaa,  upaasikaana.m upaasikasikkhaa. imaa vuccanti ``sikkhaayo''. iti imaasu sikkhaasu  sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m asesa.m nissesa.m samaadaaya vattati. tena vuccati ``samaadaaya  sikkhati sikkhaapadesuu''ti.
text.1643: [03] 517^b^.^eb^ ``indriyesu guttadvaaro''ti atthi indriyesu guttadvaarataa, atthi aguttadvaarataa.
text.1644: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0257^ea^ ^a^V0.0278^ea^ katamaa indriyesu aguttadvaarataa? idhekacco cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa  nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m  viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na  pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m  sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya ^a^T0.0334^ea^ rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0...  kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya nimittaggaahii hoti  anubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa  paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati manindriya.m,  manindriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. yaa imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m agutti agopanaa anaarakkho  asa.mvaro -- aya.m vuccati ``indriyesu aguttadvaarataa''.
text.1645: [03] tattha katamaa indriyesu guttadvaarataa? idhekacco cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii  hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa  paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m,  cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0...  jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m  vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. ~natvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m  asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa  sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. yaa imesa.m channa.m  indriyaana.m gutti gopanaa aarakkho sa.mvaro -- aya.m vuccati ``indriyesu ^a^P0.0249^ea^  guttadvaarataa''. imaaya indriyesu guttadvaarataaya upeto hoti samupeto...pe0... samannaagato.  tena vuccati ``indriyesu guttadvaaro''ti.
text.1646: [03] 518^b^.^eb^ ``bhojane matta~n~nuu''ti atthi bhojane matta~n~nutaa, atthi bhojane amatta~n~nutaa.
text.1647: [03] tattha katamaa bhojane amatta~n~nutaa? idhekacco appa.tisa"nkhaa ayoniso aahaara.m aahaareti  davaaya madaaya ma.n.danaaya vibhuusanaaya. yaa tattha asantu.t.thitaa amatta~n~nutaa appa.tisa"nkhaa bhojane --  aya.m vuccati ``bhojane amatta~n~nutaa''ti.
text.1648: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0258^ea^ ^a^V0.0279^ea^ katamaa bhojane matta~n~nutaa? idhekacco pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m  aahaareti -- ``neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa  .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami  nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasu vihaaro caa''ti.  yaa tattha santu.t.thitaa matta~n~nutaa pa.tisa"nkhaa bhojane -- aya.m vuccati ``bhojane matta~n~nutaa''.  imaaya bhojane matta~n~nutaaya upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. tena vuccati ``bhojane  matta~n~nuu''ti.
text.1649: [03] 519^b^.^eb^ katha~nca bhikkhu pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyutto hoti? idha bhikkhu  divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa pa.thamayaama.m  ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti, rattiyaa majjhimayaama.m dakkhi.nena  passena siihaseyya.m kappeti paade paada.m {paadena paada.m (syaa0)} accaadhaaya sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasikaritvaa,  rattiyaa pacchimayaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti.  eva.m bhikkhu ^a^T0.0336^ea^ pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyutto.
text.1651: [03] 521^b^.^eb^ ``nepakka''nti. yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi.
text.1652: [03] 522^b^.^eb^ ``bodhipakkhikaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto''ti. tattha katame bodhipakkhikaa  dhammaa? satta bojjha"ngaa -- satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo, viiriyasambojjha"ngo,  piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo   ^a^P0.0250^ea^. ime vuccanti ``bodhipakkhikaa dhammaa''. iti te bodhipakkhike  dhamme aasevati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti. tena vuccati ``bodhipakkhikaana.m dhammaana.m  bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto''ti.
text.1653: [03] 523^b^.^eb^ katha~nca ^a^M0.0259^ea^ bhikkhu abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite  vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne  sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti ^a^V0.0280^ea^, uccaarapassaavakamme  sampajaanakaarii hoti; gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii  hoti? idha bhikkhu sato sampajaano abhikkamati, sato sampajaano pa.tikkamati, sato  sampajaano aaloketi, sato sampajaano viloketi, sato sampajaano sami~njeti,  sato sampajaano pasaareti, sato sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne  ^a^T0.0337^ea^ sato sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sato sampajaanakaarii hoti,  uccaarapassaavakamme sato sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite  tu.nhiibhaave sato sampajaanakaarii hotiiti.
text.1654: [03] 524^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sati? yaa sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa apilaapanataa  asammusanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati -- aya.m vuccati ``sati''.
text.1655: [03] 525^b^.^eb^ ``sampajaano''ti tattha katama.m sampaja~n~na.m? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo  pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m  vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuuriimedhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m patodo  pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso  pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m vuccati ``sampaja~n~na.m''.  iti imaaya ca satiyaa iminaa ca sampaja~n~nena upeto hoti...pe0... samannaagato. eva.m  bhikkhu sato sampajaano abhikkamati, sato sampajaano pa.tikkamati, sato sampajaano  aaloketi, sato sampajaano viloketi, sato sampajaano sami~njeti, sato sampajaano  pasaareti, sato sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sato sampajaanakaarii  ^a^P0.0251^ea^ hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sato sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme  sato sampajaanakaarii ^a^M0.0260^ea^ hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave  sampajaanakaarii hoti.
text.1656: [03] 526^b^.^eb^ ``vivitta''nti ^a^T0.0338^ea^ santike cepi senaasana.m hoti, ta~nca anaaki.n.na.m gaha.t.thehi  pabbajitehi. tena ta.m vivitta.m. duure cepi senaasana.m hoti, ta~nca anaaki.n.na.m  gaha.t.thehi pabbajitehi. tena ta.m vivitta.m.
text.1657: [03] 527^b^.^eb^ ``senaasana''nti ma~ncopi senaasana.m, pii.thampi senaasana.m, bhisipi senaasana.m,  bibbohanampi ^a^V0.0281^ea^ {bimbohanampi (sii0 syaa0)} senaasana.m, vihaaropi senaasana.m, a.d.dhayogopi senaasana.m, paasaadopi  senaasana.m, a.t.topi senaasana.m, maa.lopi senaasana.m, le.nampi senaasana.m, guhaapi  senaasana.m, rukkhamuulampi senaasana.m, ve.lugumbopi senaasana.m. yattha vaa pana bhikkhuu  pa.tikkamanti sabbameta.m senaasana.m.
text.1658: [03] 528^b^.^eb^ ``vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajatii''ti ima.m vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati sambhajati  sevati nisevati sa.msevati. tena vuccati ``vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajatii''ti.
text.166: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi oghavippayuttaoghaniyo, atthi oghavippayuttaanoghaniyo.
text.1660: [03] 530^b^.^eb^ ``rukkhamuula''nti rukkhamuula.myeva rukkhamuula.m. pabbatoyeva pabbato. kandaraayeva  kandaraa. giriguhaayeva giriguhaa. susaana.myeva susaana.m. abbhokaasoyeva abbhokaaso.  palaalapu~njoyeva palaalapu~njo.
text.1661: [03] 531^b^.^eb^ ``vanapattha''nti duuraanameta.m senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti vanasa.n.daanameta.m  senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti bhiisanakaanameta.m {bhi.msanakaanameta.m (sii0 syaa0)} senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti  salomaha.msaanameta.m senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti pariyantaanameta.m senaasanaana.m  adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti na manussuupacaaraanameta.m senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m. ``vanapattha''nti  durabhisambhavaanameta.m ^a^T0.0339^ea^ senaasanaana.m adhivacana.m.
text.1662: [03] 532^b^.^eb^ ``appasadda''nti ^a^M0.0261^ea^ santike cepi senaasana.m hoti, ta~nca anaaki.n.na.m  gaha.t.thehi pabbajitehi. tena ta.m appasadda.m. duure cepi senaasana.m hoti, ta~nca anaaki.n.na.m  gaha.t.thehi pabbajitehi. tena ta.m appasadda.m.
