text.3070: [03] (11) katha~nca siyanti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m anavakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m...pe0... vedana.m...  sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m siyanti chanda.m pa.tilabhati, siyanti maana.m pa.tilabhati  ^a^M0.0409^ea^ ^a^V0.0463^ea^, siyanti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m sati imaani papa~ncitaani honti --  ittha.m siyanti vaa, eva.m siyanti vaa, a~n~nathaa siyanti vaa.
text.3071: [03] (12) katha~nca ittha.m siyanti hoti? khattiyo siyanti vaa, braahma.no siyanti vaa, vesso  siyanti vaa, suddo siyanti vaa, gaha.t.tho siyanti vaa, pabbajito siyanti vaa, devo  siyanti vaa, manusso siyanti vaa, ruupii siyanti vaa, aruupii siyanti vaa, sa~n~nii siyanti  vaa, asa~n~nii siyanti vaa, nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m ittha.m siyanti hoti.
text.3072: [03] (13) katha~nca eva.m siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo tathaaha.m khattiyo  siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no tathaaha.m braahma.no siyanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so   nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii ^a^T0.0534^ea^  tathaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m eva.m siyanti hoti.
text.3073: [03] (14) katha~nca a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo naaha.m tathaa  khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no naaha.m tathaa braahma.no siyanti vaa...pe0...  yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii naaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m a~n~nathaa siyanti  hoti.
text.3074: [03] (15) katha~nca apaaha.m siyanti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m anavakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m... vedana.m...  sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m apaaha.m siyanti chanda.m pa.tilabhati, apaaha.m siyanti maana.m  pa.tilabhati, apaaha.m siyanti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m sati imaani papa~ncitaani honti --  apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti vaa, apaaha.m eva.m siyanti vaa, apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti vaa.
text.3075: [03] (16) katha~nca apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti hoti? apaaha.m khattiyo siyanti vaa, apaaha.m braahma.no  siyanti vaa, apaaha.m vesso siyanti vaa, apaaha.m suddo siyanti vaa, apaaha.m gaha.t.tho  siyanti vaa, apaaha.m pabbajito siyanti ^a^P0.0396^ea^ vaa, apaaha.m devo siyanti vaa, apaaha.m  manusso siyanti vaa, apaaha.m ruupii siyanti vaa, apaaha.m aruupii siyanti vaa, apaaha.m  sa~n~nii ^a^V0.0464^ea^ siyanti vaa, apaaha.m asa~n~nii siyanti ^a^M0.0410^ea^ vaa, apaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii  siyanti vaa -- eva.m apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti hoti.  (17) katha~nca apaaha.m eva.m siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo apaaha.m  tathaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no ^a^T0.0535^ea^ apaaha.m tathaa braahma.no siyanti vaa...pe0...  yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii apaaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m apaaha.m  eva.m siyanti hoti.
text.3076: [03] (18) katha~nca apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo apaaha.m  na tathaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no apaaha.m na tathaa braahma.no siyanti vaa...pe0...  yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii apaaha.m na tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m apaaha.m  a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti.
text.3079: [03] 975^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani a.t.thaarasa ta.nhaavicaritaani baahirassa upaadaaya? iminaa asmiiti  hoti, iminaa itthasmiiti hoti, iminaa evasmiiti hoti, iminaa a~n~nathaasmiiti hoti,  iminaa bhavissanti hoti, iminaa ittha.m bhavissanti hoti, iminaa eva.m bhavissanti hoti,  iminaa a~n~nathaa bhavissanti hoti, iminaa asasmiiti hoti, iminaa saatasmiiti hoti,  iminaa siyanti hoti, iminaa ittha.m siyanti hoti, iminaa eva.m siyanti hoti, iminaa  a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti, iminaa apaaha.m siyanti hoti, iminaa apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti hoti,  iminaa apaaha.m eva.m siyanti hoti, iminaa apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti.
text.308: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. atthi ^a^P0.0042^ea^ hetusampayutto,  atthi hetuvippayutto. atthi hetu ceva sahetuko ca, atthi sahetuko ceva na  ca hetu. atthi hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, atthi hetusampayutto ceva na ca  hetu. atthi na hetu sahetuko, atthi na hetu ahetuko. atthi lokiyo,  atthi lokuttaro. atthi kenaci vi~n~neyyo, atthi kenaci na vi~n~neyyo. atthi  aasavo, atthi no aasavo. atthi saasavo, atthi anaasavo. atthi aasavasampayutto,  atthi aasavavippayutto. atthi aasavo ceva saasavo ca, atthi saasavo ceva no ca  aasavo. atthi aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto ca, atthi aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo.  atthi aasavavippayuttasaasavo, atthi aasavavippayuttaanaasavo. atthi sa.myojana.m, atthi  no sa.myojana.m. atthi sa.myojaniyo, atthi asa.myojaniyo. atthi sa.myojanasampayutto, atthi  sa.myojanavippayutto. atthi sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyo ca, atthi sa.myojaniyo ceva no  ca sa.myojana.m. atthi sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto ca, atthi sa.myojanasampayutto ^a^T0.0048^ea^  ^a^M0.0040^ea^ ceva no ca sa.myojana.m. atthi sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyo, atthi sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyo.
text.3080: [03] 976^b^.^eb^ (1) katha~nca ^a^V0.0465^ea^ iminaa asmiiti hoti? ka~nci ^a^P0.0397^ea^ dhamma.m avakaari.m karitvaa  ruupa.m... vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa asmiiti chanda.m pa.tilabhati ^a^T0.0536^ea^,  iminaa asmiiti maana.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa asmiiti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m sati  imaani papa~ncitaani honti -- iminaa itthasmiiti vaa, iminaa evasmiiti vaa, iminaa a~n~nathaasmiiti  vaa.
text.3081: [03] (2) katha~nca ^a^M0.0411^ea^ iminaa itthasmiiti hoti? iminaa khattiyosmiiti vaa, iminaa  braahma.nosmiiti vaa, iminaa vessosmiiti vaa, iminaa suddosmiiti vaa, iminaa gaha.t.thosmiiti  vaa, iminaa pabbajitosmiiti vaa, iminaa devosmiiti vaa, iminaa manussosmiiti vaa,  iminaa ruupiismiiti vaa, iminaa aruupiismiiti vaa, iminaa sa~n~niismiiti vaa, iminaa asa~n~niismiiti  vaa, iminaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niismiiti vaa -- eva.m iminaa itthasmiiti hoti.
text.3082: [03] (3) katha~nca iminaa evasmiiti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo iminaa tathaaha.m  khattiyosmiiti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa tathaaha.m braahma.nosmiiti vaa...pe0...  yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa tathaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niismiiti vaa -- eva.m iminaa  evasmiiti hoti.
text.3083: [03] (4) katha~nca iminaa a~n~nathaasmiiti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo iminaa  naaha.m tathaa khattiyosmiiti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa naaha.m tathaa braahma.nosmiiti  vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa naaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niismiiti  vaa -- eva.m iminaa a~n~nathaasmiiti hoti.
text.3084: [03] (5) katha~nca ^a^T0.0537^ea^ iminaa bhavissanti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m avakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m... vedana.m...  sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa bhavissanti chanda.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa bhavissanti  maana.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa bhavissanti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m sati imaani papa~ncitaani  honti -- iminaa ittha.m bhavissanti vaa, iminaa eva.m bhavissanti vaa, iminaa a~n~nathaa  bhavissanti vaa.
text.3085: [03] (6) katha~nca ^a^V0.0466^ea^ iminaa ittha.m bhavissanti hoti? iminaa khattiyo bhavissanti vaa...pe0...  ^a^P0.0398^ea^ iminaa aruupii bhavissanti vaa, iminaa sa~n~nii bhavissanti vaa, iminaa asa~n~nii  bhavissanti vaa, iminaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissanti vaa -- eva.m iminaa ittha.m bhavissanti  hoti.
text.3086: [03] (7) katha~nca iminaa eva.m bhavissanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo iminaa  tathaaha.m khattiyo bhavissanti vaa, yathaa so ^a^M0.0412^ea^ braahma.no iminaa tathaaha.m braahma.no  bhavissanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa tathaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii bhavissanti  vaa -- eva.m iminaa eva.m bhavissanti hoti.
text.3087: [03] (8) katha~nca iminaa a~n~nathaa bhavissanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya   ^a^T0.0538^ea^ yathaa so khattiyo  iminaa naaha.m tathaa khattiyo bhavissanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa naaha.m tathaa braahma.no  bhavissanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa naaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii  bhavissanti vaa -- eva.m iminaa a~n~nathaa bhavissanti hoti.
text.3088: [03] (9) katha~nca iminaa asasmiiti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m avakaari.m {avakaarii (sii0)} karitvaa ruupa.m...pe0...  vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa niccosmi dhuvosmi sassatosmi  avipari.naamadhammosmiiti -- eva.m iminaa asasmiiti hoti.
text.3089: [03] (10) katha~nca iminaa saatasmiiti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m avakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m...pe0...  vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa ucchijjissaami vinassissaami na  bhavissaamiiti -- eva.m iminaa saatasmiiti hoti.
text.309: [03] atthi gantho, atthi no gantho. atthi ganthaniyo, atthi aganthaniyo. atthi ganthasampayutto,  atthi ganthavippayutto. atthi gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca, atthi ganthaniyo ceva no ca  gantho. atthi gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca, atthi ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho.  atthi ^a^P0.0043^ea^ ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo, atthi ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyo. atthi  ogho, atthi no ogho. atthi oghaniyo, atthi anoghaniyo. atthi oghasampayutto,  atthi oghavippayutto. atthi ogho ceva oghaniyo ca, atthi oghaniyo ceva no  ca ogho. atthi ogho ceva oghasampayutto ca, atthi oghasampayutto ceva no ca  ogho. atthi oghavippayuttaoghaniyo, atthi oghavippayuttaanoghaniyo. atthi yogo,  atthi no yogo. atthi yoganiyo, atthi ayoganiyo. atthi yogasampayutto, atthi  yogavippayutto. atthi yogo ceva yoganiyo ca, atthi ^a^V0.0045^ea^ yoganiyo ceva no ca yogo.  atthi yogo ceva yogasampayutto ca, atthi yogasampayutto ceva no ca yogo. atthi  yogavippayuttayoganiyo, atthi yogavippayuttaayoganiyo. atthi niivara.na.m, atthi no  niivara.na.m. atthi niivara.niyo, atthi aniivara.niyo. atthi niivara.nasampayutto, atthi  niivara.navippayutto. atthi niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo ca, atthi niivara.niyo ceva no ca  niivara.na.m. atthi niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto ca, atthi niivara.nasampayutto ceva no  ca niivara.na.m. atthi niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyo, atthi ^a^T0.0049^ea^ niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyo.
text.3090: [03] (11) katha~nca iminaa siyanti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m avakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m...pe0...  vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa siyanti chanda.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa  siyanti maana.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa siyanti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m sati imaani  papa~ncitaani honti -- iminaa ittha.m siyanti vaa, iminaa eva.m siyanti vaa, iminaa  a~n~nathaa siyanti vaa.
text.3091: [03] (12) katha~nca ^a^V0.0467^ea^ iminaa ittha.m siyanti hoti? iminaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, iminaa braahma.no  siyanti vaa, iminaa vesso siyanti vaa, iminaa suddo siyanti vaa, iminaa gaha.t.tho  siyanti vaa, iminaa pabbajito siyanti vaa, iminaa devo siyanti vaa, iminaa manusso  siyanti vaa, iminaa ruupii siyanti vaa, iminaa aruupii siyanti vaa, iminaa   ^a^T0.0539^ea^ sa~n~nii ^a^P0.0399^ea^ siyanti vaa, iminaa asa~n~nii siyanti vaa, iminaa   nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m iminaa ittha.m siyanti hoti.
text.3092: [03] (13) katha~nca ^a^M0.0413^ea^ iminaa eva.m siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so  khattiyo iminaa tathaaha.m khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa tathaaha.m braahma.no  siyanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa tathaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti  vaa -- eva.m iminaa eva.m siyanti hoti.
text.3093: [03] (14) katha~nca iminaa a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo iminaa  naaha.m tathaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa naaha.m tathaa braahma.no siyanti  vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa naaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti  vaa -- eva.m iminaa a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti.
text.3094: [03] (15) katha~nca iminaa apaaha.m siyanti hoti? ka~nci dhamma.m avakaari.m karitvaa ruupa.m...pe0...  vedana.m... sa~n~na.m... sa"nkhaare... vi~n~naa.na.m iminaa apaaha.m siyanti chanda.m pa.tilabhati,  iminaa apaaha.m siyanti maana.m pa.tilabhati, iminaa apaaha.m siyanti di.t.thi.m pa.tilabhati. tasmi.m  sati imaani papa~ncitaani honti -- iminaa apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m  eva.m siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti vaa.
text.3095: [03] (16) katha~nca iminaa apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti hoti? iminaa apaaha.m khattiyo siyanti vaa,  iminaa ^a^T0.0540^ea^ apaaha.m braahma.no siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m vesso siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m  suddo siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m gaha.t.tho siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m pabbajito siyanti  vaa, iminaa apaaha.m devo siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m manusso siyanti vaa, iminaa  apaaha.m ruupii siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m aruupii siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m sa~n~nii ^a^V0.0468^ea^ siyanti  vaa, iminaa apaaha.m asa~n~nii siyanti vaa, iminaa apaaha.m nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti  vaa -- eva.m iminaa apaaha.m ittha.m siyanti hoti.
text.3096: [03] (17) katha~nca iminaa apaaha.m eva.m siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo  iminaa apaaha.m tathaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so braahma.no iminaa apaaha.m tathaa braahma.no  siyanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii iminaa apaaha.m tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii  siyanti vaa -- eva.m iminaa apaaha.m eva.m siyanti hoti.
text.3097: [03] (18) katha~nca ^a^M0.0414^ea^ iminaa apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti hoti? parapuggala.m ^a^P0.0400^ea^  upanidhaaya yathaa so khattiyo iminaa apaaha.m na tathaa khattiyo siyanti vaa, yathaa so  braahma.no iminaa apaaha.m na tathaa braahma.no siyanti vaa...pe0... yathaa so nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii  iminaa apaaha.m na tathaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii siyanti vaa -- eva.m iminaa apaaha.m a~n~nathaa siyanti  hoti.
text.3099: [03] iti imaani a.t.thaarasa ta.nhaavicaritaani ajjhattikassa upaadaaya, imaani   ^a^T0.0541^ea^ a.t.thaarasa ta.nhaavicaritaani  baahirassa upaadaaya, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa chatti.msa ta.nhaavicaritaani  honti. iti evaruupaani atiitaani chatti.msa ta.nhaavicaritaani, anaagataani chatti.msa  ta.nhaavicaritaani, paccuppannaani chatti.msa ta.nhaavicaritaani, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa  abhisa"nkhipitvaa a.t.thata.nhaavicaritasata.m hoti.
text.31: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0006^ea^ katamo sa~n~naakkhandho? yaa kaaci sa~n~naa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa  vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa vaa pa.niitaa vaa yaa duure santike  vaa tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naakkhandho.
text.310: [03] atthi paraamaaso, atthi no paraamaaso. atthi paraama.t.tho, atthi aparaama.t.tho. atthi paraamaasasampayutto,  atthi paraamaasavippayutto. atthi paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho ca, atthi paraama.t.tho ceva  no ca paraamaaso. atthi ^a^P0.0044^ea^ paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.tho, atthi paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.tho.  atthi upaadinno, atthi anupaadinno. atthi upaadaana.m, atthi no upaadaana.m. atthi  upaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadaaniyo. atthi upaadaanasampayutto, atthi upaadaanavippayutto.  atthi upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo ca, atthi upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana.m. atthi  upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutto ca ^a^M0.0041^ea^, atthi upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana.m.  atthi upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyo, atthi upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyo.
text.3100: [03] 977^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani brahmajaale veyyaakara.ne vuttaani bhagavataa?  cattaaro sassatavaadaa, cattaaro ekaccasassatikaa, cattaaro antaanantikaa, cattaaro  amaraavikkhepikaa, dve adhiccasamuppannikaa, so.lasa sa~n~niivaadaa, a.t.tha asa~n~niivaadaa,  a.t.tha nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niivaadaa, satta ucchedavaadaa, pa~nca di.t.thadhammanibbaanavaadaa -- imaani  dvaasa.t.thi di.t.thigataani brahmajaale veyyaakara.ne vuttaani bhagavataati.
text.3104: [03] 978^b^.^eb^ kati ^a^M0.0415^ea^ ^a^P0.0401^ea^ ^a^V0.0469^ea^ khandhaa, kati aayatanaani, kati dhaatuyo, kati  saccaani, kati indriyaani, kati hetuu, kati aahaaraa, kati phassaa, kati  vedanaa, kati sa~n~naa, kati cetanaa, kati cittaani?
text.3105: [03] pa~ncakkhandhaa, dvaadasaayatanaani, a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo, cattaari ^a^T0.0542^ea^ saccaani, baaviisatindriyaani,  nava hetuu, cattaaro aahaaraa, satta phassaa, satta vedanaa, satta sa~n~naa, satta cetanaa,  satta cittaani.
text.3106: [03] 979^b^.^eb^ tattha katame pa~ncakkhandhaa? ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho,  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime vuccanti ``pa~ncakkhandhaa''.
text.3107: [03] 980^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani dvaadasaayatanaani? cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m,  ghaanaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m,  manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani vuccanti ``dvaadasaayatanaani''.
text.3108: [03] 981^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo? cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotadhaatu,  saddadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu ^a^P0.0402^ea^, gandhadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  manodhaatu, dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- imaa vuccanti ``a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo''.
text.3109: [03] 982^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani cattaari saccaani? dukkhasacca.m, samudayasacca.m, nirodhasacca.m,  maggasacca.m -- imaani vuccanti ``cattaari saccaani''.
text.311: [03] atthi kileso, atthi no kileso. atthi sa.mkilesiko, atthi asa.mkilesiko.  atthi sa.mkili.t.tho, atthi asa.mkili.t.tho. atthi kilesasampayutto, atthi kilesavippayutto.  atthi kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko ca, atthi sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso.  atthi kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho ca, atthi sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ca kileso. atthi  kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca, atthi kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso.  atthi kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesiko, atthi kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesiko.  atthi dassanena pahaatabbo, atthi na dassanena pahaatabbo. atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo, atthi  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo. atthi dassanena pahaatabbahetuko, atthi na dassanena pahaatabbahetuko.  atthi bhaavanaaya ^a^T0.0050^ea^ pahaatabbahetuko, atthi na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko.
text.3110: [03] 983^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani baaviisatindriyaani? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m,  jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m,  sukhindriya.m, dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m   ^a^T0.0543^ea^, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m,   ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m, a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani vuccanti ``baaviisatindriyaani''.
text.3111: [03] 984^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0416^ea^ katame nava hetuu? tayo kusalahetuu, tayo akusalahetuu,  tayo abyaakatahetuu.
text.3112: [03] tattha katame tayo kusalahetuu? alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho  kusalahetu -- ime tayo kusalahetuu.
text.3113: [03] tattha katame tayo akusalahetuu? lobho akusalahetu, doso akusalahetu, moho  akusalahetu -- ime tayo akusalahetuu.
text.3114: [03] tattha katame tayo abyaakatahetuu? kusalaana.m vaa dhammaana.m vipaakato kiriyaabyaakatesu  vaa dhammesu alobho, adoso, amoho -- ime tayo abyaakatahetuu. ime vuccanti  ``nava hetuu''.
text.3115: [03] 985^b^.^eb^ tattha katame cattaaro aahaaraa? kaba.liikaaraahaaro {kaba.li.mkaaro aahaaro (sii0  syaa0)}, phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro  ^a^P0.0403^ea^, vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- ime vuccanti ``cattaaro aahaaraa''.
text.3116: [03] 986^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0471^ea^ katame satta phassaa? cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, ghaanasamphasso, jivhaasamphasso,  kaayasamphasso, manodhaatusamphasso, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso -- ime vuccanti ``satta  phassaa''.
text.3117: [03] 987^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa satta vedanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa,  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa ^a^T0.0544^ea^ vedanaa -- imaa vuccanti ``satta vedanaa''.
text.3118: [03] 988^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa satta sa~n~naa? cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa, sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, ghaanasamphassajaa  sa~n~naa, jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, manodhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa,  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- imaa vuccanti ``satta sa~n~naa''.
text.3119: [03] 989^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0417^ea^ katamaa satta cetanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa, sotasamphassajaa  cetanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa, kaayasamphassajaa  cetanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa -- imaa  vuccanti ``satta cetanaa''.
text.312: [03] atthi savitakko, atthi avitakko. atthi savicaaro, atthi avicaaro. atthi sappiitiko  ^a^V0.0046^ea^, atthi appiitiko. atthi ^a^P0.0045^ea^ piitisahagato, atthi na piitisahagato. atthi  sukhasahagato, atthi na sukhasahagato. atthi upekkhaasahagato, atthi na upekkhaasahagato. atthi  kaamaavacaro, atthi na kaamaavacaro. atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi na ruupaavacaro. atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi na aruupaavacaro. atthi pariyaapanno, atthi apariyaapanno. atthi niyyaaniko,  atthi aniyyaaniko. atthi niyato, atthi aniyato. atthi sauttaro, atthi anuttaro.  atthi sara.no, atthi ara.no.
text.3120: [03] 990^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaani satta cittaani? cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m,  jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P0.0404^ea^, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  imaani vuccanti ``satta cittaani''.
text.3123: [03] 991^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa kati khandhaa, kati aayatanaani, kati dhaatuyo, kati saccaani,  kati ^a^V0.0472^ea^ indriyaani, kati hetuu, kati aahaaraa, kati phassaa, kati vedanaa,  kati sa~n~naa, kati cetanaa, kati cittaani?
text.3124: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa, dvaadasaayatanaani, a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo, tii.ni saccaani, baaviisatindriyaani,  nava hetuu, cattaaro aahaaraa, satta phassaa, satta vedanaa, satta sa~n~naa, satta cetanaa,  satta cittaani.
text.3125: [03] 992^b^.^eb^ tattha katame kaamadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa? ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho,  sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa''.
text.3126: [03] tattha katamaani kaamadhaatuyaa dvaadasaayatanaani? cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m ^a^T0.0545^ea^,   sotaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m,  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa dvaadasaayatanaani''.
text.3127: [03] tattha katamaa kaamadhaatuyaa a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo? cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  sotadhaatu, saddadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  manodhaatu, dhammadhaatu ^a^M0.0418^ea^, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- imaa vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa  a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo''.
text.3128: [03] tattha katamaani kaamadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani? dukkhasacca.m, samudayasacca.m, maggasacca.m --  imaani vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani''.
text.3129: [03] tattha katamaani kaamadhaatuyaa baaviisatindriyaani? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m...pe0...  a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa baaviisatindriyaani''.
text.313: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3130: [03] tattha katame kaamadhaatuyaa nava hetuu? tayo kusalahetuu, tayo akusalahetuu, tayo  abyaakatahetuu...pe0... ime vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa nava hetuu''.
text.3131: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0405^ea^ ^a^V0.0473^ea^ katame kaamadhaatuyaa cattaaro aahaaraa? kaba.liikaaraahaaro,  phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- ime vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa  cattaaro aahaaraa''.
text.3132: [03] tattha katame kaamadhaatuyaa satta phassaa? cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso, ghaanasamphasso,  jivhaasamphasso, kaayasamphasso, manodhaatusamphasso, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso -- ime  vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa satta phassaa''.
text.3133: [03] tattha katamaa kaamadhaatuyaa satta vedanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa,  ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa  vedanaa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa -- imaa vuccatti ``kaamadhaatuyaa satta  vedanaa''.
text.3134: [03] tattha katamaa kaamadhaatuyaa satta sa~n~naa? cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa, sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa,  ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa, manodhaatusamphassajaa  sa~n~naa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- imaa vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa satta sa~n~naa''.
text.3135: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0419^ea^ katamaa kaamadhaatuyaa satta cetanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa, sotasamphassajaa  cetanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa, kaayasamphassajaa  cetanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa cetanaa -- imaa  vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa satta cetanaa''.
text.3136: [03] tattha katamaani kaamadhaatuyaa satta cittaani? cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m,  ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  imaani vuccanti ``kaamadhaatuyaa satta cittaani''.
text.3138: [03] 993^b^.^eb^ ruupadhaatuyaa ^a^V0.0474^ea^ kati khandhaa, kati aayatanaa, kati dhaatuyo, kati saccaani, kati  indriyaani...pe0... kati cittaani?
text.3139: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa, cha aayatanaani, nava dhaatuyo, tii.ni saccaani   ^a^T0.0546^ea^, cuddasindriyaani, a.t.tha hetuu, tayo aahaaraa, cattaaro phassaa, catasso vedanaa,   catasso sa~n~naa, catasso cetanaa, cattaari cittaani.
text.3140: [03] 994^b^.^eb^ tattha katame ruupadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa? ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho,  sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa pa~ncakkhandhaa''.
text.3141: [03] tattha katamaani ruupadhaatuyaa cha aayatanaani? cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m,  saddaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa cha aayatanaani''.
text.3142: [03] tattha katamaa ruupadhaatuyaa nava dhaatuyo? cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  sotadhaatu, saddadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manodhaatu, dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  imaa vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa nava dhaatuyo''.
text.3143: [03] tattha katamaani ruupadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani? dukkhasacca.m, samudayasacca.m, maggasacca.m --  imaani vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani''.
text.3144: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0420^ea^ katamaani ruupadhaatuyaa cuddasindriyaani? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m,  manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m ^a^P0.0406^ea^, upekkhindriya.m, saddhindriya.m,  viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m,  a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa cuddasindriyaani''.
text.3145: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0475^ea^ katame ruupadhaatuyaa a.t.tha hetuu? tayo kusalahetuu, dve akusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu.
text.3146: [03] tattha katame tayo kusalahetuu? alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho  kusalahetu -- ime tayo kusalahetuu.
text.3147: [03] tattha katame dve akusalahetuu? lobho akusalahetu, moho akusalahetu -- ime  dve akusalahetuu.
text.3148: [03] tattha katame ^a^T0.0547^ea^ tayo abyaakatahetuu? kusalaana.m vaa dhammaana.m vipaakato kiriyaabyaakatesu  vaa dhammesu alobho, adoso, amoho -- ime tayo abyaakatahetuu. ime vuccanti  ruupadhaatuyaa a.t.tha hetuu.
text.3149: [03] tattha katame ruupadhaatuyaa tayo aahaaraa? phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro --  ime vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa tayo aahaaraa''.
text.315: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi sara.no, atthi ara.no.
text.3150: [03] tattha katame ruupadhaatuyaa cattaaro phassaa? cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, manodhaatusamphasso,  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso -- ime vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa cattaaro phassaa''.
text.3151: [03] tattha katamaa ruupadhaatuyaa catasso vedanaa...pe0... catasso sa~n~naa...pe0... catasso cetanaa...pe0...  cattaari cittaani? cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  imaani vuccanti ``ruupadhaatuyaa cattaari cittaani''.
text.3154: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa cattaaro khandhaa, dve aayatanaani, dve dhaatuyo, tii.ni saccaani, ekaadasindriyaani  ^a^V0.0476^ea^, a.t.tha hetuu, tayo aahaaraa, eko phasso, ekaa vedanaa, ekaa sa~n~naa, ekaa cetanaa,  eka.m citta.m.
text.3155: [03] 996^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0407^ea^ katame aruupadhaatuyaa cattaaro khandhaa? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho,  sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa cattaaro khandhaa''.
text.3156: [03] tattha katamaani aruupadhaatuyaa dve aayatanaani? manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani  vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa dve aayatanaani''.
text.3157: [03] tattha katamaa aruupadhaatuyaa dve dhaatuyo? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^T0.0548^ea^, dhammadhaatu -- imaa   vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa dve dhaatuyo''.
text.3158: [03] tattha katamaani aruupadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani? dukkhasacca.m, samudayasacca.m, maggasacca.m --  imaani vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa tii.ni saccaani''.
text.3159: [03] tattha katamaani aruupadhaatuyaa ekaadasindriyaani? manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m,  a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa ekaadasindriyaani''.
text.316: [03] tividhena ^a^M0.0042^ea^ sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto...pe0... atthi  ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0.... eva.m dasavidhena  sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3160: [03] tattha katame aruupadhaatuyaa a.t.tha hetuu? tayo kusalahetuu, dve akusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu...pe0...  ime vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa a.t.tha hetuu''.
text.3161: [03] tattha katame aruupadhaatuyaa tayo aahaaraa? phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro --  ime vuccanti ``aruupadhaatuyaa tayo aahaaraa''.
text.3162: [03] tattha katamo aruupadhaatuyaa eko phasso? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso -- aya.m vuccati  ``aruupadhaatuyaa eko phasso''.
text.3163: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0422^ea^ ^a^V0.0477^ea^ katamaa aruupadhaatuyaa ekaa vedanaa...pe0... ekaa sa~n~naa...pe0...  ekaa cetanaa...pe0... eka.m citta.m? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m vuccati ``aruupadhaatuyaa  eka.m citta.m''.
text.3166: [03] apariyaapanne cattaaro khandhaa, dve aayatanaani, dve dhaatuyo, dve saccaani, dvaadasindriyaani,  cha hetuu, tayo aahaaraa, eko ^a^P0.0408^ea^ phasso, ekaa vedanaa, ekaa sa~n~naa,  ekaa cetanaa, eka.m citta.m.
text.3167: [03] 998^b^.^eb^ tattha katame apariyaapanne cattaaro khandhaa? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho   ^a^T0.0549^ea^, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ime vuccanti ``apariyaapanne cattaaro khandhaa''.
text.3168: [03] tattha katamaani apariyaapanne dve aayatanaani? manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- imaani vuccanti  ``apariyaapanne dve aayatanaani''.
text.3169: [03] tattha katamaa apariyaapanne dve dhaatuyo? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu -- imaa vuccanti  ``apariyaapanne dve dhaatuyo''.
text.3170: [03] tattha katamaani apariyaapanne dve saccaani? maggasacca.m, nirodhasacca.m -- imaani vuccanti  ``apariyaapanne dve saccaani''.
text.3171: [03] tattha katamaani apariyaapanne dvaadasindriyaani? manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m,  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m, a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m -- imaani vuccanti  ``apariyaapanne dvaadasindriyaani''.
text.3172: [03] tattha katame apariyaapanne cha hetuu? tayo kusalahetuu, tayo abyaakatahetuu.
text.3173: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0478^ea^ katame tayo kusalahetuu? alobho kusalahetu, adoso kusalahetu, amoho  kusalahetu -- ime tayo kusalahetuu.
text.3174: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0423^ea^ katame tayo abyaakatahetuu? kusalaana.m dhammaana.m vipaakato alobho,  adoso, amoho -- ime tayo abyaakatahetuu. ime vuccanti ``apariyaapanne cha  hetuu''.
text.3175: [03] tattha katame apariyaapanne tayo aahaaraa? phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro --  ime vuccanti ``apariyaapanne tayo aahaaraa''.
text.3176: [03] tattha katamo apariyaapanne eko phasso? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso -- aya.m vuccati  ``apariyaapanne eko phasso''.
text.3177: [03] tattha ^a^T0.0550^ea^ katamaa apariyaapanne ekaa vedanaa...pe0... ekaa sa~n~naa...pe0... ekaa cetanaa...pe0...  eka.m citta.m? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^P0.0409^ea^ -- ida.m vuccati ``apariyaapanne eka.m  citta.m''.
text.3180: [03] 999^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, kati na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, kati na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa?
text.3181: [03] 1000^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho kaamadhaatupariyaapanno; cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa,  siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3182: [03] dasaayatanaa ^a^V0.0479^ea^ kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; dve aayatanaa siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa na  kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3183: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; dve dhaatuyo siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3184: [03] samudayasacca.m kaamadhaatupariyaapanna.m; dve saccaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; dukkhasacca.m  siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapanna.m, siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapanna.m.
text.3185: [03] dasindriyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; tii.nindriyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; navindriyaa  siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3186: [03] tayo akusalahetuu kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; cha hetuu siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3187: [03] kaba.liikaaro ^a^M0.0424^ea^ aahaaro kaamadhaatupariyaapanno; tayo aahaaraa siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa,  siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3188: [03] cha phassaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso ^a^T0.0551^ea^ siyaa kaamadhaatu pariyaapanno,  siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapanno.
text.3189: [03] cha vedanaa...pe0... cha sa~n~naa... cha cetanaa... cha cittaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  siyaa kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa na kaamadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.319: [03] duvidhena ^a^P0.0046^ea^ sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetu, atthi na hetu.
text.3191: [03] 1001^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, kati na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa  ^a^V0.0480^ea^ ...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, kati na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa?
text.3192: [03] 1002^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho na ruupadhaatupariyaapanno; cattaaro khandhaa ^a^P0.0410^ea^ siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa,  siyaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.

text.3194: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; dve dhaatuyo siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3195: [03] tii.ni saccaani na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; dukkhasacca.m siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapanna.m, siyaa  na ruupadhaatupariyaapanna.m.
text.3196: [03] terasindriyaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; navindriyaa siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3197: [03] tayo akusalahetuu na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; cha hetuu siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3198: [03] kaba.liikaaro aahaaro na ruupadhaatupariyaapanno; tayo aahaaraa siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa,  siyaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3199: [03] cha phassaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapanno,  siyaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapanno.
text.32: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sa~n~naa atiitaa? yaa sa~n~naa atiitaa niruddhaa vigataa vipari.nataa attha"ngataa  abbhattha"ngataa uppajjitvaa vigataa atiitaa atiita.msena sa"ngahitaa, cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa  sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa  sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa atiitaa.
text.320: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho ^a^T0.0051^ea^.
text.3200: [03] cha ^a^T0.0552^ea^ ^a^M0.0425^ea^ ^a^V0.0481^ea^ vedanaa...pe0... cha sa~n~naa... cha cetanaa... cha cittaa   na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa na ruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.

text.3203: [03] 1004^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho na aruupadhaatupariyaapanno; cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa,  siyaa na aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3204: [03] dasaayatanaa na aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; dve aayatanaa siyaa aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa na  aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3205: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa; dve dhaatuyo siyaa aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa, siyaa  na aruupadhaatupariyaapannaa.
text.3207: [03] dukkhasacca.m siyaa aruupadhaatupariyaapanna.m, siyaa na aruupadhaatupariyaapanna.m.

text.3214: [03] 1005^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m ^a^M0.0426^ea^ khandhaana.m kati pariyaapannaa, kati apariyaapannaa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati pariyaapannaa, kati apariyaapannaa?
text.3215: [03] 1006^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho pariyaapanno; cattaaro khandhaa siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa.
text.3216: [03] dasaayatanaa pariyaapannaa; dve aayatanaa siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa.

text.3222: [03] cha phassaa pariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa pariyaapanno, siyaa apariyaapanno.
text.3223: [03] cha vedanaa...pe0... cha sa~n~naa... cha cetanaa... cha cittaa pariyaapannaa; manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa.
text.3226: [03] 1007^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kati khandhaa paatubhavanti...pe0... kati cittaani  paatubhavanti?
text.3227: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m ^a^T0.0554^ea^ pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti; kassaci ekaadasaayatanaani  paatubhavanti; kassaci ^a^P0.0412^ea^ dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti; kassaci ^a^M0.0427^ea^ aparaani  dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti; kassaci navaayatanaani paatubhavanti; kassaci sattaayatanaani paatubhavanti;  kassaci ekaadasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti; kassaci dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti; kassaci  aparaa dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti; kassaci nava dhaatuyo paatubhavanti; kassaci satta dhaatuyo  paatubhavanti; sabbesa.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati; kassaci cuddasindriyaani paatubhavanti;  kassaci terasindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci aparaani terasindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci  dvaadasindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci dasindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci navindriyaani  paatubhavanti; kassaci aparaani navindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti;  kassaci aparaani a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci sattindriyaani paatubhavanti;  kassaci pa~ncindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci cattaarindriyaani paatubhavanti; kassaci  tayo hetuu paatubhavanti; kassaci dve hetuu paatubhavanti; kassaci {keci (syaa0)} ahetukaa paatubhavanti ^a^V0.0484^ea^;  sabbesa.m cattaaro aahaaraa paatubhavanti; sabbesa.m eko phasso paatubhavati; sabbesa.m  ekaa vedanaa... ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa cetanaa... eka.m citta.m paatubhavati.
text.3228: [03] 1008^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m katame pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti? ruupakkhandho...pe0...  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- kaamadhaatuyaa ^a^T0.0555^ea^ upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m ime pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti.
text.3229: [03] 1009^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa ekaadasaayatanaani paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m  devaana.m, pa.thamakappikaana.m manussaana.m, opapaatikaana.m petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m  asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m, nerayikaana.m paripu.n.naayatanaana.m upapattikkha.ne  ekaadasaayatanaani paatubhavanti -- cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m,  dhammaayatana.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani ekaadasaayatanaani paatubhavanti.
text.323: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3230: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccandhaana.m  upapattikkha.ne dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti ^a^M0.0428^ea^ -- ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m ^a^P0.0413^ea^, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m,  manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani dasaayatanaani  paatubhavanti.
text.3231: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa aparaani dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m  petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m,  jaccabadhiraana.m upapattikkha.ne dasaayatanaani paatubhavanti -- cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m,  dhammaayatana.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani dasaayatanaani ^a^T0.0556^ea^ paatubhavanti.
text.3232: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa navaayatanaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccandhabadhiraana.m  upapattikkha.ne ^a^V0.0485^ea^ navaayatanaani paatubhavanti -- ruupaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m,  rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m. kaamadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani navaayatanaani paatubhavanti.
text.3233: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa sattaayatanaani paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m  upapattikkha.ne sattaayatanaani paatubhavanti -- ruupaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m,  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani  sattaayatanaani paatubhavanti.
text.3234: [03] 1010^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa ekaadasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m  devaana.m, pa.thamakappikaana.m manussaana.m, opapaatikaana.m petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m  asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m paripu.n.naayatanaana.m upapattikkha.ne  ekaadasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, sotadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu,  jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu.  kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaa ekaadasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3235: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa ^a^M0.0429^ea^ upapattikkha.ne kassa dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m  petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m ^a^P0.0414^ea^ tiracchaanagataana.m  nerayikaana.m ^a^T0.0557^ea^, jaccandhaana.m upapattikkha.ne dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- ruupadhaatu, sotadhaatu,  ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  dhammadhaatu. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaa dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3236: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa aparaa dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccabadhiraana.m  upapattikkha.ne dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu,  jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu.  kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaa dasa dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3237: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa ^a^V0.0486^ea^ upapattikkha.ne kassa nava dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccandhabadhiraana.m  upapattikkha.ne nava dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- ruupadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu,  rasadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu. kaamadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaa nava dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3238: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa satta dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m  upapattikkha.ne satta dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- ruupadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, rasadhaatu, kaayadhaatu,  pho.t.thabbadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m  imaa satta dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3239: [03] 1011^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ^a^T0.0558^ea^ sabbesa.m katama.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati?   dukkhasacca.m -- kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m ida.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati.
text.3240: [03] 1012^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa cuddasindriyaani paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m  devaana.m, sahetukaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne cuddasindriyaani paatubhavanti --  cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m ^a^M0.0430^ea^  ^a^P0.0415^ea^, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m  vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m,  pa~n~nindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani cuddasindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3241: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa terasindriyaani paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m devaana.m  sahetukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne terasindriyaani paatubhavanti -- cakkhundriya.m,  sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m  vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa,  saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne  etesa.m imaani terasindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3242: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa aparaani terasindriyaani paatubhavanti? pa.thamakappikaana.m ^a^V0.0487^ea^   manussaana.m sahetukaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne terasindriyaani paatubhavanti --  cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m,  jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m ^a^T0.0559^ea^, viiriyindriya.m,  satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m  imaani terasindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3243: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa dvaadasindriyaani paatubhavanti? pa.thamakappikaana.m  manussaana.m sahetukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne dvaadasindriyaani paatubhavanti --  cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m,  jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m,  satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani dvaadasindriyaani  paatubhavanti.
text.3244: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa dasindriyaani paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m  sahetukaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne dasindriyaani paatubhavanti -- kaayindriya.m,  manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m  vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m,  pa~n~nindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani dasindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3245: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa ^a^P0.0416^ea^ upapattikkha.ne kassa navindriyaani paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m  sattaana.m sahetukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m upapattikkha.ne navindriyaani ^a^M0.0431^ea^ paatubhavanti --  kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m,  somanassindriya.m vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m,  samaadhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani navindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3246: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ^a^T0.0560^ea^ kassa aparaani navindriyaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m  petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m  paripu.n.naayatanaana.m upapattikkha.ne navindriyaani paatubhavanti -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m,  ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m  vaa, jiivitindriya.m ^a^V0.0488^ea^, upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani  navindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3247: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccandhaana.m  upapattikkha.ne a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti -- sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m,  kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3248: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa aparaani a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m  petaana.m, opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m,  jaccabadhiraana.m upapattikkha.ne a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti -- cakkhundriya.m, ghaanindriya.m,  jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa,  jiivitindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani a.t.thindriyaani  paatubhavanti.
text.3249: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa sattindriyaani paatubhavanti? opapaatikaana.m petaana.m,  opapaatikaana.m asuraana.m, opapaatikaana.m tiracchaanagataana.m nerayikaana.m, jaccandhabadhiraana.m ^a^T0.0561^ea^  upapattikkha.ne sattindriyaani paatubhavanti -- ghaanindriya.m ^a^P0.0417^ea^, jivhindriya.m,  kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani sattindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.325: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetu, atthi na hetu.
text.3250: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa pa~ncindriyaani paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m  ahetukaana.m, .thapetvaa napu.msakaana.m, upapattikkha.ne pa~ncindriyaani ^a^M0.0432^ea^ paatubhavanti --  kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m vaa purisindriya.m vaa, jiivitindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m imaani pa~ncindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3251: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa cattaarindriyaani paatubhavanti? gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m  ahetukaana.m, napu.msakaana.m upapattikkha.ne cattaarindriyaani paatubhavanti -- kaayindriya.m,  manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m ^a^V0.0489^ea^, upekkhindriya.m. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m  imaani cattaarindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3252: [03] 1013^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa tayo hetuu paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m devaana.m,  pa.thamakappikaana.m manussaana.m, gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m sahetukaana.m ~naa.nasampayuttaana.m  upapattikkha.ne tayo hetuu paatubhavanti -- alobho vipaakahetu, adoso vipaakahetu,  amoho vipaakahetu. kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m ime tayo hetuu paatubhavanti.
text.3253: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne kassa dve hetuu paatubhavanti? kaamaavacaraana.m devaana.m,  pa.thamakappikaana.m manussaana.m, gabbhaseyyakaana.m sattaana.m sahetukaana.m ~naa.navippayuttaana.m  upapattikkha.ne ^a^T0.0562^ea^ dve hetuu paatubhavanti -- alobho vipaakahetu, adoso vipaakahetu.  kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne etesa.m ime dve hetuu paatubhavanti. avasesaana.m sattaana.m {avasesaa sattaa  (?)} ahetukaa paatubhavanti.
text.3254: [03] 1014^b^.^eb^ kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m katame cattaaro aahaaraa paatubhavanti.  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro, vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- kaamadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m ime cattaaro aahaaraa paatubhavanti.
text.3255: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m katamo eko phasso paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso --  kaamadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m aya.m eko phasso paatubhavati.
text.3256: [03] kaamadhaatuyaa ^a^M0.0433^ea^ upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m katamaa ekaa vedanaa ^a^P0.0418^ea^...  ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa cetanaa... eka.m citta.m paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- kaamadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne sabbesa.m ida.m eka.m citta.m paatubhavati.
text.3258: [03] 1015^b^.^eb^ ruupadhaatuyaa ^a^V0.0490^ea^ upapattikkha.ne kati khandhaa paatubhavanti...pe0...   kati cittaani paatubhavanti?
text.3259: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne, .thapetvaa asa~n~nasattaana.m devaana.m, pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti,  pa~ncaayatanaani paatubhavanti, pa~nca dhaatuyo paatubhavanti, eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati, dasindriyaani  paatubhavanti, tayo hetuu paatubhavanti, tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti, eko phasso paatubhavati,  ekaa vedanaa... ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa cetanaa... eka.m citta.m paatubhavati.
text.326: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3260: [03] 1016^b^.^eb^ ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katame pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti   ^a^T0.0563^ea^? ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho   -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ime pa~ncakkhandhaa paatubhavanti.
text.3261: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaani pa~ncaayatanaani paatubhavanti? cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m,  sotaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne imaani pa~ncaayatanaani  paatubhavanti.
text.3262: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaa pa~nca dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu,  sotadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne imaa pa~nca dhaatuyo  paatubhavanti.
text.3263: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katama.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati? dukkhasacca.m -- ruupadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne ida.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati.
text.3264: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaani dasindriyaani paatubhavanti? cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m,  manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, somanassindriya.m vaa upekkhindriya.m vaa, saddhindriya.m,  viiriyindriya.m ^a^P0.0419^ea^ ^a^V0.0491^ea^, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m -- ruupadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne imaani dasindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.3265: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katame tayo hetuu paatubhavanti? alobho vipaakahetu, adoso  vipaakahetu, amoho vipaakahetu ^a^M0.0434^ea^ -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ime  tayo hetuu paatubhavanti.
text.3266: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katame tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti? phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro,  vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ime tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti.
text.3267: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamo eko phasso paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso   ^a^T0.0564^ea^ -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne aya.m eko phasso paatubhavati.
text.3268: [03] ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaa ekaa vedanaa... ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa cetanaa... eka.m  citta.m paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ida.m eka.m citta.m  paatubhavati.
text.3270: [03] 1017^b^.^eb^ asa~n~nasattaana.m devaana.m upapattikkha.ne kati khandhaa paatubhavanti...pe0... kati  cittaani paatubhavanti?
text.3271: [03] asa~n~nasattaana.m devaana.m upapattikkha.ne eko khandho paatubhavati -- ruupakkhandho; dve aayatanaani  paatubhavanti -- ruupaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m; dve dhaatuyo paatubhavanti -- ruupadhaatu, dhammadhaatu;  eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati -- dukkhasacca.m; ekindriya.m paatubhavati -- ruupajiivitindriya.m.  asa~n~nasattaa devaa ahetukaa anaahaaraa aphassakaa avedanakaa asa~n~nakaa acetanakaa  acittakaa paatubhavanti.
text.3273: [03] 1018^b^.^eb^ aruupadhaatuyaa ^a^V0.0492^ea^ upapattikkha.ne kati khandhaa paatubhavanti...pe0... kati cittaani  paatubhavanti?
text.3274: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne cattaaro khandhaa paatubhavanti, dve aayatanaani paatubhavanti,  dve dhaatuyo paatubhavanti, eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati, a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti, tayo hetuu  paatubhavanti, tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti, eko phasso paatubhavati, ekaa vedanaa...  ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa ^a^P0.0420^ea^ cetanaa... eka.m citta.m paatubhavati.
text.3275: [03] 1019^b^.^eb^ aruupadhaatuyaa ^a^T0.0565^ea^ ^a^M0.0435^ea^ upapattikkha.ne katame cattaaro khandhaa   paatubhavanti? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- aruupadhaatuyaa   upapattikkha.ne ime cattaaro khandhaa paatubhavanti.
text.3276: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaani dve aayatanaani paatubhavanti? manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m --  aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne imaani dve aayatanaani paatubhavanti.
text.3277: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaa dve dhaatuyo paatubhavanti? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu, dhammadhaatu --  aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne imaa dve dhaatuyo paatubhavanti.
text.3278: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katama.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati? dukkhasacca.m -- aruupadhaatuyaa  upapattikkha.ne ida.m eka.m sacca.m paatubhavati.
text.3279: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaani a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti? manindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m,  upekkhindriya.m, saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m --  aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne imaani a.t.thindriyaani paatubhavanti.
text.328: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi sara.no, atthi ara.no.
text.3280: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katame tayo hetuu paatubhavanti? alobho vipaakahetu, adoso ^a^V0.0493^ea^   vipaakahetu, amoho vipaakahetu -- aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ime tayo hetuu  paatubhavanti.
text.3281: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katame tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti? phassaahaaro, manosa~ncetanaahaaro,  vi~n~naa.naahaaro -- aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ime tayo aahaaraa paatubhavanti.
text.3282: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamo eko phasso paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso   ^a^T0.0566^ea^ -- aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne aya.m eko phasso paatubhavati.
text.3283: [03] aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne katamaa ekaa vedanaa...pe0... ekaa sa~n~naa... ekaa cetanaa...  eka.m citta.m paatubhavati? manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aruupadhaatuyaa upapattikkha.ne ida.m eka.m  citta.m paatubhavati.
text.3285: [03] 1020^b^.^eb^ kaamaavacaraa ^a^M0.0436^ea^ ^a^P0.0421^ea^ dhammaa, na kaamaavacaraa dhammaa, ruupaavacaraa  dhammaa, na ruupaavacaraa dhammaa, aruupaavacaraa dhammaa, na aruupaavacaraa dhammaa, pariyaapannaa dhammaa,  apariyaapannaa dhammaa.
text.3286: [03] katame dhammaa kaamaavacaraa? he.t.thato aviiciniraya.m pariyanta.m karitvaa, uparito paranimmitavasavattii  deve antokaritvaa, ya.m etasmi.m antare etthaavacaraa ettha pariyaapannaa khandhadhaatuaayatanaa;  ruupa.m, vedanaa, sa~n~naa, sa"nkhaaraa, vi~n~naa.na.m -- ime dhammaa kaamaavacaraa.
text.3287: [03] katame dhammaa na kaamaavacaraa? ruupaavacaraa, aruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa -- ime dhammaa na  kaamaavacaraa.
text.3288: [03] katame dhammaa ruupaavacaraa? he.t.thato brahmaloka.m pariyanta.m karitvaa, uparito akani.t.the deve  antokaritvaa ^a^V0.0494^ea^, ya.m etasmi.m antare etthaavacaraa ettha pariyaapannaa samaapannassa vaa upapannassa  vaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarissa vaa cittacetasikaa dhammaa -- ime dhammaa ruupaavacaraa.
text.3289: [03] katame dhammaa na ruupaavacaraa? kaamaavacaraa, aruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa -- ime dhammaa na  ruupaavacaraa.
text.329: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3290: [03] katame dhammaa aruupaavacaraa? he.t.thato aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupage ^a^T0.0567^ea^ deve pariyanta.m karitvaa, uparito  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupage deve antokaritvaa, ya.m etasmi.m antare etthaavacaraa ettha  pariyaapannaa samaapannassa vaa upapannassa vaa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarissa vaa cittacetasikaa dhammaa --  ime dhammaa aruupaavacaraa.
text.3291: [03] katame dhammaa na aruupaavacaraa? kaamaavacaraa, ruupaavacaraa, apariyaapannaa -- ime dhammaa na aruupaavacaraa.
text.3292: [03] katame dhammaa pariyaapannaa? saasavaa kusalaakusalabyaakataa dhammaa kaamaavacaraa, ruupaavacaraa,  aruupaavacaraa, ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho --  ime dhammaa pariyaapannaa.
text.3293: [03] katame dhammaa apariyaapannaa? maggaa ca, maggaphalaani ca, asa"nkhataa ca dhaatu -- ime dhammaa  apariyaapannaa.
text.3296: [03] 1021^b^.^eb^ devaati ^a^M0.0437^ea^ ^a^P0.0422^ea^. tayo devaa -- sammutidevaa  {sammatidevaa (syaa0)}, upapattidevaa, visuddhidevaa.
text.3298: [03] upapattidevaa ^a^V0.0495^ea^ naama -- caatumahaaraajike {caatummahaaraajike (sii0 syaa0)} deve upaadaaya tadupari devaa.
text.33: [03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa anaagataa? yaa sa~n~naa ajaataa abhuutaa asa~njaataa anibbattaa anabhinibbattaa  apaatubhuutaa anuppannaa ^a^T0.0007^ea^ asamuppannaa anu.t.thitaa asamu.t.thitaa anaagataa anaagata.msena sa"ngahitaa,  cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa  sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa anaagataa.
text.3300: [03] daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa kattha upapajjanti? daana.m  datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa appekacce khattiyamahaasaalaana.m sahabyata.m  upapajjanti, appekacce braahma.namahaasaalaana.m ^a^T0.0568^ea^ sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce gahapatimahaasaalaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti,  appekacce taavati.msaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce yaamaana.m devaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce tusitaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce  nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti, appekacce paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m  sahabyata.m upapajjanti.
text.3302: [03] 1022^b^.^eb^ manussaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? vassasata.m, appa.m vaa bhiyyo  {appa.m vaa bhiyyo vaa (syaa0 ka0) dii0 ni0 2.7}.
text.3303: [03] 1023^b^.^eb^ caatumahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? yaani maanusakaani  pa~n~naasa vassaani, caatummahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo {rattidivo (ka0) a0  ni0  3.71}. taaya rattiyaa ti.msa rattiyo maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo.   tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani pa~nca vassasataani caatummahaaraajikaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m.   manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m hoti? navuti vassasatasahassaani.
text.3304: [03] taavati.msaana.m ^a^M0.0438^ea^ devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? ya.m maanusaka.m vassasata.m,  taavati.msaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msa rattiyo maaso.  tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibba.m vassasahassa.m taavati.msaana.m  devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m hoti? tisso ca vassako.tiyo  sa.t.thi ca vassasatasahassaani.
text.3305: [03] yaamaana.m ^a^V0.0496^ea^ devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? yaani maanusakaani dve vassasataani,  yaamaana.m devaana.m eso eko ^a^P0.0423^ea^ rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo  maaso ^a^T0.0569^ea^. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani dve vassasahassaani  yaamaana.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m hoti? cuddasa~nca  vassako.tiyo cattaariisa~nca vassasatasahassaani.
text.3306: [03] tusitaana.m devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? yaani maanusakaani cattaari vassasataani,  tusitaana.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso. tena  maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani cattaari vassasahassaani tusitaana.m  devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m hoti? sattapa~n~naasa vassako.tiyo  sa.t.thi ca vassasatasahassaani.
text.3307: [03] nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? yaani maanusakaani a.t.tha vassasataani,  nimmaanaratiina.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo maaso.  tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani a.t.tha vassasahassaani nimmaanaratiina.m  devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m hoti? dve vassako.tisataani  ti.msa~nca vassako.tiyo cattaariisa~nca vassasatasahassaani.
text.3308: [03] paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m kittaka.m aayuppamaa.na.m? yaani maanusakaani so.lasa  vassasataani, paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m eso eko rattindivo. taaya rattiyaa ti.msarattiyo  maaso. tena maasena dvaadasamaasiyo sa.mvaccharo. tena sa.mvaccharena dibbaani so.lasa vassasahassaani  paranimmitavasavattiina.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m. manussaana.m ga.nanaaya kittaka.m   ^a^T0.0570^ea^ ^a^M0.0439^ea^ hoti? nava ca vassako.tisataani ekaviisa~nca vassako.tiyo sa.t.thi   ca vassasatasahassaaniiti.
text.3313: [03] 1024^b^.^eb^ pa.thama.m ^a^P0.0424^ea^ jhaana.m paritta.m bhaavetvaa kattha upapajjanti? pa.thama.m jhaana.m  paritta.m bhaavetvaa brahmapaarisajjaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjanti. tesa.m kittaka.m  aayuppamaa.na.m? kappassa tatiyo bhaago.

text.3342: [03] 1030^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati abhi~n~neyyaa, kati pari~n~neyyaa, kati pahaatabbaa, kati  bhaavetabbaa, kati sacchikaatabbaa, kati na pahaatabbaa, na bhaavetabbaa, na sacchikaatabbaa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati abhi~n~neyyaa, kati pari~n~neyyaa, kati pahaatabbaa, kati  bhaavetabbaa, kati sacchikaatabbaa, kati na pahaatabbaa na bhaavetabbaa na sacchikaatabbaa?

text.3346: [03] samudayasacca.m abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m pahaatabba.m na ^a^T0.0574^ea^ bhaavetabba.m na sacchikaatabba.m.  maggasacca.m abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m na pahaatabba.m bhaavetabba.m na sacchikaatabba.m ^a^P0.0427^ea^.  nirodhasacca.m abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m na pahaatabba.m na bhaavetabba.m sacchikaatabba.m.  dukkhasacca.m abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m, siyaa pahaatabba.m, na bhaavetabba.m, na sacchikaatabba.m,  siyaa na pahaatabba.m.
text.3347: [03] navindriyaa abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa na pahaatabbaa na bhaavetabbaa na sacchikaatabbaa. domanassindriya.m  abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m pahaatabba.m na bhaavetabba.m na sacchikaatabba.m. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m  abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m na pahaatabba.m bhaavetabba.m na sacchikaatabba.m. a~n~nindriya.m  abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m na pahaatabba.m, siyaa bhaavetabba.m, siyaa sacchikaatabba.m. a~n~naataavindriya.m  abhi~n~neyya.m pari~n~neyya.m na pahaatabba.m na bhaavetabba.m sacchikaatabba.m. tii.nindriyaa abhi~n~neyyaa  pari~n~neyyaa na pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavetabbaa, siyaa sacchikaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavetabbaa,  sacchikaatabbaa. cha indriyaa abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa, siyaa pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavetabbaa,  siyaa sacchikaatabbaa, siyaa na pahaatabbaa na bhaavetabbaa na sacchikaatabbaa.
text.3348: [03] tayo akusalahetuu abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa pahaatabbaa na bhaavetabbaa na sacchikaatabbaa.  tayo kusalahetuu abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa na pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavetabbaa, na sacchikaatabbaa,  siyaa na bhaavetabbaa. tayo abyaakatahetuu abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa na pahaatabbaa na  bhaavetabbaa, siyaa sacchikaatabbaa ^a^T0.0575^ea^, siyaa na sacchikaatabbaa.
text.3349: [03] kaba.liikaaro ^a^M0.0443^ea^ ^a^V0.0501^ea^ aahaaro abhi~n~neyyo pari~n~neyyo na pahaatabbo na bhaavetabbo na  sacchikaatabbo. tayo aahaaraa abhi~n~neyyaa pari~n~neyyaa, siyaa pahaatabbaa, siyaa  bhaavetabbaa, siyaa sacchikaatabbaa, siyaa na pahaatabbaa na bhaavetabbaa na sacchikaatabbaa.
text.335: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko.
