text.3367: [03] 1036^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati di.t.thaa, kati sutaa, kati mutaa, kati vi~n~naataa, kati  na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa na vi~n~naataa...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati ^a^M0.0445^ea^  di.t.thaa, kati sutaa, kati mutaa, kati vi~n~naataa, kati na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa na  vi~n~naataa?
text.3368: [03] 1037^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho siyaa di.t.tho, siyaa suto, siyaa muto, siyaa vi~n~naato, siyaa  na di.t.tho na suto na muto, vi~n~naato. cattaaro khandhaa na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa.
text.3369: [03] ruupaayatana.m di.t.tha.m, na suta.m na muta.m, vi~n~naata.m. saddaayatana.m na di.t.tha.m, suta.m, na muta.m,  vi~n~naata.m. gandhaayatana.m... rasaayatana.m... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m na di.t.tha.m na suta.m, muta.m,  vi~n~naata.m. sattaayatanaa na di.t.thaa na sutaa na ^a^T0.0578^ea^ mutaa, vi~n~naataa.
text.3370: [03] ruupadhaatu di.t.thaa, na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa. saddadhaatu na di.t.thaa, sutaa, na mutaa, vi~n~naataa.  gandhadhaatu... rasadhaatu... pho.t.thabbadhaatu na di.t.thaa na sutaa, mutaa, vi~n~naataa. terasa  dhaatuyo na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa.
text.3371: [03] tii.ni saccaani na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa di.t.tha.m, siyaa  suta.m, siyaa muta.m, siyaa vi~n~naata.m, siyaa na di.t.tha.m na suta.m na muta.m, vi~n~naata.m.
text.3372: [03] baaviisatindriyaa na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa. nava hetuu na di.t.thaa na sutaa na  mutaa, vi~n~naataa. cattaaro aahaaraa na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa. satta ^a^P0.0430^ea^  phassaa ^a^V0.0504^ea^ na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa. satta vedanaa... satta sa~n~naa...  satta cetanaa... satta cittaa na di.t.thaa na sutaa na mutaa, vi~n~naataa.
text.3375: [03] 1038^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa?
text.3376: [03] ruupakkhandho abyaakato. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa.  dasaayatanaa abyaakataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo ^a^M0.0446^ea^ abyaakataa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa,  siyaa abyaakataa. samudayasacca.m akusala.m. maggasacca.m kusala.m. nirodhasacca.m abyaakata.m.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa kusala.m, siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m.
text.3377: [03] dasindriyaa ^a^T0.0579^ea^ abyaakataa. domanassindriya.m akusala.m. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m kusala.m.  cattaarindriyaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. cha indriyaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa,  siyaa abyaakataa.
text.3378: [03] tayo kusalahetuu kusalaa. tayo akusalahetuu akusalaa. tayo abyaakatahetuu  abyaakataa. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro abyaakato. tayo aahaaraa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa  akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. cha phassaa abyaakataa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso  siyaa kusalo, siyaa akusalo, siyaa abyaakato. cha vedanaa... cha sa~n~naa... cha cetanaa...  cha cittaa abyaakataa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa  abyaakataa.
text.338: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetusampayutto, atthi hetuvippayutto.
text.3380: [03] 1039^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m ^a^V0.0505^ea^ khandhaana.m kati sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, kati dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  kati adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa, kati dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, kati adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa?
text.3381: [03] dve khandhaa na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi. tayo khandhaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.
text.3382: [03] dasaayatanaa ^a^P0.0431^ea^ na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaatipi, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi. manaayatana.m siyaa   ^a^T0.0580^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa   adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa   dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m sukhaaya   vedanaaya ^a^M0.0447^ea^ sampayuttantipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya   sampayuttantipi.
text.3383: [03] dasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi. pa~nca dhaatuyo adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa  na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi.
text.3384: [03] dve ^a^V0.0506^ea^ saccaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.  nirodhasacca.m na vattabba.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ^a^T0.0581^ea^ sampayutta.m, siyaa  na vattabba.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi, adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttantipi.
text.3385: [03] dvaadasindriyaa na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi. cha indriyaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. tii.nindriyaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa ^a^P0.0432^ea^, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.  jiivitindriya.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m,  siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi,  dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttantipi.
text.3386: [03] doso ^a^M0.0448^ea^ akusalahetu dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto. satta hetuu siyaa sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. moho akusalahetu  siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, siyaa dukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto.
text.3387: [03] kaba.liikaaro aahaaro na vattabbo sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttoti pi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttotipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttotipi. tayo aahaaraa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.
text.3388: [03] pa~nca phassaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa   ^a^T0.0582^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto.   manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa ^a^V0.0507^ea^ sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, siyaa dukkhaaya   vedanaaya sampayutto, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto.
text.3389: [03] satta vedanaa na vattabbaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi, dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi,  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaatipi. pa~nca sa~n~naa... pa~nca cetanaa... pa~nca cittaa  adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa.
text.339: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi vipaako, atthi vipaakadhammadhammo, atthi nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3391: [03] 1040^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati vipaakaa, kati vipaakadhammadhammaa, kati nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati vipaakaa, kati vipaakadhammadhammaa, kati nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa?
text.3392: [03] ruupakkhandho nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa,  siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.3393: [03] dasaayatanaa ^a^M0.0449^ea^ ^a^P0.0433^ea^ nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa vipaakaa,  siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.3394: [03] dasa dhaatuyo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. pa~nca dhaatuyo vipaakaa. manodhaatu siyaa  vipaakaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa vipaakaa siyaa  vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.3395: [03] dve ^a^T0.0583^ea^ saccaa vipaakadhammadhammaa. nirodhasacca.m nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa vipaaka.m, siyaa vipaakadhammadhamma.m, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m.
text.3396: [03] sattindriyaa ^a^V0.0508^ea^ nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. tii.nindriyaa vipaakaa. dvindriyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa.  a~n~nindriya.m siyaa vipaaka.m, siyaa vipaakadhammadhamma.m. navindriyaa siyaa vipaakaa,  siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.3397: [03] cha hetuu vipaakadhammadhammaa. tayo abyaakatahetuu siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.3398: [03] kaba.liikaaro aahaaro nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo. tayo aahaaraa siyaa vipaakaa,  siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. pa~nca phassaa vipaakaa.  manodhaatusamphasso siyaa vipaako, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso  siyaa vipaako, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammo, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo. pa~nca  vedanaa... pa~nca sa~n~naa... pa~nca cetanaa... pa~nca cittaa vipaakaa. manodhaatu siyaa  vipaakaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa vipaakaa,  siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.34: [03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa paccuppannaa? yaa sa~n~naa jaataa bhuutaa sa~njaataa nibbattaa abhinibbattaa  paatubhuutaa uppannaa samuppannaa u.t.thitaa samu.t.thitaa paccuppannaa paccuppanna.msena sa"ngahitaa,  cakkhusamphassajaa sa~n~naa sotasamphassajaa sa~n~naa ghaanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa jivhaasamphassajaa  sa~n~naa kaayasamphassajaa sa~n~naa manosamphassajaa sa~n~naa -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa paccuppannaa.
text.3400: [03] 1041^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, kati anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  kati anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati upaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  kati anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, kati anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa?
text.3401: [03] ruupakkhandho ^a^M0.0450^ea^ siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyo, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^T0.0058^ea^4.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa  anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.3402: [03] pa~ncaayatanaa ^a^P0.0434^ea^ upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. saddaayatana.m anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m.  cattaaro aayatanaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.3403: [03] dasa ^a^V0.0509^ea^ dhaatuyo upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. saddadhaatu anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. pa~nca dhaatuyo  siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.3404: [03] samudayasacca.m anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. dve saccaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m.
text.3405: [03] navindriyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. domanassindriya.m anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. tii.nindriyaa  anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. navindriyaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. tayo akusalahetuu anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. tayo  kusalahetuu siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. tayo  abyaakatahetuu siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa  anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.3406: [03] kaba.liikaaro aahaaro siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyo, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyo. tayo  aahaaraa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa   anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa ^a^T0.0585^ea^.
text.3407: [03] pa~nca phassaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. manodhaatusamphasso siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyo,  siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyo. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyo,  siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyo, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo. pa~nca vedanaa... pa~nca  sa~n~naa... pa~nca cetanaa... pa~nca cittaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. manodhaatu siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa  anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.3409: [03] 1042^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m ^a^M0.0451^ea^ khandhaana.m kati savitakkasavicaaraa, kati avitakkavicaaramattaa,  kati ^a^V0.0510^ea^ avitakkaavicaaraa...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati savitakkasavicaaraa, kati  avitakkavicaaramattaa, kati avitakkaavicaaraa?
text.341: [03] duvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetu ceva sahetuko ca, atthi sahetuko ceva na  ca hetu.
text.3410: [03] ruupakkhandho avitakkaavicaaro. tayo khandhaa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa savitakkasavicaaro, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatto,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaro siyaa na vattabbo savitakkasavicaarotipi ^a^P0.0435^ea^, avitakkavicaaramattotipi,  avitakkaavicaarotipi.
text.3411: [03] dasaayatanaa avitakkaavicaaraa. manaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m, siyaa na vattabba.m savitakkasavicaarantipi, avitakkavicaaramattantipi,  avitakkaavicaarantipi.
text.3412: [03] pannarasa dhaatuyo avitakkaavicaaraa. manodhaatu ^a^T0.0586^ea^ savitakkasavicaaraa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.  dhammadhaatu siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa,  siyaa na vattabbaa savitakkasavicaaraatipi, avitakkavicaaramattaatipi, avitakkaavicaaraatipi.
text.3413: [03] samudayasacca.m savitakkasavicaara.m. nirodhasacca.m avitakkaavicaara.m. maggasacca.m siyaa  savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m, siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m, siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m, siyaa  na vattabba.m savitakkasavicaarantipi, avitakkavicaaramattantipi, avitakkaavicaarantipi.
text.3414: [03] navindriyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. domanassindriya.m savitakkasavicaara.m. upekkhindriya.m  siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. ekaadasindriyaa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa,  siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.
text.3415: [03] tayo ^a^M0.0452^ea^ ^a^V0.0511^ea^ akusalahetuu savitakkasavicaaraa. cha hetuu siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa,  siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro avitakkaavicaaro.  tayo aahaaraa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.  pa~nca phassaa avitakkaavicaaraa. manodhaatusamphasso savitakkasavicaaro. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso  siyaa savitakkasavicaaro, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatto, siyaa avitakkaavicaaro. pa~nca  vedanaa... pa~nca sa~n~naa... pa~nca cetanaa... pa~nca cittaa avitakkaavicaaraa manodhaatu  savitakkasavicaaraa ^a^T0.0587^ea^, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.
text.3417: [03] 1043^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati ruupaa, kati aruupaa...pe0... sattanna.m cittaana.m kati  ruupaa, kati aruupaa?
text.3418: [03] ruupakkhandho ruupa.m. cattaaro khandhaa aruupaa. dasaayatanaa ^a^P0.0436^ea^ ruupaa. manaayatana.m  aruupa.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m. dasa dhaatuyo ruupaa. satta dhaatuyo aruupaa.  dhammadhaatu siyaa ruupaa, siyaa aruupaa. tii.ni saccaani aruupaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa  ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m. sattindriyaa ruupaa. cuddasindriyaa aruupaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa  ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m. nava hetuu aruupaa. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ruupa.m. tayo aahaaraa aruupaa.  satta phassaa aruupaa. satta vedanaa... satta sa~n~naa... satta cetanaa satta cittaa aruupaa.
text.342: [03] tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi upaadinnupaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniyo,  atthi anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo...pe0.... eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.3420: [03] 1044^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati lokiyaa, kati lokuttaraa? dvaadasanna.m aayatanaana.m  kati lokiyaa, kati lokuttaraa? a.t.thaarasanna.m dhaatuuna.m kati lokiyaa, kati  lokuttaraa? catunna.m saccaana.m kati lokiyaa, kati lokuttaraa...pe0...  sattanna.m cittaana.m kati lokiyaa, kati lokuttaraa?
text.3421: [03] ruupakkhandho lokiyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa. dasaayatanaa  lokiyaa ^a^V0.0512^ea^. dve aayatanaa siyaa lokiyaa ^a^M0.0453^ea^, siyaa lokuttaraa. so.lasa  dhaatuyo lokiyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa. dve saccaa  lokiyaa. dve saccaa lokuttaraa.
text.3422: [03] dasindriyaa lokiyaa. tii.nindriyaa lokuttaraa. navindriyaa siyaa lokiyaa,  siyaa lokuttaraa. tayo akusalahetuu lokiyaa. cha hetuu siyaa lokiyaa,  siyaa lokuttaraa. kaba.liikaaro aahaaro lokiyo. tayo aahaaraa siyaa lokiyaa,  siyaa lokuttaraa ^a^T0.0588^ea^. cha phassaa lokiyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphasso siyaa lokiyo,  siyaa lokuttaro. cha vedanaa lokiyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa siyaa  lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa. cha sa~n~naa lokiyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa sa~n~naa  siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa. cha cetanaa lokiyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa  cetanaa siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa. cha cittaa lokiyaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraati.

text.37: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0006^ea^ katamaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa sukhumaa? pa.tighasamphassajaa sa~n~naa  o.laarikaa, adhivacanasamphassajaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. akusalaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa,  kusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, abyaakataa  sa~n~naa sukhumaa. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya  ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa  o.laarikaa ^a^T0.0008^ea^, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa  o.laarikaa, samaapannassa sa~n~naa sukhumaa. saasavaa sa~n~naa o.laarikaa, anaasavaa  sa~n~naa sukhumaa. ta.m ta.m vaa pana sa~n~na.m upaadaayupaadaaya sa~n~naa o.laarikaa sukhumaa  da.t.thabbaa.

text.39: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sa~n~naa duure? akusalaa sa~n~naa kusalaabyaakataahi sa~n~naahi duure;  kusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa akusalaaya sa~n~naaya ^a^M0.0007^ea^ duure; kusalaa sa~n~naa akusalaabyaakataahi  sa~n~naahi duure; akusalaabyaakataa sa~n~naa kusalaaya sa~n~naaya duure. abyaakataa sa~n~naa kusalaakusalaahi  sa~n~naahi duure; kusalaakusalaa sa~n~naa abyaakataaya sa~n~naaya duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  sa~n~naa sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^T0.0009^ea^ ca vedanaahi sampayuttaahi sa~n~naahi duure; sukhaaya ca  adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya ^a^V0.0008^ea^ sa~n~naaya duure;  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaahi  sa~n~naahi duure; dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya duure; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi  sampayuttaahi sa~n~naahi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa~n~naa adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya duure. asamaapannassa sa~n~naa samaapannassa sa~n~naaya duure; samaapannassa  ^a^P0.0007^ea^ sa~n~naa asamaapannassa sa~n~naaya duure. saasavaa sa~n~naa anaasavaaya sa~n~naaya duure;  anaasavaa sa~n~naa saasavaaya sa~n~naaya duure -- aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa duure.

text.395: [03] sattavidhena ^a^M0.0047^ea^ ^a^P0.0052^ea^ sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi  abyaakato; atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno.  eva.m sattavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.396: [03] aparopi sattavidhena ^a^T0.0056^ea^ sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto; atthi kaamaavacaro,  atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no,  atthi bahiddhaaramma.no atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no; atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro,  atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno. eva.m sattavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.397: [03] catuviisatividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kusalo,  atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... manosamphassapaccayaa  sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato; cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa...pe0...  manosamphassajaa cetanaa. eva.m catuviisatividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.398: [03] aparopi ^a^V0.0054^ea^ catuviisatividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no;  cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa...pe0... manosamphassajaa cetanaa; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto...pe0... atthi  ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no; cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa,  sotasamphassajaa cetanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa,  kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa, manosamphassajaa cetanaa. eva.m catuviisatividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.399: [03] ti.msatividhena ^a^T0.0057^ea^ sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi  ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno ^a^M0.0048^ea^; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa ^a^P0.0053^ea^ ...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno; cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa...pe0... manosamphassajaa cetanaa.  eva.m ti.msatividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.40: [03] tattha katamaa sa~n~naa santike? akusalaa sa~n~naa akusalaaya sa~n~naaya santike; kusalaa  sa~n~naa kusalaaya sa~n~naaya santike; abyaakataa sa~n~naa abyaakataaya sa~n~naaya santike.  dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike;  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike; adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa~n~naa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaaya sa~n~naaya santike. asamaapannassa  sa~n~naa asamaapannassa sa~n~naaya santike; samaapannassa sa~n~naa samaapannassa sa~n~naaya santike.  saasavaa sa~n~naa ^a^T0.0010^ea^ saasavaaya sa~n~naaya santike; anaasavaa sa~n~naa anaasavaaya sa~n~naaya santike.  aya.m vuccati sa~n~naa santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana sa~n~na.m upaadaayupaadaaya sa~n~naa duure santike  da.t.thabbaa.
text.400: [03] bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi  akusalo, atthi abyaakato, atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... manosamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi  akusalo, atthi abyaakato, atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno; cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa, sotasamphassajaa cetanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  cetanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa, kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa, manosamphassajaa  cetanaa. eva.m bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.401: [03] aparopi bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutto...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no,  atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi ^a^T0.0058^ea^ aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa sa"nkhaarakkhandho atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto ^a^V0.0055^ea^ ...pe0... atthi  ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no, atthi kaamaavacaro,  atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno; cakkhusamphassajaa cetanaa,  sotasamphassajaa cetanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa cetanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa cetanaa,  kaayasamphassajaa cetanaa, manosamphassajaa cetanaa. eva.m bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho.

text.410: [03] sattavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. eva.m sattavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.411: [03] a.t.thavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m atthi sukhasahagata.m, atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  ^a^T0.0059^ea^. eva.m a.t.thavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.412: [03] navavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu atthi kusala.m, atthi akusala.m, atthi  abyaakata.m. eva.m navavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.413: [03] dasavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m atthi sukhasahagata.m,  atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu atthi kusala.m, atthi akusala.m,  atthi abyaakata.m. eva.m dasavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.415: [03] duvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko.
text.416: [03] tividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi dukkhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutto, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto. atthi ^a^P0.0055^ea^ vipaako,  atthi vipaakadhammadhammo, atthi nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo. atthi upaadinnupaadaaniyo,  atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo. atthi sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko,  atthi asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko, atthi asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesiko. atthi savitakkasavicaaro,  atthi avitakkavicaaramatto ^a^V0.0057^ea^, atthi avitakkaavicaaro. atthi piitisahagato, atthi sukhasahagato,  atthi upekkhaasahagato. atthi dassanena pahaatabbo, atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo, atthi neva  dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo. atthi ^a^T0.0060^ea^ dassanena pahaatabbahetuko, atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko,  atthi neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. atthi aacayagaamii, atthi apacayagaamii,  atthi nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii. atthi sekkho, atthi asekkho, atthi nevasekkhanaasekkho.  atthi paritto, atthi mahaggato, atthi appamaa.no. atthi parittaaramma.no, atthi mahaggataaramma.no,  atthi appamaa.naaramma.no. atthi hiino, atthi majjhimo, atthi pa.niito. atthi micchattaniyato,  atthi sammattaniyato, atthi aniyato. atthi maggaaramma.no, atthi maggahetuko, atthi  maggaadhipati. atthi uppanno, atthi anuppanno, atthi uppaadii. atthi atiito, atthi  anaagato, atthi paccuppanno. atthi atiitaaramma.no, atthi anaagataaramma.no, atthi paccuppannaaramma.no.  atthi ajjhatto, atthi bahiddho, atthi ajjhattabahiddho. atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no,  atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0.... eva.m dasavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.418: [03] duvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi hetusampayutto, atthi hetuvippayutto. atthi  na hetu sahetuko, atthi na hetu ahetuko. atthi lokiyo, atthi lokuttaro.  atthi kenaci vi~n~neyyo, atthi kenaci na vi~n~neyyo. atthi saasavo, atthi anaasavo.  atthi aasavasampayutto ^a^M0.0051^ea^, atthi aasavavippayutto. atthi aasavavippayuttasaasavo,  atthi aasavavippayuttaanaasavo. atthi sa.myojaniyo, atthi asa.myojaniyo. atthi sa.myojanasampayutto  ^a^T0.0061^ea^, atthi sa.myojanavippayutto. atthi sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyo, atthi sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyo.
text.419: [03] atthi ganthaniyo, atthi aganthaniyo. atthi ganthasampayutto, atthi ganthavippayutto. atthi  ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo, atthi ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyo. atthi oghaniyo, atthi anoghaniyo.  atthi oghasampayutto, atthi oghavippayutto. atthi oghavippayuttaoghaniyo, atthi  oghavippayuttaanoghaniyo. atthi yoganiyo, atthi ayoganiyo. atthi yogasampayutto,  atthi yogavippayutto ^a^V0.0058^ea^. atthi yogavippayuttayoganiyo, atthi yogavippayuttaayoganiyo.  atthi niivara.niyo, atthi aniivara.niyo. atthi niivara.nasampayutto, atthi niivara.navippayutto.  atthi niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyo, atthi niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyo.
text.42: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo sa"nkhaarakkhandho? ye keci sa"nkhaaraa atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaa ajjhattaa  vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarikaa vaa sukhumaa vaa hiinaa ^a^M0.0008^ea^ vaa pa.niitaa vaa ye duure  santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati sa"nkhaarakkhandho.
text.420: [03] atthi ^a^P0.0056^ea^ paraama.t.tho, atthi aparaama.t.tho. atthi paraamaasasampayutto, atthi paraamaasavippayutto.  atthi paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.tho, atthi paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.tho. atthi upaadinno,  atthi anupaadinno. atthi upaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadaaniyo. atthi upaadaanasampayutto,  atthi upaadaanavippayutto. atthi upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyo, atthi upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyo.  atthi sa.mkilesiko, atthi asa.mkilesiko. atthi sa.mkili.t.tho, atthi asa.mkili.t.tho.  atthi kilesasampayutto, atthi kilesavippayutto. atthi kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesiko,  atthi kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesiko. atthi dassanena pahaatabbo, atthi na dassanena  pahaatabbo. atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo ^a^T0.0062^ea^, atthi na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo. atthi dassanena  pahaatabbahetuko, atthi na dassanena pahaatabbahetuko. atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko,  atthi na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko.
text.421: [03] atthi savitakko, atthi avitakko. atthi savicaaro, atthi avicaaro. atthi sappiitiko,  atthi appiitiko. atthi piitisahagato, atthi na piitisahagato. atthi sukhasahagato, atthi  na sukhasahagato. atthi upekkhaasahagato, atthi na upekkhaasahagato. atthi kaamaavacaro ^a^M0.0052^ea^,  atthi na kaamaavacaro. atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi na ruupaavacaro. atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi  na aruupaavacaro, atthi pariyaapanno, atthi apariyaapanno. atthi niyyaaniko, atthi aniyyaaniko.  atthi niyato, atthi aniyato. atthi sauttaro, atthi anuttaro. atthi sara.no, atthi  ara.no.

text.5: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ -- ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho,  sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.50: [03] 25^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa"nkhaaraa duure? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa kusalaabyaakatehi sa"nkhaarehi  duure; kusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa akusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; kusalaa sa"nkhaaraa akusalaabyaakatehi  sa"nkhaarehi duure; akusalaabyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa kusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; abyaakataa  ^a^P0.0009^ea^ sa"nkhaaraa kusalaakusalehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; kusalaakusalaa sa"nkhaaraa abyaakatehi  sa"nkhaarehi duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca  vedanaahi sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa  sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa  sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; dukkhaaya  ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi  duure; adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^M0.0010^ea^ vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi  sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttehi sa"nkhaarehi duure ^a^T0.0013^ea^. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa samaapannassa sa"nkhaarehi duure;  samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa asamaapannassa sa"nkhaarehi duure. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa anaasavehi sa"nkhaarehi  duure; anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa saasavehi sa"nkhaarehi duure. ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa duure.
text.501: [03] duvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi niivara.niyo, atthi aniivara.niyo.
text.502: [03] tividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0....  eva.m dasavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.504: [03] sattavidhena ^a^P0.0060^ea^ vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato,  atthi ^a^V0.0066^ea^ kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno. eva.m  sattavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.505: [03] aparopi sattavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi kaamaavacaro,  atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no,  atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no, atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro,  atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno. eva.m sattavidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.506: [03] catuviisatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kusalo,  atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... manosamphassapaccayaa  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m,  sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^M0.0058^ea^, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m.  eva.m catuviisatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho ^a^T0.0069^ea^.
text.507: [03] aparopi catuviisatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutto...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no;  cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi  ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m. eva.m catuviisatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.508: [03] ti.msatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kaamaavacaro,  atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno; sotasamphassapaccayaa ^a^V0.0067^ea^ ...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P0.0061^ea^, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m,  jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m. eva.m ti.msatividhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.509: [03] bahuvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi  akusalo, atthi abyaakato, atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... manovi~n~naa.na.m; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa ^a^T0.0070^ea^ ...pe0... kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  manosamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato,  atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  manovi~n~naa.na.m. eva.m bahuvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.51: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0011^ea^ katame sa"nkhaaraa santike? akusalaa sa"nkhaaraa akusalaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike;  kusalaa sa"nkhaaraa kusalaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; abyaakataa sa"nkhaaraa abyaakataana.m  sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaana.m  sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaana.m  sa"nkhaaraana.m santike; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa sa"nkhaaraa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa asamaapannassa sa"nkhaaraana.m santike;  samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraa samaapannassa sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. saasavaa sa"nkhaaraa saasavaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m  santike; anaasavaa sa"nkhaaraa anaasavaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m santike. ime vuccanti sa"nkhaaraa  santike. te te vaa pana sa"nkhaare upaadaayupaadaaya sa"nkhaaraa duure santike da.t.thabbaa.
text.510: [03] aparopi ^a^M0.0059^ea^ bahuvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutto...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no,  atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no, atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno; sotasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... ghaanasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... jivhaasamphassapaccayaa...pe0...  kaayasamphassapaccayaa...pe0... manosamphassapaccayaa vi~n~naa.nakkhandho atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutto...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no,  atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro, atthi apariyaapanno; cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m,  sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m.  eva.m bahuvidhena vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.514: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^V0.0068^ea^ -- ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.515: [03] 151^b^.^eb^ pa~ncanna.m khandhaana.m kati kusalaa, kati ^a^T0.0071^ea^ akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.517: [03] 152^b^.^eb^ ruupakkhandho ^a^P0.0062^ea^ abyaakato. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa  akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. dve khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi,  ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi.  tayo khandhaa siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa,  siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. ruupakkhandho nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.  ruupakkhandho siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyo, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyo ^a^M0.0060^ea^.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa  anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.518: [03] ruupakkhandho asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. ruupakkhandho  avitakkaavicaaro. tayo khandhaa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa savitakkasavicaaro, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatto,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaro, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``savitakkasavicaaro''tipi, ``avitakkavicaaramatto''tipi,  ``avitakkaavicaaro''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``piitisahagato''tipi, ``sukhasahagato''tipi,  ``upekkhaasahagato''tipi. vedanaakkhandho siyaa piitisahagato na sukhasahagato na upekkhaasahagato,  siyaa na vattabbo -- ``piitisahagato''ti. tayo ^a^V0.0069^ea^ khandhaa siyaa  ^a^T0.0072^ea^ piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na vattabbaa --   ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi, ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.
text.519: [03] ruupakkhandho neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho  neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  ruupakkhandho nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa apacayagaamino,  siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. ruupakkhandho nevasekkhanaasekkho. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa, siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. ruupakkhandho paritto.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa, siyaa appamaa.naa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa, siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi ^a^P0.0063^ea^, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi,  ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi. ruupakkhandho majjhimo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa hiinaa, siyaa  majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa. ruupakkhandho aniyato ^a^M0.0061^ea^. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa micchattaniyataa,  siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa.
text.520: [03] ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa,  siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi  ^a^T0.0073^ea^, ``maggaadhipatino''tipi; siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino; siyaa  atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa anaagataaramma.naa, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa, siyaa na  vattabbaa -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi;  siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. ruupakkhandho anaaramma.no. cattaaro  khandhaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi, ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi.  cattaaro khandhaa anidassanaappa.tighaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sanidassanasappa.tigho, siyaa  anidassanasappa.tigho, siyaa anidassanaappa.tigho.
text.522: [03] 153^b^.^eb^ cattaaro ^a^V0.0070^ea^ khandhaa na hetuu. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa hetu, siyaa na hetu. ruupakkhandho  ahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. ruupakkhandho hetuvippayutto.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``hetu ceva sahetuko caa''tipi, ``sahetuko ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. tayo  khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva sahetukaa caa''ti, siyaa sahetukaa ceva na ca  hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  hetu ceva sahetuko ca, siyaa ^a^T0.0074^ea^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``hetu  ceva sahetuko caa''tipi, ``sahetuko ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``hetu ceva hetusampayutto caa''tipi, ``hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetuu''tipi.  tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho  siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, siyaa hetusampayutto ceva na ^a^M0.0062^ea^ ca hetu,  siyaa na vattabbo -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutto caa''tipi, ``hetusampayutto ceva  na ca hetuu''tipi. ruupakkhandho na hetu ahetuko ^a^P0.0064^ea^. tayo khandhaa siyaa  na hetuu sahetukaa, siyaa na hetuu ahetukaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa na hetu sahetuko,  siyaa na hetu ahetuko, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``na hetu sahetuko''tipi, ``na  hetu ahetuko''tipi.
text.524: [03] cattaaro khandhaa anidassanaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sanidassano, siyaa anidassano. cattaaro  khandhaa appa.tighaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa sappa.tigho, siyaa appa.tigho. ruupakkhandho ruupa.m.  cattaaro khandhaa aruupaa. ruupakkhandho lokiyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa lokiyaa,  siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.525: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no aasavaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa aasavo, siyaa no aasavo. ruupakkhandho  saasavo. cattaaro khandhaa ^a^T0.0075^ea^ siyaa saasavaa, siyaa anaasavaa. ruupakkhandho aasavavippayutto.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho ^a^V0.0071^ea^ na vattabbo --  ``aasavo ceva saasavo caa''ti, saasavo ceva no ca aasavo. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa --  ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, siyaa saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa aasavo ceva saasavo ca,  siyaa saasavo ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva saasavo caa''tipi,  ``saasavo ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto  caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa --  ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto ca, siyaa aasavasampayutto ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na  vattabbo -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayutto ceva no  ca aasavo''tipi. ruupakkhandho aasavavippayuttasaasavo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa,  siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa, siyaa ^a^M0.0063^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi,  ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.
text.526: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no sa.myojanaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa no sa.myojana.m.  ruupakkhandho sa.myojaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa ^a^T0.0076^ea^ siyaa sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa.  ruupakkhandho sa.myojanavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa, siyaa  sa.myojanavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyo caa''ti,  ``sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana.m''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva  sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniyaa ceva ^a^P0.0065^ea^ no ca sa.myojanaa, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana~nceva  sa.myojaniyo ca, siyaa sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva  sa.myojaniyo caa''tipi, ``sa.myojaniyo ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho na  vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no  ca sa.myojana''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutto ca,  siyaa sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``sa.myojana~nceva  sa.myojanasampayutto ^a^V0.0072^ea^ caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutto ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi.  ruupakkhandho sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa,  siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa na ^a^T0.0077^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi,  ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi.
text.527: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no ganthaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho. ruupakkhandho  ganthaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ganthaniyaa, siyaa aganthaniyaa. ruupakkhandho ganthavippayutto.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``gantho ceva ganthaniyo caa''ti, ``ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho''. tayo khandhaa na  vattabbaa ^a^M0.0064^ea^ -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthaniyaa ceva no ca  ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca, siyaa ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``gantho  ceva ganthaniyo caa''tipi, ``ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho''tipi. ruupakkhandho na  vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutto caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho''tipi.  tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayuttaa  ceva no ca ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''ti.  sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca, siyaa ganthasampayutto ceva no ca gantho,  siyaa na vattabbo -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutto caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutto ceva  no ca gantho''ti pi. ruupakkhandho ganthavippayuttaganthaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa  ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa ^a^T0.0078^ea^, siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --   ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.
text.528: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no ^a^P0.0066^ea^ niivara.naa.  sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. ruupakkhandho niivara.niyo. cattaaro  khandhaa siyaa niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. ruupakkhandho niivara.navippayutto. cattaaro  khandhaa siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo caa''ti, ``niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na.m''. tayo khandhaa  na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.niyaa ceva no  ca niivara.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho  siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo ^a^V0.0073^ea^ ca, siyaa niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na  vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyo caa''tipi, ``niivara.niyo ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi.  ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutto  ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.nasampayuttaa  ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto ca,  siyaa niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutto  caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ^a^M0.0065^ea^ ca niivara.na''ntipi. ruupakkhandho  ^a^T0.0079^ea^ niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa, siyaa  niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi,  ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.
text.529: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no paraamaasaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso.  ruupakkhandho paraama.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa paraama.t.thaa, siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho  paraamaasavippayutto. tayo khandhaa siyaa paraamaasasampayuttaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa.  sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa paraamaasasampayutto, siyaa paraamaasavippayutto, siyaa na vattabbo --  ``paraamaasasampayutto''tipi, ``paraamaasavippayutto''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho caa''ti, ``paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso''. tayo  khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca  paraamaasaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho ca, siyaa paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabbo --  ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tho caa''tipi, ``paraama.t.tho ceva no ca paraamaaso''tipi. ruupakkhandho  paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa  paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa ^a^P0.0067^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi,  ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.
text.53: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo vi~n~naa.nakkhandho? ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m  ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure  santike vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.530: [03] ruupakkhandho ^a^T0.0080^ea^ anaaramma.no. cattaaro khandhaa saaramma.naa. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho citta.m. cattaaro  khandhaa no cittaa. tayo khandhaa cetasikaa. dve khandhaa acetasikaa. tayo khandhaa  cittasampayuttaa ^a^V0.0074^ea^. ruupakkhandho cittavippayutto. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``cittena  sampayutto''tipi, ``cittena vippayutto''tipi. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho  cittavisa.msa.t.tho. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.tho''tipi, ``cittena  visa.msa.t.tho''tipi. tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittasamu.t.thaano.  ruupakkhandho siyaa cittasamu.t.thaano, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaano. tayo khandhaa cittasahabhuno.  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittasahabhuu. ruupakkhandho siyaa cittasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasahabhuu.  tayo khandhaa cittaanuparivattino. vi~n~naa.nakkhandho no cittaanuparivatti. ruupakkhandho  ^a^M0.0066^ea^ siyaa cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa.  dve khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. dve  khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. tayo khandhaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.  dve khandhaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.
text.531: [03] vi~n~naa.nakkhandho ajjhattiko. tayo khandhaa baahiraa. ruupakkhandho siyaa ajjhattiko,  siyaa baahiro. cattaaro khandhaa no upaadaa. ruupakkhandho siyaa upaadaa, siyaa no  upaadaa, siyaa upaadinnaa, siyaa anupaadinnaa. cattaaro ^a^T0.0081^ea^ khandhaa no upaadaanaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho  siyaa upaadaana.m, siyaa no upaadaana.m. ruupakkhandho upaadaaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa upaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa. ruupakkhandho upaadaanavippayutto. cattaaro  khandhaa siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo --  ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo caa''ti, ``upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana.m''. tayo  khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva  no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho  siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo ca, siyaa upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa  na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyo caa''tipi, ``upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi.  ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutto ^a^P0.0068^ea^ caa''tipi,  ``upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa  ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutto ca, siyaa upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa  na vattabbo -- ``upaadaana~nceva ^a^V0.0075^ea^ upaadaanasampayutto caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutto ceva  no ca upaadaana''ntipi. ruupakkhandho upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyo. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa  ^a^T0.0082^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi,   ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.
text.532: [03] cattaaro khandhaa no kilesaa. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso, siyaa no kileso.  ruupakkhandho sa.mkilesiko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ^a^M0.0067^ea^, siyaa  asa.mkilesikaa. ruupakkhandho asa.mkili.t.tho. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa. ruupakkhandho kilesavippayutto. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kilesasampayuttaa,  siyaa kilesavippayuttaa. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko  caa''ti, ``sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso''. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa --  ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa  kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko ca, siyaa sa.mkilesiko ceva no ca kileso, siyaa  na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesiko caa''tipi, ``sa.mkilesiko ceva  no ca kileso''tipi. ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho caa''tipi,  ``sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ^a^T0.0083^ea^ ca kileso''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``kileso  ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho  ca, siyaa sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tho  caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.tho ceva no ca kileso''tipi.
text.533: [03] ruupakkhandho na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutto caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayutto  ceva no ca kileso''tipi. tayo khandhaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. sa"nkhaarakkhandho siyaa kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca,  siyaa kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbo -- ``kileso ceva  kilesasampayutto caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso''tipi. ruupakkhandho  kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesiko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa  ^a^P0.0069^ea^, siyaa ^a^V0.0076^ea^ kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa''tipi,  ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa''tipi.
text.534: [03] ruupakkhandho na dassanena pahaatabbo. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa  na dassanena pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo ^a^M0.0068^ea^. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. ruupakkhandho na dassanena  pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena  pahaatabbahetukaa. ruupakkhandho na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. ruupakkhandho avitakko.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa. ruupakkhandho avicaaro. cattaaro  ^a^T0.0084^ea^ khandhaa siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. ruupakkhandho appiitiko, cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. ruupakkhandho na piitisahagato. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. dve khandhaa na sukhasahagataa. tayo khandhaa  siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. dve khandhaa na upekkhaasahagataa. tayo  khandhaa siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.535: [01] ruupakkhandho kaamaavacaro. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa kaamaavacaraa, siyaa na kaamaavacaraa.  ruupakkhandho na ruupaavacaro. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa ruupaavacaraa, siyaa na ruupaavacaraa. ruupakkhandho  na aruupaavacaro. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa aruupaavacaraa, siyaa na aruupaavacaraa. ruupakkhandho  pariyaapanno. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa. ruupakkhandho  aniyyaaniko. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niyyaanikaa, siyaa aniyyaanikaa. ruupakkhandho  aniyato. cattaaro khandhaa siyaa niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. ruupakkhandho sauttaro.  cattaaro khandhaa siyaa sauttaraa, siyaa anuttaraa. ruupakkhandho ara.no. cattaaro khandhaa  siyaa sara.naa, siyaa ara.naati.
text.54: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0014^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m? ya.m ^a^P0.0010^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m niruddha.m  vigata.m vipari.nata.m attha"ngata.m abbhattha"ngata.m uppajjitvaa vigata.m atiita.m atiita.msena sa"ngahita.m,  cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m --  ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m atiita.m.
text.540: [03] 154^b^.^eb^ dvaadasaayatanaani ^a^T0.0085^ea^ ^a^M0.0069^ea^ ^a^P0.0070^ea^ ^a^V0.0077^ea^ -- cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m,  saddaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m,  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m.
text.541: [03] cakkhu.m anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa vipari.naamadhamma.m. ruupaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa.  sota.m anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa vipari.naamadhamma.m. saddaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa.  ghaana.m anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa vipari.naamadhamma.m. gandhaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa.  jivhaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa. rasaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa.  kaayo anicco dukkho anattaa vipari.naamadhammo. pho.t.thabbaa aniccaa dukkhaa anattaa  vipari.naamadhammaa. mano anicco dukkho anattaa vipari.naamadhammo. dhammaa aniccaa dukkhaa  anattaa vipari.naamadhammaa.
text.544: [03] 155^b^.^eb^ dvaadasaayatanaani ^a^V0.0078^ea^ -- cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m,  manaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m.
text.545: [03] 156^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m cakkhaayatana.m? ya.m cakkhu {cakkhu.m (sii0 syaa0 ka0) dha0 sa0  596-599} catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno  anidassano sappa.tigho, yena cakkhunaa ^a^P0.0071^ea^ anidassanena sappa.tighena ruupa.m sanidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe vaa, cakkhumpeta.m cakkhaayatanampeta.m  cakkhudhaatupesaa cakkhundriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m  vatthumpeta.m nettampeta.m nayanampeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati  ``cakkhaayatana.m'' ^a^T0.0086^ea^.
text.546: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0070^ea^ katama.m sotaayatana.m? ya.m sota.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena sotena anidassanena sappa.tighena  sadda.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m su.ni vaa su.naati vaa su.nissati vaa su.ne vaa, sotampeta.m  sotaayatanampeta.m sotadhaatupesaa sotindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso  pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m  vuccati ``sotaayatana.m''.
text.547: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ghaanaayatana.m? ya.m ghaana.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado attabhaavapariyaapanno  anidassano sappa.tigho, yena ghaanena anidassanena sappa.tighena gandha.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m  ghaayi vaa ghaayati vaa ghaayissati vaa ghaaye vaa, ghaanampeta.m ghaanaayatanampeta.m ghaanadhaatupesaa  ghaanindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m  orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``ghaanaayatana.m''.
text.548: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m jivhaayatana.m? yaa jivhaa catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado  attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yaaya jivhaaya anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya rasa.m  anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m saayi vaa saayati vaa saayissati vaa saaye vaa, jivhaapesaa jivhaayatanampeta.m  ^a^V0.0079^ea^ jivhaadhaatupesaa jiivhindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso pa.n.darampeta.m  khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m vuccati ``jivhaayatana.m''.
text.549: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m kaayaayatana.m? yo kaayo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado  attabhaavapariyaapanno anidassano sappa.tigho, yena kaayena anidassanena sappa.tighena pho.t.thabba.m  anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m phusi vaa phusati vaa phusissati vaa phuse vaa, kaayopeso  kaayaayatanampeta.m kaayadhaatupesaa kaayindriyampeta.m lokopeso dvaaraapesaa samuddopeso  pa.n.darampeta.m khettampeta.m vatthumpeta.m orima.m tiirampeta.m su~n~no gaamopeso. ida.m  vuccati ``kaayaayatana.m''.
text.55: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaagata.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajaata.m abhuuta.m asa~njaata.m anibbatta.m  anabhinibbatta.m apaatubhuuta.m anuppanna.m asamuppanna.m anu.t.thita.m asamu.t.thita.m ^a^M0.0011^ea^ anaagata.m  anaagata.msena sa"ngahita.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m anaagata.m.
text.550: [03] 161^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0071^ea^ katama.m manaayatana.m? ekavidhena manaayatana.m -- phassasampayutta.m.
text.551: [03] duvidhena manaayatana.m -- atthi sahetuka.m, atthi ahetuka.m.
text.552: [03] tividhena manaayatana.m -- atthi kusala.m, atthi akusala.m, atthi abyaakata.m.
text.553: [03] catubbidhena manaayatana.m -- atthi kaamaavacara.m, atthi ruupaavacara.m, atthi aruupaavacara.m, atthi  apariyaapanna.m.
text.554: [03] pa~ncavidhena manaayatana.m -- atthi sukhindriyasampayutta.m, atthi dukkhindriyasampayutta.m, atthi  somanassindriyasampayutta.m, atthi domanassindriyasampayutta.m, atthi upekkhindriyasampayutta.m.
text.555: [03] chabbidhena manaayatana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m. eva.m chabbidhena manaayatana.m.
text.556: [03] sattavidhena manaayatana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. eva.m sattavidhena manaayatana.m.
text.557: [03] a.t.thavidhena manaayatana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0080^ea^ atthi sukhasahagata.m, atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.  eva.m a.t.thavidhena manaayatana.m.
text.558: [03] navavidhena manaayatana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu atthi kusala.m, atthi akusala.m, atthi  abyaakata.m. eva.m navavidhena manaayatana.m.
text.559: [03] dasavidhena manaayatana.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m,  kaayavi~n~naa.na.m atthi sukhasahagata.m, atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  atthi kusala.m, atthi akusala.m, atthi abyaakata.m. eva.m dasavidhena manaayatana.m.
text.56: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m paccuppanna.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m jaata.m bhuuta.m sa~njaata.m nibbatta.m  abhinibbatta.m paatubhuuta.m uppanna.m samuppanna.m u.t.thita.m samu.t.thita.m paccuppanna.m paccuppanna.msena  sa"ngahita.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0012^ea^ sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m  manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m paccuppanna.m.
text.561: [03] duvidhena manaayatana.m -- atthi sahetuka.m, atthi ahetuka.m.
text.562: [03] tividhena ^a^M0.0072^ea^ manaayatana.m -- atthi sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, atthi dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutta.m, atthi adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m...pe0.... eva.m bahuvidhena  manaayatana.m. ida.m vuccati ``manaayatana.m''.
text.563: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0072^ea^ katama.m ruupaayatana.m? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya  va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m niila.m piitaka.m lohitaka.m {piita.m lohita.m (sii0)}   odaata.m kaa.laka.m ma~nji.t.thaka.m {ma~nje.t.thaka.m (sii0 syaa0)}   hari hariva.n.na.m amba"nkurava.n.na.m diigha.m rassa.m a.nu.m thuula.m va.t.ta.m parima.n.dala.m caturassa.m cha.la.msa.m  a.t.tha.msa.m so.lasa.msa.m ninna.m thala.m chaayaa aatapo aaloko andhakaaro abbhaa mahikaa dhuumo  rajo candama.n.dalassa va.n.nanibhaa suuriyama.n.dalassa {suriyama.n.dalassa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} va.n.nanibhaa taarakaruupaana.m va.n.nanibhaa aadaasama.n.dalassa  va.n.nanibhaa ma.nisa"nkhamuttave.luriyassa va.n.nanibhaa jaataruuparajatassa va.n.nanibhaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi  atthi ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa sanidassana.m sappa.tigha.m, ya.m ruupa.m sanidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m cakkhunaa anidassanena sappa.tighena passi vaa passati vaa passissati vaa passe  vaa, ruupampeta.m ruupaayatanampeta.m ruupadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``ruupaayatana.m''.
text.564: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0081^ea^ katama.m saddaayatana.m? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho  bherisaddo mudi"ngasaddo {muti"ngasaddho (sii0)} sa"nkhasaddo pa.navasaddo giitasaddo vaaditasaddo sammasaddo paa.nisaddo sattaana.m  nigghosasaddo dhaatuuna.m sannighaatasaddo vaatasaddo udakasaddo manussasaddo amanussasaddo, yo vaa  pana~n~nopi atthi saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m sadda.m anidassana.m  sappa.tigha.m sotena anidassanena sappa.tighena su.ni vaa su.naati vaa su.nissati vaa su.ne  vaa, saddopeso saddaayatanampeta.m saddadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``saddaayatana.m''.
text.565: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m gandhaayatana.m? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho muulagandho saaragandho tacagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho aamagandho vissagandho  sugandho duggandho, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano  sappa.tigho ^a^M0.0073^ea^, ya.m gandha.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m ghaanena anidassanena sappa.tighena ghaayi  vaa ghaayati vaa ghaayissati vaa ghaaye vaa, gandhopeso gandhaayatanampeta.m gandhadhaatupesaa.  ida.m vuccati ``gandhaayatana.m''.
text.566: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m rasaayatana.m? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho  muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso phalaraso ambila.m madhura.m tittaka.m  ka.tuka.m lo.nika.m {lapilaka.m (sii0), lampika.m (ka0 sii0)} khaarika.m lambika.m kasaavo saadu asaadu, yo vaa pana~n~nopi atthi  raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho, ya.m rasa.m anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m  jivhaaya anidassanaaya sappa.tighaaya saayi vaa saayati vaa saayissati vaa saaye vaa, rasopeso  rasaayatanampeta.m rasadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati ``rasaayatana.m''.
text.567: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m pho.t.thabbaayatana.m? pathaviidhaatu tejodhaatu vaayodhaatu kakkha.la.m  muduka.m sa.nha.m pharusa.m sukhasamphassa.m dukkhasamphassa.m garuka.m lahuka.m, ya.m pho.t.thabba.m  anidassana.m sappa.tigha.m kaayena anidassanena sappa.tighena phusi vaa phusati vaa phusissati  vaa phuse vaa, pho.t.thabbopeso pho.t.thabbaayatanampeta.m pho.t.thabbadhaatupesaa. ida.m vuccati  ``pho.t.thabbaayatana.m''.
text.568: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0082^ea^ katama.m dhammaayatana.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, ya~nca  ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m, asa"nkhataa ca dhaatu.
text.569: [03] tattha katamo vedanaakkhandho? ekavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- phassasampayutto. duvidhena  vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi  kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho...pe0...  eva.m bahuvidhena vedanaakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``vedanaakkhandho''.
text.57: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m ajjhatta.m? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m ajjhatta.m  paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m  jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m ajjhatta.m.
text.570: [03] tattha katamo sa~n~naakkhandho? ekavidhena sa~n~naakkhandho -- phassasampayutto. duvidhena  sa~n~naakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. tividhena sa~n~naakkhandho -- atthi  kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi ^a^M0.0074^ea^ abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena sa~n~naakkhandho...pe0...  eva.m bahuvidhena sa~n~naakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``sa~n~naakkhandho''.
text.571: [03] tattha katamo sa"nkhaarakkhandho? ekavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cittasampayutto. duvidhena  sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetu, atthi na hetu. tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi  kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho...pe0...  eva.m bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``sa"nkhaarakkhandho''.
text.572: [03] tattha katama.m ^a^T0.0087^ea^ ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m? itthindriya.m purisindriya.m...pe0...  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. ida.m vuccati ruupa.m ``anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m''.
text.573: [03] tattha katamaa asa"nkhataa dhaatu? raagakkhayo ^a^P0.0073^ea^, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo -- aya.m  vuccati ``asa"nkhataa dhaatu''.
text.577: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ dvaadasaayatanaani ^a^V0.0083^ea^ -- cakkhaayatana.m, ruupaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  gandhaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, manaayatana.m,  dhammaayatana.m.
text.578: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ dvaadasanna.m aayatanaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.58: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m bahiddhaa? ya.m vi~n~naa.na.m tesa.m tesa.m parasattaana.m parapuggalaana.m  ajjhatta.m paccatta.m niyaka.m paa.tipuggalika.m upaadinna.m, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sotavi~n~naa.na.m  ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m  bahiddhaa.
text.580: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ dasaayatanaa abyaakataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa.  dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi,  ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi. manaayatana.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya   ^a^M0.0075^ea^ sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayutta.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m,  siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi,  ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi.  dasaayatanaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa,  siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.581: [03] pa~ncaayatanaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. saddaayatana.m ^a^T0.0088^ea^ anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. cattaaro aayatanaa  siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.  dasaayatanaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. dasaayatanaa  avitakkaavicaaraa. manaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m ^a^V0.0084^ea^, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``savitakkasavicaara''ntipi, ``avitakkavicaaramatta''ntipi,  ``avitakkaavicaara''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi,  ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi. dvaayatanaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa ^a^P0.0074^ea^ sukhasahagataa,  siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi,  ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.
text.582: [03] dasaayatanaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dasaayatanaa neva dassanena  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dasaayatanaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino.  dvaayatanaa siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino.  dasaayatanaa ^a^T0.0089^ea^ nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa ^a^M0.0076^ea^,  siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. dasaayatanaa parittaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa,  siyaa appamaa.naa. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa,  siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi,  ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi. dasaayatanaa majjhimaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa hiinaa, siyaa majjhimaa,  siyaa pa.niitaa. dasaayatanaa aniyataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa micchattaniyataa, siyaa sammattaniyataa,  siyaa aniyataa.
text.583: [03] dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa, siyaa maggaadhipatino,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi, ``maggaadhipatino''tipi.  pa~ncaayatanaa siyaa uppannaa, siyaa uppaadino, na vattabbaa -- ``anuppannaa''ti. saddaayatana.m  siyaa uppanna.m, siyaa anuppanna.m, na vattabba.m -- ``uppaadii''ti. pa~ncaayatanaa siyaa  uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino. dhammaayatana.m siyaa uppanna.m, siyaa anuppanna.m,  siyaa uppaadi, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``uppanna''ntipi, ``anuppanna''ntipi, ``uppaadii''tipi.  ekaadasaayatanaa siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa  atiita.m, siyaa anaagata.m, siyaa paccuppanna.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``atiita''ntipi, ``anaagata''ntipi,  ``paccuppanna''ntipi. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ^a^V0.0085^ea^ atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa  anaagataaramma.naa ^a^T0.0090^ea^, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa ^a^P0.0075^ea^ --   ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi,  ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi; siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa,  siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa  bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi,  ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi. ruupaayatana.m sanidassanasappa.tigha.m.  navaayatanaa anidassanasappa.tighaa. dvaayatanaa anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.585: [03] 171^b^.^eb^ ekaadasaayatanaa na hetuu. dhammaayatana.m siyaa hetu, siyaa na hetu. dasaayatanaa  ahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. dasaayatanaa hetuvippayuttaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu  ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ceva sahetukaa caa''tipi, ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. manaayatana.m  na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva sahetuka~ncaa''ti, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sahetuka~nceva na ca hetuu''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa hetu ceva  sahetuka~nca, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva  sahetuka~ncaa''tipi, ``sahetuka~nceva na ca hetuu''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa --  ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi.  manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva  na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ^a^T0.0091^ea^ ca hetuu''ti. dhammaayatana.m  siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutta~nca, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa  na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ca  hetuu''tipi. dasaayatanaa na hetuuahetukaa. manaayatana.m siyaa na hetusahetuka.m, siyaa  na hetuahetuka.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa na hetusahetuka.m, siyaa na hetuahetuka.m,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``na hetusahetuka''ntipi, ``na hetuahetuka''ntipi.
