text.586: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa sappaccayaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sappaccaya.m, siyaa appaccaya.m. ekaadasaayatanaa  sa"nkhataa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa"nkhata.m, siyaa asa"nkhata.m. ruupaayatana.m sanidassana.m. ekaadasaayatanaa  ^a^V0.0086^ea^ anidassanaa. dasaayatanaa ^a^P0.0076^ea^ sappa.tighaa. dvaayatanaa appa.tighaa. dasaayatanaa ruupaa.  manaayatana.m aruupa.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m. dasaayatanaa lokiyaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.587: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no aasavaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa aasavo, siyaa no aasavo. dasaayatanaa  saasavaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa saasavaa, siyaa anaasavaa. dasaayatanaa aasavavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa  ceva saasavaa caa''ti, ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m --  ``aasavo ceva saasava~ncaa''ti, siyaa saasava~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``saasava~nceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa aasavo ceva saasava~nca, siyaa saasava~nceva  no ca ^a^M0.0078^ea^ aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva saasava~ncaa''tipi, ``saasava~nceva  no ca aasavo''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''tipi,  ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva  aasavasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa ^a^T0.0092^ea^ aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~nca,  siyaa aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~ncaa''tipi,  ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''tipi. dasaayatanaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.
text.588: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no sa.myojanaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa no sa.myojana.m. dasaayatanaa  sa.myojaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa. dasaayatanaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa --  ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa. manaayatana.m  na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniya~ncaa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammaayatana.m   ^a^T0.0093^ea^ siyaa sa.myojana~nceva  sa.myojaniya~nca, siyaa sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva  ^a^V0.0087^ea^ sa.myojaniya''ntipi, ``sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa --  ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no  ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. manaayatana.m ^a^P0.0077^ea^ na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  siyaa sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva  no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~nca, siyaa  sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''tipi,  ``sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa  ^a^M0.0079^ea^. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi, ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi.
text.589: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no ganthaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho. dasaayatanaa ganthaniyaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa ganthaniyaa, siyaa aganthaniyaa. dasaayatanaa ganthavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva  ganthaniyaa caa''ti, ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m   ^a^T0.0094^ea^ -- ``gantho  ceva ganthaniya~ncaa''ti, siyaa ganthaniya~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``ganthaniya~nceva  no ca gantho''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho ceva ganthaniya~nca, siyaa ganthaniya~nceva no  ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniya~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthaniya~nceva no ca  gantho''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''tipi,  ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva  ganthasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``ganthasampayutta~nceva  no ca gantho''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~nca, siyaa ganthasampayutta~nceva  no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutta~nceva  no ca gantho''tipi. dasaayatanaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa,  siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi,  ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.
text.59: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m sukhuma.m? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m,  kusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa sukhumaa. kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa o.laarikaa   ^a^T0.0015^ea^, abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, sukhaaya  ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa sukhumaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi  sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa o.laarikaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m.  asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m, samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m  o.laarika.m, anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhuma.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya  vi~n~naa.na.m o.laarika.m sukhuma.m da.t.thabba.m.
text.590: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa. dhammaayatana.m  siyaa ^a^V0.0088^ea^ niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. dasaayatanaa niivara.niyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ^a^P0.0078^ea^  niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. dasaayatanaa niivara.navippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  niivara.nasampayuttaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva  niivara.niyaa caa''ti, niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m --  ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~ncaa''ti ^a^T0.0095^ea^, siyaa niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~nca,  siyaa niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa ^a^M0.0080^ea^ na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva  niivara.niya~ncaa''tipi, ``niivara.niya~nceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa --  ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi.  manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayutta~nceva  no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na''nti.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~nca, siyaa niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no  ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayutta~nceva  no ca niivara.na''ntipi. dasaayatanaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa,  siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi,  ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.
text.591: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no paraamaasaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso. dasaayatanaa  paraama.t.thaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa paraama.t.thaa, siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. dasaayatanaa paraamaasavippayuttaa.  manaayatana.m siyaa paraamaasasampayutta.m, siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa  paraamaasasampayutta.m, siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaasasampayutta''ntipi,  ``paraamaasavippayutta''ntipi. dasaayatanaa na ^a^T0.0096^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti,  ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~ncaa''ti,  siyaa paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso''ti.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~nca, siyaa paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~ncaa''tipi, ``paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca paraamaaso''tipi.  dasaayatanaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa ^a^V0.0089^ea^, siyaa  paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi  ^a^P0.0079^ea^, ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.
text.592: [03] dasaayatanaa anaaramma.naa. manaayatana.m saaramma.na.m. dhammaayatana.m siyaa saaramma.na.m, siyaa anaaramma.na.m.  manaayatana.m citta.m. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittaa. ekaadasaayatanaa acetasikaa. dhammaayatana.m  siyaa cetasika.m, siyaa acetasika.m. dasaayatanaa cittavippayuttaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa  cittasampayutta.m, siyaa cittavippayutta.m. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sampayutta''ntipi  ^a^M0.0081^ea^, ``cittena vippayutta''ntipi. dasaayatanaa cittavisa.msa.t.thaa. dhammaayatana.m  siyaa cittasa.msa.t.tha.m, siyaa cittavisa.msa.t.tha.m. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.tha''ntipi,  ``cittena visa.msa.t.tha''ntipi. chaayatanaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. chaayatanaa siyaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa,  siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasahabhuno. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasahabhuu   ^a^T0.0097^ea^, siyaa no cittasahabhuu. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittaanuparivattino. dhammaayatana.m siyaa  cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m. ekaadasaayatanaa  no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu, siyaa  no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. ekaadasaayatanaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti.
text.593: [03] chaayatanaa ajjhattikaa. chaayatanaa baahiraa. navaayatanaa upaadaa. dvaayatanaa no upaadaa.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa upaadaa, siyaa no upaadaa. pa~ncaayatanaa upaadinnaa. saddaayatana.m anupaadinna.m.  chaayatanaa siyaa upaadinnaa, siyaa anupaadinnaa. ekaadasaayatanaa no upaadaanaa. dhammaayatana.m  siyaa upaadaana.m, siyaa no upaadaana.m. dasaayatanaa upaadaaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  upaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa. dasaayatanaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  upaadaanasampayuttaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva  upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m --  ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniya~ncaa''ti, siyaa upaadaaniya~nceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa  na vattabba.m -- ``upaadaaniya~nceva no ca upaadaana''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa upaadaana~nceva   ^a^T0.0098^ea^ upaadaaniya~nca, siyaa upaadaaniya~nceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``upaadaana~nceva  ^a^P0.0080^ea^ ^a^V0.0090^ea^ upaadaaniya~ncaa''tipi, ``upaadaaniya~nceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa  na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``upaadaaniya~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  siyaa upaadaanasampayutta~nceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``upaadaanasampayutta~nceva  no ca upaadaana''nti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~nca, siyaa  upaadaanasampayutta~nceva no ca upaadaana.m ^a^M0.0082^ea^, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``upaadaana~nceva  upaadaanasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutta~nceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi. dasaayatanaa  upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaupaadaaniyaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi, ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.
text.594: [03] ekaadasaayatanaa no kilesaa. dhammaayatana.m siyaa kileso, siyaa no kileso. dasaayatanaa  sa.mkilesikaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkilesikaa. dasaayatanaa  asa.mkili.t.thaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa. dasaayatanaa kilesavippayuttaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa kilesasampayuttaa, siyaa kilesavippayuttaa. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa --  ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti, ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa''.  manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesika~ncaa''ti, siyaa sa.mkilesika~nceva  no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.mkilesika~nceva no ca kileso''ti.  dhammaayatana.m siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkilesika~nca, siyaa sa.mkilesika~nceva no ca  kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesika~ncaa''tipi, ``sa.mkilesika~nceva  no ca kileso''tipi. dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''tipi,  ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca ^a^T0.0099^ea^ kilesaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``kileso  ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~ncaa''ti, siyaa sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~nca,  siyaa sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~ncaa''tipi,  ``sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso''tipi.
text.595: [03] dasaayatanaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca na kilesaa''tipi. manaayatana.m na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~ncaa''ti  ^a^V0.0091^ea^, siyaa kilesasampayutta~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kilesasampayutta~nceva  no ca kileso''ti. dhammaayatana.m siyaa kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~nca, siyaa  kilesasampayutta~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~ncaa''tipi,  ``kilesasampayutta~nceva no ^a^M0.0083^ea^ ca kileso''tipi. dasaayatanaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa  ^a^P0.0081^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa''tipi,   ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa''tipi ^a^T0.0100^ea^.
text.596: [03] dasaayatanaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa na dassanena  pahaatabbaa. dasaayatanaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa,  siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dasaayatanaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa. dasaayatanaa na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbahetukaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  dasaayatanaa avitakkaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa. dasaayatanaa avicaaraa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. dasaayatanaa appiitikaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. dasaayatanaa na piitisahagataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa piitisahagataa,  siyaa na piitisahagataa. dasaayatanaa na sukhasahagataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa  na sukhasahagataa. dasaayatanaa na upekkhaasahagataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa  na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.597: [01] dasaayatanaa kaamaavacaraa. dvaayatanaa siyaa kaamaavacaraa, siyaa na kaamaavacaraa. dasaayatanaa  na ruupaavacaraa. dvaayatanaa siyaa ruupaavacaraa, siyaa na ruupaavacaraa. dasaayatanaa na aruupaavacaraa.  dvaayatanaa siyaa aruupaavacaraa, siyaa na aruupaavacaraa. dasaayatanaa pariyaapannaa. dvaayatanaa  siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa. dasaayatanaa aniyyaanikaa. dvaayatanaa siyaa  niyyaanikaa ^a^T0.0101^ea^, siyaa aniyyaanikaa. dasaayatanaa aniyataa. dvaayatanaa siyaa niyataa,  siyaa aniyataa. dasaayatanaa sauttaraa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sauttaraa, siyaa anuttaraa.  dasaayatanaa ara.naa. dvaayatanaa siyaa sara.naa, siyaa ara.naati.
text.60: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m pa.niita.m? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, kusalaabyaakataa  vi~n~naa.naa pa.niitaa ^a^P0.0011^ea^. kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa hiinaa, abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m  pa.niita.m. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca  vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa pa.niitaa. sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa  hiinaa, adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya ^a^M0.0012^ea^ sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. asamaapannassa  vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m, anaasava.m  vi~n~naa.na.m pa.niita.m. ta.m ta.m vaa pana vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya vi~n~naa.na.m hiina.m pa.niita.m  da.t.thabba.m.
text.602: [03] 172^b^.^eb^ cha ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ^a^P0.0082^ea^ ^a^V0.0092^ea^ dhaatuyo   -- pathaviidhaatu {pa.thaviidhaatu (sii0 syaa0) evamuparipi}, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.
text.603: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa pathaviidhaatu? pathaviidhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa.  tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m  kakkha.labhaavo ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m  nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0)} a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m {a.t.thimi~njaa (sii0)} vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m  udariya.m kariisa.m, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m  kakkha.labhaavo ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu'.
text.604: [03] tattha katamaa baahiraa pathaviidhaatu? ya.m baahira.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo  bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m ^a^T0.0102^ea^ -- ayo loha.m tipu siisa.m sajjha.m {sajjhu (syaa0)} muttaa ma.ni ve.luriyo  sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m rajata.m jaataruupa.m lohita"nko {lohita"ngo (syaa0 ka0), lohitako  (?)} masaaragalla.m ti.na.m ka.t.tha.m sakkharaa ka.thala.m {kathala.m (ka0)} bhuumi  paasaa.no pabbato, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m kakkha.la.m kharigata.m kakkha.latta.m kakkha.labhaavo  bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa pathaviidhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu  yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati  ``pathaviidhaatu''.
text.605: [03] 174^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0083^ea^ ^a^V0.0093^ea^ katamaa aapodhaatu? aapodhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa,  atthi baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aapo  aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m {sneho snehagata.m (syaa0)} bandhanatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- pitta.m  semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa mutta.m,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m ^a^M0.0085^ea^ paccatta.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m  bandhanatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu'.
text.606: [03] tattha katamaa baahiraa aapodhaatu? ya.m baahira.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m  ruupassa bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- muularaso khandharaso tacaraso pattaraso puppharaso  phalaraso khiira.m dadhi sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m bhummaani vaa udakaani antalikkhaani  vaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m aapo aapogata.m sineho sinehagata.m bandhanatta.m ruupassa  bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m ^a^T0.0103^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa aapodhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu  yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati  ``aapodhaatu''.
text.607: [03] 175^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa tejodhaatu? tejodhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa.  tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa  usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- yena ca santappati yena ca  jiiriiyati yena ca pari.dayhati yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sammaa pari.naama.m gacchati,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m  ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu'.
text.608: [03] tattha katamaa baahiraa tejodhaatu? ya.m baahira.m tejo tejogata.m usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m  usumagata.m bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- ka.t.thaggi palaalaggi {sakalikaggi (sabbattha)} ti.naggi gomayaggi  thusaggi sa"nkaaraggi indaggi aggisantaapo suuriyasantaapo ka.t.thasannicayasantaapo ti.nasannicayasantaapo  dha~n~nasannicayasantaapo bha.n.dasannicayasantaapo, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi baahira.m tejo tejogata.m  usmaa usmaagata.m usuma.m usumagata.m bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `baahiraa tejodhaatu'.  yaa ^a^P0.0084^ea^ ^a^V0.0094^ea^ ca ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa  abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``tejodhaatu''.
text.609: [03] 176^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0104^ea^ ^a^M0.0086^ea^ katamaa vaayodhaatu? vaayodhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi  baahiraa. tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu? ya.m ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m  thambhitatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- uddha"ngamaa vaataa adhogamaa vaataa  kucchisayaa vaataa ko.t.thaasayaa {ko.t.thasayaa (sii0 syaa0)} vaataa a"ngama"ngaanusaarino vaataa satthakavaataa khurakavaataa uppalakavaataa  assaaso passaaso iti vaa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m vaayo vaayogata.m  thambhitatta.m ruupassa ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu'.
text.61: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0013^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m duure? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m kusalaabyaakatehi vi~n~naa.nehi  duure; kusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa akusalaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; kusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m  akusalaabyaakatehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; akusalaabyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa kusalaa vi~n~naa.naa  duure; abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m kusalaakusalehi ^a^T0.0016^ea^ vi~n~naa.nehi duure; kusalaakusalaa vi~n~naa.naa  abyaakataa vi~n~naa.naa duure. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya  ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; sukhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa  vi~n~naa.naa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa duure; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m  vi~n~naa.na.m dukkhaaya ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttehi vi~n~naa.nehi duure; dukkhaaya  ca adukkhamasukhaaya ca vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa  duure; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttehi  vi~n~naa.nehi duure; sukhadukkhaahi vedanaahi sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa vi~n~naa.naa duure. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.naa duure; samaapannassa  vi~n~naa.na.m asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.naa duure. saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m anaasavaa vi~n~naa.naa  duure; anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m saasavaa vi~n~naa.naa duure -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m duure.
text.610: [03] tattha katamaa baahiraa vaayodhaatu? ya.m baahira.m vaayo vaayogata.m thambhitatta.m ruupassa  bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m, seyyathida.m -- puratthimaa vaataa pacchimaa vaataa uttaraa vaataa dakkhi.naa  vaataa sarajaa vaataa arajaa vaataa siitaa vaataa u.nhaa vaataa parittaa vaataa adhimattaa vaataa  kaa.lavaataa verambhavaataa pakkhavaataa supa.n.navaataa taalava.n.tavaataa vidhuupanavaataa, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi  atthi baahira.m vaayo vaayogata.m thambhitatta.m ruupassa bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati  `baahiraa vaayodhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu,  tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``vaayodhaatu''.
text.611: [03] 177^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa aakaasadhaatu? aakaasadhaatudvaya.m -- atthi ajjhattikaa, atthi baahiraa.  tattha katamaa ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu? ya.m ^a^T0.0105^ea^ ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaaso aakaasagata.m  agha.m aghagata.m vivaro vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m ma.msalohitehi ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m, seyyathida.m --  ka.n.nacchidda.m naasacchidda.m mukhadvaara.m, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m ajjhoharati, yattha ca  asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m santi.t.thati, yena ca asitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m adhobhaaga.m nikkhamati,  ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ajjhatta.m paccatta.m aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m vivaro  vivaragata.m asamphu.t.tha.m ma.msalohitehi ajjhatta.m upaadinna.m -- aya.m vuccati `ajjhattikaa  aakaasadhaatu'.
text.612: [03] tattha katamaa baahiraa aakaasadhaatu? ya.m baahira.m aakaaso aakaasagata.m agha.m aghagata.m  vivaro ^a^V0.0095^ea^ vivaragata.m ^a^P0.0085^ea^ asamphu.t.tha.m catuuhi mahaabhuutehi ^a^M0.0087^ea^ bahiddhaa anupaadinna.m --  aya.m vuccati `baahiraa aakaasadhaatu'. yaa ca ajjhattikaa aakaasadhaatu yaa ca baahiraa  aakaasadhaatu, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ``aakaasadhaatu''.
text.613: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa vi~n~naa.nadhaatu? cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu,  jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- aya.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.615: [03] 179^b^.^eb^ aparaapi cha dhaatuyo -- sukhadhaatu, dukkhadhaatu, somanassadhaatu, domanassadhaatu,  upekkhaadhaatu, avijjaadhaatu.
text.616: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa sukhadhaatu? ya.m kaayika.m saata.m kaayika.m sukha.m kaayasamphassaja.m  saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``sukhadhaatu''.
text.617: [03] tattha katamaa ^a^T0.0106^ea^ dukkhadhaatu? ya.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m asaata.m  dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``dukkhadhaatu''.
text.618: [03] tattha katamaa somanassadhaatu? ya.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``somanassadhaatu''.
text.619: [03] tattha katamaa domanassadhaatu? ya.m cetasika.m asaata.m cetasika.m dukkha.m cetosamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``domanassadhaatu''.
text.62: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.na.m santike? akusala.m vi~n~naa.na.m akusalassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike;  kusala.m ^a^P0.0012^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m kusalassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; abyaakata.m vi~n~naa.na.m  abyaakatassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike. dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m vi~n~naa.na.m sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m   ^a^T0.0017^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike. asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m  asamaapannassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike; samaapannassa vi~n~naa.na.m samaapannassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike.  saasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m saasavassa vi~n~naa.nassa ^a^M0.0013^ea^ santike; anaasava.m vi~n~naa.na.m  anaasavassa vi~n~naa.nassa santike -- ida.m vuccati vi~n~naa.na.m santike. ta.m ta.m vaa pana  vi~n~naa.na.m upaadaayupaadaaya vi~n~naa.na.m duure santike da.t.thabba.m.
text.620: [03] tattha katamaa upekkhaadhaatu? ya.m cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m ^a^V0.0096^ea^  vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``upekkhaadhaatu''.
text.621: [03] tattha katamaa avijjaadhaatu? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho appa.tivedho  asa"ngaaha.naa apariyogaaha.naa asamapekkhanaa apaccavekkha.naa apaccakkhakamma.m dummejjha.m baalya.m  asampaja~n~na.m ^a^M0.0088^ea^ moho pamoho sammoho avijjaa avijjogho avijjaayogo  avijjaanusayo avijjaapariyu.t.thaana.m ^a^P0.0086^ea^ avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m --  aya.m vuccati ``avijjaadhaatu''.
text.623: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ aparaapi cha dhaatuyo -- kaamadhaatu, byaapaadadhaatu, vihi.msaadhaatu, nekkhammadhaatu,  abyaapaadadhaatu, avihi.msaadhaatu.
text.624: [03] 182^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa kaamadhaatu? kaamapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa  byappanaa cetaso abhiniropanaa micchaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati kaamadhaatu. he.t.thato  aviiciniraya.m pariyanta.m karitvaa uparito paranimmitavasavattii deve anto karitvaa  ya.m etasmi.m antare etthaavacaraa ettha pariyaapannaa khandhadhaatuaayatanaa ruupaa {ruupa.m (syaa0)} vedanaa sa~n~naa  sa"nkhaaraa vi~n~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati ^a^T0.0107^ea^ ``kaamadhaatu''.
text.625: [03] tattha katamaa byaapaadadhaatu? byaapaadapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0... micchaasa"nkappo --  aya.m vuccati ``byaapaadadhaatu''. dasasu vaa aaghaatavatthuusu cittassa aaghaato pa.tighaato  pa.tigha.m pa.tivirodho kopo pakopo sampakopo doso padoso sampadoso cittassa byaapatti  manopadoso kodho kujjhanaa kujjhitatta.m doso dussanaa dussitatta.m byaapatti byaapajjanaa  virodho pa.tivirodho ca.n.dikka.m asuropo anattamanataa cittassa -- aya.m vuccati ``byaapaadadhaatu''.
text.626: [03] tattha katamaa vihi.msaadhaatu? vihi.msaapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0... micchaasa"nkappo ^a^V0.0097^ea^ --  aya.m vuccati ``vihi.msaadhaatu''. idhekacco paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa  satthena vaa rajjuyaa vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena satte vihe.theti, yaa evaruupaa he.thanaa vihe.thanaa  hi.msanaa vihi.msanaa rosanaa virosanaa paruupaghaato -- aya.m vuccati ``vihi.msaadhaatu''.
text.627: [03] tattha katamaa nekkhammadhaatu? nekkhammapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0... sammaasa"nkappo --  aya.m vuccati ``nekkhammadhaatu''. sabbepi kusalaa dhammaa ``nekkhammadhaatu''.
text.628: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0089^ea^ katamaa abyaapaadadhaatu? abyaapaadapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko...pe0...  sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati ``abyaapaadadhaatu''. yaa sattesu metti mettaayanaa  mettaayitatta.m mettaacetovimutti -- aya.m vuccati ``abyaapaadadhaatu''.
text.629: [03] tattha katamaa avihi.msaadhaatu? avihi.msaapa.tisa.myutto takko vitakko sa"nkappo appanaa  byappanaa ^a^P0.0087^ea^ cetaso abhiniropanaa sammaasa"nkappo -- aya.m vuccati ``avihi.msaadhaatu''   ^a^T0.0108^ea^. yaa sattesu karu.naa karu.naayanaa karu.naayitatta.m karu.naacetovimutti -- aya.m  vuccati ``avihi.msaadhaatu''.
text.631: [01] iti imaani tii.ni chakkaani tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo  honti.
text.634: [03] 183^b^.^eb^ a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotadhaatu,  saddadhaatu, sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu,  rasadhaatu, jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^V0.0098^ea^, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manodhaatu,  dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.
text.635: [03] 184^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa cakkhudhaatu? ya.m cakkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``cakkhudhaatu''.
text.636: [03] tattha katamaa ruupadhaatu? ya.m ruupa.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya va.n.nanibhaa...pe0... ruupadhaatupesaa --  aya.m vuccati ``ruupadhaatu''.
text.637: [03] tattha katamaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu? cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m  hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaacakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.638: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0090^ea^ katamaa sotadhaatu? ya.m sota.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``sotadhaatu'' ^a^T0.0109^ea^.
text.639: [03] tattha katamaa saddadhaatu? yo saddo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho...pe0...  saddadhaatupesaa -- aya.m vuccati ``saddadhaatu''.
text.640: [03] tattha katamaa sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu? sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m  pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaasotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.641: [03] tattha katamaa ghaanadhaatu? ya.m ^a^P0.0088^ea^ ghaana.m catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``ghaanadhaatu''.
text.642: [03] tattha katamaa gandhadhaatu? yo gandho catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho...pe0...  gandhadhaatupesaa -- aya.m vuccati ``gandhadhaatu''.
text.643: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0099^ea^ katamaa ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu? ghaana~nca pa.ticca gandhe ca uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m  hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaaghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.644: [03] tattha katamaa jivhaadhaatu? yaa jivhaa catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``jivhaadhaatu''.
text.645: [03] tattha katamaa rasadhaatu? yo raso catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya anidassano sappa.tigho...pe0...  rasadhaatupesaa -- aya.m vuccati ``rasadhaatu''.
text.646: [03] tattha katamaa jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu? jivha~nca pa.ticca rase ca uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m  hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m ^a^T0.0110^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaajivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.647: [03] tattha katamaa kaayadhaatu? yo kaayo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- aya.m vuccati ``kaayadhaatu''.
text.648: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0091^ea^ katamaa pho.t.thabbadhaatu? pathaviidhaatu...pe0... pho.t.thabbadhaatupesaa --  aya.m vuccati ``pho.t.thabbadhaatu''.
text.649: [03] tattha katamaa kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu? kaaya~nca pa.ticca pho.t.thabbe ca uppajjati citta.m mano  maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaakaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.65: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^V0.0014^ea^ -- ruupakkhandho, vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.
text.650: [03] tattha katamaa manodhaatu? cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa uppajjati  citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho  tajjaamanodhaatu; sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa...pe0... jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa...pe0...  kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m ^a^V0.0100^ea^ hadaya.m  pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanodhaatu ^a^P0.0089^ea^  sabbadhammesu vaa pana pa.thamasamannaahaaro uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m  mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanodhaatu -- aya.m vuccati  ``manodhaatu''.
text.651: [03] tattha katamaa dhammadhaatu? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho, ya~nca ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m  dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m, asa"nkhataa ca dhaatu.
text.652: [03] tattha katamo vedanaakkhandho? ekavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- phassasampayutto   ^a^T0.0111^ea^. duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. tividhena   vedanaakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena   vedanaakkhandho...pe0... eva.m bahuvidhena vedanaakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``vedanaakkhandho''.
text.653: [03] tattha katamo sa~n~naakkhandho? ekavidhena sa~n~naakkhandho -- phassasampayutto. duvidhena  sa~n~naakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko. tividhena sa~n~naakkhandho -- atthi  kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m dasavidhena sa~n~naakkhandho...pe0...  eva.m bahuvidhena sa~n~naakkhandho. aya.m vuccati ``sa~n~naakkhandho''.
text.654: [03] tattha katamo sa"nkhaarakkhandho? ekavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- cittasampayutto. duvidhena  sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi hetu, atthi ahetu. tividhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- atthi kusalo,  atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato...pe0... eva.m ^a^M0.0092^ea^ dasavidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho...pe0...  eva.m bahuvidhena sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- aya.m vuccati ``sa"nkhaarakkhandho''.
text.655: [03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m? itthindriya.m...pe0...  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m ``anidassanaappa.tigha.m dhammaayatanapariyaapanna.m''.
text.656: [03] tattha katamaa asa"nkhataa dhaatu? raagakkhayo, dosakkhayo, mohakkhayo -- aya.m vuccati ``asa"nkhataa  dhaatu''. aya.m vuccati ``dhammadhaatu''.
text.657: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0101^ea^ katamaa manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu? cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa uppajjati  manodhaatu, manodhaatuyaa uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa ^a^P0.0090^ea^ uppajjati citta.m mano  maanasa.m...pe0... tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu; sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa   ^a^T0.0112^ea^ ...pe0...  jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa uppajjati  manodhaatu, manodhaatuyaapi uppajjitvaa niruddhasamanantaraa uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0...  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m  mano manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  aya.m vuccati ``manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu''.
text.660: [03] a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo -- cakkhudhaatu, ruupadhaatu, cakkhuvi~n~naa.nadhaatu, sotadhaatu, saddadhaatu,  sotavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, ghaanadhaatu, gandhadhaatu, ghaanavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, jivhaadhaatu, rasadhaatu,  jivhaavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, kaayadhaatu, pho.t.thabbadhaatu, kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu, manodhaatu,  dhammadhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.
text.661: [03] 186^b^.^eb^ a.t.thaarasanna.m dhaatuuna.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.663: [03] 187^b^.^eb^ so.lasa ^a^M0.0093^ea^ dhaatuyo abyaakataa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa,  siyaa abyaakataa. dasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi,  ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi.  pa~nca dhaatuyo ^a^V0.0102^ea^ adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa ^a^T0.0113^ea^  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi.
text.664: [03] dasa dhaatuyo nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. pa~nca ^a^P0.0091^ea^ dhaatuyo vipaakaa.  manodhaatu siyaa vipaakaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa  vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa.
text.665: [03] dasa dhaatuyo upaadinnupaadaaniyaa. saddadhaatu anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. pa~nca dhaatuyo  siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.666: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. pannarasa  dhaatuyo avitakkaavicaaraa. manodhaatu savitakkasavicaaraa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa  savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa. dhammadhaatu  siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa, siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``savitakkasavicaaraa''tipi, ``avitakkavicaaramattaa''tipi, ``avitakkaavicaaraa''tipi.  dasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi,   ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi ^a^T0.0114^ea^.  pa~nca dhaatuyo upekkhaasahagataa. kaayavi~n~naa.nadhaatu na piitisahagataa, siyaa ^a^M0.0094^ea^  sukhasahagataa, na upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhasahagataa''ti. dve dhaatuyo  siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi, ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.
text.667: [03] so.lasa ^a^V0.0103^ea^ dhaatuyo neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. dve dhaatuyo siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa  apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. so.lasa dhaatuyo nevasekkhanaasekkhaa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa, siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa.
text.668: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo parittaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa, siyaa appamaa.naa.  dasa ^a^P0.0092^ea^ dhaatuyo anaaramma.naa. cha dhaatuyo parittaaramma.naa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa  parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa, siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi, ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi. so.lasa  dhaatuyo majjhimaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa hiinaa, siyaa majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa. so.lasa  dhaatuyo aniyataa. dve ^a^T0.0115^ea^ dhaatuyo siyaa micchattaniyataa, siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa  aniyataa.
text.669: [03] dasa dhaatuyo anaaramma.naa. cha dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi,  ``maggaadhipatino''tipi. dve dhaatuyo siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa maggahetukaa,  siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi,  ``maggaadhipatino''tipi. dasa dhaatuyo siyaa uppannaa, siyaa uppaadino, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``anuppannaa''ti. saddadhaatu siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``uppaadinii''ti. cha dhaatuyo siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino.  dhammadhaatu siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadinii, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``uppannaa''tipi, ``anuppannaa''tipi, ``uppaadinii''tipi.
text.67: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo ruupakkhandho? ekavidhena ruupakkhandho -- sabba.m ruupa.m na hetu, ahetuka.m,  hetuvippayutta.m, sappaccaya.m, sa"nkhata.m, ruupa.m, lokiya.m, saasava.m, sa.myojaniya.m, ganthaniya.m,  oghaniya.m, yoganiya.m, niivara.niya.m, paraama.t.tha.m, upaadaaniya.m, sa.mkilesika.m, abyaakata.m,  anaaramma.na.m, acetasika.m, cittavippayutta.m, nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m, asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m,  na savitakkasavicaara.m, na avitakkavicaaramatta.m, avitakkaavicaara.m, na piitisahagata.m,  na sukhasahagata.m, na upekkhaasahagata.m, neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m, neva dassanena na  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m, nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii, nevasekkhanaasekkha.m, paritta.m,  kaamaavacara.m, na ruupaavacara.m, na aruupaavacara.m, pariyaapanna.m, no apariyaapanna.m, aniyata.m, aniyyaanika.m,  uppanna.m, chahi vi~n~naa.nehi ^a^T0.0018^ea^ vi~n~neyya.m, anicca.m, jaraabhibhuuta.m. eva.m ekavidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.670: [03] sattarasa ^a^M0.0095^ea^ dhaatuyo siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. dhammadhaatu  siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``atiitaa''tipi,  ``anaagataa''tipi, ``paccuppannaa''tipi. dasa dhaatuyo anaaramma.naa. cha dhaatuyo paccuppannaaramma.naa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa anaagataaramma.naa, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa ^a^V0.0104^ea^,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi;  siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa.
text.671: [03] dasa dhaatuyo anaaramma.naa. cha dhaatuyo siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa  ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa,  siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa ^a^T0.0116^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi,   ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi. ruupadhaatu sanidassanasappa.tighaa.   nava dhaatuyo anidassanaappa.tighaa. a.t.tha dhaatuyo anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.673: [03] 188^b^.^eb^ sattarasa dhaatuyo na hetuu. dhammadhaatu siyaa hetu, siyaa na hetu. so.lasa  dhaatuyo ahetukaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  ahetukaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo hetuvippayuttaa  ^a^P0.0093^ea^. dve dhaatuyo siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  na vattabbaa -- ``hetu ceva sahetukaa caa''tipi, ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi.  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``hetu ceva sahetukaa caa''ti, siyaa sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti. dhammadhaatu  siyaa hetu ceva sahetukaa ca, siyaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``hetu ceva sahetukaa caa''tipi, ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. so.lasa  dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetuu''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayuttaa ca, siyaa hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayuttaa ^a^M0.0096^ea^ caa''tipi,  ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo na hetuahetukaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  siyaa na hetusahetukaa, siyaa na hetuahetukaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa na hetusahetukaa,  siyaa ^a^T0.0117^ea^ na hetuahetukaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``na hetusahetukaa''tipi,   ``na hetuahetukaa''tipi.
text.674: [03] sattarasa ^a^V0.0105^ea^ dhaatuyo sappaccayaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sappaccayaa, siyaa appaccayaa. sattarasa dhaatuyo  sa"nkhataa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sa"nkhataa, siyaa asa"nkhataa. ruupadhaatu sanidassanaa. sattarasa  dhaatuyo anidassanaa. dasa dhaatuyo sappa.tighaa. a.t.tha dhaatuyo appa.tighaa. dasa dhaatuyo  ruupaa. satta dhaatuyo aruupaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa ruupaa, siyaa aruupaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  lokiyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa lokiyaa, siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa,  kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.675: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no aasavaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa aasavaa, siyaa no aasavaa. so.lasa  dhaatuyo saasavaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa saasavaa, siyaa anaasavaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo aasavavippayuttaa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, ``saasavaa ceva ^a^P0.0094^ea^ no ca aasavaa''. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  na vattabbaa -- ``aasavo ceva saasavaa caa''ti, siyaa saasavaa ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa aasavo ceva saasavaa  ca, siyaa saasavaa ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavo ceva saasavaa caa''tipi,  ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavo''tipi.
text.676: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayuttaa  ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na ^a^T0.0118^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavasampayuttaa  ceva no ca aasavo''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa aasavo ceva aasavasampayuttaa ca, siyaa  aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayuttaa  caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavo''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo aasavavippayuttasaasavaa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa ^a^M0.0097^ea^,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.
text.677: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no sa.myojanaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa no sa.myojana.m. so.lasa  dhaatuyo sa.myojaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa. so.lasa ^a^V0.0106^ea^   dhaatuyo sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, sa.myojaniyaa  ceva no ca sa.myojanaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyaa  caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojaniyaa  ceva no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammadhaatu siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyaa ca, siyaa  sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniyaa  caa''tipi, ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``sa.myojanaa ^a^T0.0119^ea^ ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no  ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca sa.myojana''nti. dhammadhaatu siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa ca,  siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojana~nceva  sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojana''ntipi.  so.lasa dhaatuyo sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa. dve ^a^P0.0095^ea^ dhaatuyo siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa,  siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi,  ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi.
text.678: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no ganthaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho. so.lasa dhaatuyo  ganthaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa ganthaniyaa, siyaa aganthaniyaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo ganthavippayuttaa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo ^a^M0.0098^ea^  na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  na vattabbaa -- ``gantho ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthaniyaa ceva no ca gantho,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca gantho''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa gantho ceva  ganthaniyaa ca, siyaa ganthaniyaa ceva ^a^T0.0120^ea^ no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``gantho ceva  ganthaniyaa caa''tipi, ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca gantho''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa ^a^V0.0107^ea^ caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi.  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayuttaa  ceva no ca gantho, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca gantho''ti. dhammadhaatu  siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayuttaa ca, siyaa ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca gantho, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no  ca gantho''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa,  siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi,  ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.
text.679: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa. dhammadhaatu  siyaa niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. so.lasa dhaatuyo niivara.niyaa. dve dhaatuyo  siyaa niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo niivara.navippayuttaa. dve dhaatuyo  siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa  ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.niyaa ceva no ca  niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.na''nti. dhammadhaatu  siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyaa ca, siyaa niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.na.m ^a^T0.0121^ea^, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.niyaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi.  so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa  ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.nasampayuttaa  ceva no ^a^M0.0099^ea^ ca niivara.na''nti. dhammadhaatu siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayuttaa  ca, siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.na~nceva  niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. so.lasa  dhaatuyo niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa,  siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi,  ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.
text.68: [03] duvidhena ^a^P0.0013^ea^ ruupakkhandho -- atthi ruupa.m upaadaa, atthi ruupa.m no upaadaa {nupaadaa  (sii0 ka0)}. atthi ruupa.m upaadinna.m, atthi ruupa.m anupaadinna.m. atthi ruupa.m upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi ruupa.m  anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. atthi ruupa.m sanidassana.m, atthi ruupa.m anidassana.m. atthi ruupa.m  sappa.tigha.m, atthi ruupa.m appa.tigha.m. atthi ruupa.m indriya.m, atthi ruupa.m na indriya.m.  atthi ruupa.m mahaabhuuta.m, atthi ruupa.m na mahaabhuuta.m. atthi ruupa.m vi~n~natti, atthi ruupa.m na  vi~n~natti. atthi ruupa.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m, atthi ruupa.m na cittasamu.t.thaana.m. atthi ruupa.m cittasahabhu,  atthi ruupa.m na cittasahabhu. atthi ruupa.m cittaanuparivatti, atthi ruupa.m na ^a^M0.0014^ea^  cittaanuparivatti. atthi ruupa.m ajjhattika.m, atthi ruupa.m baahira.m. atthi ruupa.m o.laarika.m,  atthi ruupa.m sukhuma.m. atthi ruupa.m duure, atthi ruupa.m santike...pe0... atthi ruupa.m  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, atthi ruupa.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. eva.m duvidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.680: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no paraamaasaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso.  so.lasa dhaatuyo paraama.t.thaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa paraama.t.thaa, siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  paraamaasavippayuttaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu siyaa paraamaasasampayuttaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa.  dhammadhaatu siyaa paraamaasasampayuttaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``paraamaasasampayuttaa''tipi ^a^V0.0108^ea^, ``paraamaasavippayuttaa''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caati paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu  na ^a^T0.0122^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaaso,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaaso''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa paraamaaso  ceva paraama.t.thaa ca, siyaa paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaaso, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaaso  ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''tipi, ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaaso''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo  paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi, ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.
text.681: [03] dasa dhaatuyo anaaramma.naa. satta dhaatuyo saaramma.naa. dhammadhaatu siyaa saaramma.naa, siyaa  anaaramma.naa. satta dhaatuyo cittaa. ekaadasa dhaatuyo no cittaa. sattarasa dhaatuyo  acetasikaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa cetasikaa, siyaa acetasikaa. dasa dhaatuyo cittavippayuttaa.  dhammadhaatu siyaa cittasampayuttaa, siyaa cittavippayuttaa. satta dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``cittena sampayuttaa''tipi, ``cittena vippayuttaa''tipi. dasa dhaatuyo cittavisa.msa.t.thaa.  dhammadhaatu siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thaa ^a^M0.0100^ea^, siyaa cittavisa.msa.t.thaa. satta dhaatuyo na  vattabbaa -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.thaa''tipi, ``cittena visa.msa.t.thaa''tipi.
text.682: [03] dvaadasa dhaatuyo no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. cha dhaatuyo siyaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa.  sattarasa ^a^P0.0096^ea^ dhaatuyo no cittasahabhuno. dhammadhaatu siyaa cittasahabhuu, siyaa  no cittasahabhuu. sattarasa dhaatuyo no cittaanuparivattino. dhammadhaatu siyaa cittaanuparivattii,  siyaa no cittaanuparivattii. sattarasa dhaatuyo no ^a^T0.0123^ea^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. dhammadhaatu  siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. sattarasa dhaatuyo no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno.  dhammadhaatu siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. sattarasa  dhaatuyo no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. dhammadhaatu siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattii,  siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattii. dvaadasa dhaatuyo ajjhattikaa. cha dhaatuyo  baahiraa.
text.683: [03] nava ^a^V0.0109^ea^ dhaatuyo upaadaa. a.t.tha dhaatuyo no upaadaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa upaadaa, siyaa no upaadaa.  dasa dhaatuyo upaadinnaa. saddadhaatu anupaadinnaa. sattadhaatuyo siyaa upaadinnaa,  siyaa anupaadinnaa. sattarasa dhaatuyo no upaadaanaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa upaadaana.m,  siyaa no upaadaana.m. so.lasa dhaatuyo upaadaaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa upaadaaniyaa,  siyaa anupaadaaniyaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo upaadaanavippayuttaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa,  siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa  caa''ti, ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa --  ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaana.m,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaana''nti. dhammadhaatu siyaa upaadaana~nceva  upaadaaniyaa ca, siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva ^a^T0.0124^ea^ no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaana~nceva  upaadaaniyaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi.
text.684: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa ^a^M0.0101^ea^ upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaana''nti. dhammadhaatu siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayuttaa  ca, siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaana~nceva  upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi.  so.lasa dhaatuyo upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi,  ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.
text.685: [03] sattarasa dhaatuyo no kilesaa. dhammadhaatu siyaa kilesaa, siyaa no kilesaa. so.lasa  dhaatuyo sa.mkilesikaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkilesikaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo asa.mkili.t.thaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo kilesavippayuttaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kilesasampayuttaa, siyaa  kilesavippayuttaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva ^a^T0.0125^ea^ sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti,  sa.mkilesikaa ^a^V0.0110^ea^ ceva no ca kilesaa. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``kileso  ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kileso''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa  kileso ceva sa.mkilesikaa ca, siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''tipi, ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva  no ca kileso''tipi.
text.686: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.thaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu na vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa  caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkili.t.thaa  ceva no ca kileso''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa ca, siyaa  sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa  caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kileso''tipi. so.lasa dhaatuyo na vattabbaa --  ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi.  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu ^a^P0.0097^ea^ na ^a^M0.0102^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca kileso''ti. dhammadhaatu siyaa kileso ceva kilesasampayuttaa ca,  siyaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kileso ceva  kilesasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca ^a^T0.0126^ea^ kileso''tipi. so.lasa  dhaatuyo kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa''tipi,  ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa''tipi.
text.687: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo na dassanena pahaatabbaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa  na dassanena pahaatabbaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.  dve dhaatuyo siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa,  siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.688: [03] pannarasa dhaatuyo avitakkaa. manodhaatu savitakkaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa savitakkaa,  siyaa ^a^V0.0111^ea^ avitakkaa. pannarasa dhaatuyo avicaaraa. manodhaatu savicaaraa. dve dhaatuyo  siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. so.lasa dhaatuyo appiitikaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa  sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. so.lasa dhaatuyo na piitisahagataa. dve dhaatuyo  siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. pannarasa dhaatuyo na sukhasahagataa. tisso  dhaatuyo siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. ekaadasa dhaatuyo na upekkhaasahagataa.  pa~nca dhaatuyo upekkhaasahagataa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa ^a^T0.0127^ea^ upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.689: [03] so.lasa dhaatuyo kaamaavacaraa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa kaamaavacaraa, siyaa na kaamaavacaraa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo na ruupaavacaraa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa ruupaavacaraa, siyaa na ruupaavacaraa. so.lasa  dhaatuyo na aruupaavacaraa. dve ^a^M0.0103^ea^ dhaatuyo siyaa aruupaavacaraa, siyaa na aruupaavacaraa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo pariyaapannaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo aniyyaanikaa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa niyyaanikaa, siyaa aniyyaanikaa.  so.lasa dhaatuyo aniyataa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. so.lasa dhaatuyo  sauttaraa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sauttaraa, siyaa anuttaraa. so.lasa ^a^P0.0098^ea^ dhaatuyo  ara.naa. dve dhaatuyo siyaa sara.naa, siyaa ara.naati.
text.694: [03] 189^b^.^eb^ cattaari ^a^M0.0104^ea^ ^a^P0.0099^ea^ ^a^V0.0112^ea^   ariyasaccaani -- dukkha.m ariyasacca.m, dukkhasamudaya.m {dukkhasamudayo (syaa0)}   ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodha.m {dukkhanirodho (syaa0)} ariyasacca.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m.
text.696: [03] 190^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m dukkha.m ariyasacca.m? jaatipi dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, mara.nampi  dukkha.m, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaapi dukkhaa, appiyehi ^a^T0.0128^ea^ sampayogo dukkho,  piyehi vippayogo dukkho, ya.m piccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m, sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa  dukkhaa.
text.697: [03] 191^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaati  sa~njaati okkanti abhinibbatti khandhaana.m paatubhaavo aayatanaana.m pa.tilaabho -- aya.m  vuccati ``jaati''.
text.698: [03] 192^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa jaraa? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa  kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako -- aya.m vuccati  ``jaraa''.
text.699: [03] 193^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m mara.na.m? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti  cavanataa ^a^V0.0113^ea^ bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaalakiriyaa khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo  jiivitindriyassupacchedo -- ida.m vuccati ``mara.na.m''.
text.7: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0002^ea^ katamo ruupakkhandho? ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m  vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike  vaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa abhisa"nkhipitvaa -- aya.m vuccati ruupakkhandho.
text.70: [03] tividhena ruupakkhandho -- ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadaa, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m  atthi upaadaa, atthi no upaadaa. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadinna.m, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m  baahira.m ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m upaadinnupaadaaniya.m,  ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m...pe0...  ya.m ta.m ruupa.m ajjhattika.m ta.m na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, ya.m ta.m ruupa.m baahira.m ta.m   ^a^T0.0019^ea^ atthi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, atthi na kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. eva.m tividhena ruupakkhandho.
text.700: [03] 194^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo soko? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa  rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa ^a^P0.0100^ea^ di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa  a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa soko socanaa  socitatta.m antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhaayanaa domanassa.m sokasalla.m --  aya.m vuccati ``soko''.
text.701: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0105^ea^ katamo paridevo? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa bhogabyasanena  vaa phu.t.thassa rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa siilabyasanena vaa ^a^T0.0129^ea^ phu.t.thassa di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa  a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aadevo paridevo  aadevanaa paridevanaa aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m vaacaa palaapo vippalaapo laalappo  laalappanaa laalappitatta.m {laalapo laalapanaa laalapitatta.m (syaa0)} -- aya.m vuccati ``paridevo''.
text.702: [03] 196^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m dukkha.m? ya.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``dukkha.m''.
text.703: [03] 197^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m domanassa.m? ya.m cetasika.m asaata.m cetasika.m dukkha.m cetosamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``domanassa.m''.
text.704: [03] 198^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo upaayaaso? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa  rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa a~n~natara~n~natarena  byasanena samannaagatassa a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aayaaso upaayaaso aayaasitatta.m  upaayaasitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati ``upaayaaso''.
text.705: [03] 199^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo appiyehi sampayogo dukkho? idha yassa te honti ani.t.thaa akantaa  ^a^V0.0114^ea^ amanaapaa ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa, ye vaa panassa te honti anatthakaamaa ahitakaamaa  aphaasukakaamaa ayogakkhemakaamaa; yaa tehi sa"ngati samaagamo samodhaana.m missiibhaavo --  aya.m vuccati ``appiyehi sampayogo dukkho''.
text.706: [03] 200^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0130^ea^ katamo piyehi vippayogo dukkho? idha yassa te honti i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa  ruupaa saddaa gandhaa rasaa pho.t.thabbaa, ye vaa panassa te honti atthakaamaa hitakaamaa phaasukakaamaa  yogakkhemakaamaa maataa vaa pitaa vaa bhaataa vaa bhaginii vaa mittaa vaa amaccaa vaa ~naatii  vaa saalohitaa ^a^M0.0106^ea^ vaa; yaa tehi asa"ngati asamaagamo asamodhaana.m amissiibhaavo --  aya.m vuccati ``piyehi vippayogo dukkho''.
text.707: [03] 201^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0101^ea^ katama.m yampiccha.m na labhati tampi dukkha.m? jaatidhammaana.m sattaana.m  eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- ``aho vata, maya.m na jaatidhammaa assaama; na ca, vata, no jaati  aagaccheyyaa''ti! na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m. idampi ``yampiccha.m na labhati tampi  dukkha.m''.
text.708: [03] jaraadhammaana.m sattaana.m...pe0... byaadhidhammaana.m sattaana.m...pe0... mara.nadhammaana.m sattaana.m...pe0...  sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaana.m sattaana.m eva.m icchaa uppajjati -- ``aho vata,  maya.m na sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasadhammaa assaama; na ca, vata, no sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa  aagaccheyyu''nti! na kho paneta.m icchaaya pattabba.m. idampi ``yampiccha.m na labhati tampi  dukkha.m''.
text.709: [03] 202^b^.^eb^ tattha katame sa.mkhittena pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa? seyyathida.m -- ruupupaadaanakkhandho,  vedanupaadaanakkhandho, sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho, sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho, vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho.  ime vuccanti ``sa.mkhittena ^a^T0.0131^ea^ pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa dukkhaa''.
text.71: [03] catubbidhena ruupakkhandho -- ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m;  ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi upaadinna.m, atthi anupaadinna.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa  ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa  ta.m atthi upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m  atthi sappa.tigha.m, atthi appa.tigha.m; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi sappa.tigha.m, atthi  appa.tigha.m ^a^P0.0014^ea^. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa ta.m atthi o.laarika.m, atthi sukhuma.m;  ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi o.laarika.m, atthi sukhuma.m. ya.m ta.m ruupa.m upaadaa  ta.m atthi duure, atthi santike; ya.m ta.m ruupa.m no upaadaa ta.m atthi duure, atthi santike...pe0...  di.t.tha.m, suta.m, muta.m, vi~n~naata.m ruupa.m. eva.m catubbidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.712: [03] 203^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0115^ea^ katama.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m? yaaya.m   ta.nhaa ponobhavikaa {ponobbhavikaa (syaa0 ka0)} nandiraagasahagataa  tatratatraabhinandinii, seyyathida.m -- kaamata.nhaa, bhavata.nhaa, vibhavata.nhaa.
text.713: [03] saa kho panesaa ta.nhaa kattha uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, kattha nivisamaanaa nivisati? ya.m  loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati.
text.714: [03] ki~nca loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m? cakkhu.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa  uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. sota.m loke...pe0... ^a^M0.0107^ea^ ghaana.m loke...  jivhaa loke... kaayo loke... mano loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.715: [03] ruupaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati. saddaa loke...pe0... gandhaa loke... rasaa loke... pho.t.thabbaa loke...  dhammaa loke ^a^P0.0102^ea^ piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati,  ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.716: [03] cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati,  ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. sotavi~n~naa.na.m loke...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m loke...  jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m loke... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m loke... manovi~n~naa.na.m loke piyaruupa.m  saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.717: [03] cakkhusamphasso loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha  nivisamaanaa nivisati. sotasamphasso loke...pe0... ghaanasamphasso loke... jivhaasamphasso  loke... kaayasamphasso loke... manosamphasso loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa  ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha ^a^T0.0132^ea^ nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.718: [03] cakkhusamphassajaa ^a^V0.0116^ea^ vedanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati,  ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. sotasamphassajaa vedanaa loke...pe0... ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa loke... jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa  loke... manosamphassajaa vedanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa  uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.719: [03] ruupasa~n~naa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati. saddasa~n~naa loke...pe0... gandhasa~n~naa loke... rasasa~n~naa loke... pho.t.thabbasa~n~naa  loke... dhammasa~n~naa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati,  ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.72: [03] pa~ncavidhena ruupakkhandho -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, ya~nca  ruupa.m upaadaa. eva.m pa~ncavidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.720: [03] ruupasa~ncetanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati. saddasa~ncetanaa loke...pe0... gandhasa~ncetanaa ^a^M0.0108^ea^ loke... rasasa~ncetanaa  loke... pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaa loke... dhammasa~ncetanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa  ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.721: [03] ruupata.nhaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa  nivisati. saddata.nhaa loke...pe0... gandhata.nhaa loke... rasata.nhaa loke...  pho.t.thabbata.nhaa loke... dhammata.nhaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa  uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.722: [03] ruupavitakko loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha  nivisamaanaa nivisati ^a^T0.0133^ea^. saddavitakko loke...pe0... gandhavitakko loke... rasavitakko  loke... pho.t.thabbavitakko loke... dhammavitakko loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa  ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.723: [03] ruupavicaaro ^a^P0.0103^ea^ loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati,  ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. saddavicaaro loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  uppajjamaanaa uppajjati ^a^V0.0117^ea^, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. gandhavicaaro loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m.  etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati. rasavicaaro loke  piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.  pho.t.thabbavicaaro loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati, ettha  nivisamaanaa nivisati. dhammavicaaro loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa  uppajjati, ettha nivisamaanaa nivisati.
text.726: [03] 204^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m? yo tassaayeva ta.nhaaya asesaviraaganirodho  caago pa.tinissaggo mutti anaalayo.
text.727: [03] saa ^a^M0.0109^ea^ kho panesaa ta.nhaa kattha pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, kattha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati?  ya.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m, etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa  nirujjhati.
text.728: [03] ki~nca loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m? cakkhu.m loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa  pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati. sota.m loke...pe0... ghaana.m  ^a^T0.0134^ea^ loke... jivhaa loke... kaayo loke... mano loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.729: [03] ruupaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa  nirujjhati. saddaa loke...pe0... gandhaa loke... rasaa loke... pho.t.thabbaa loke...  dhammaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa  nirujjhati.
text.73: [03] chabbidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m,  jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m. eva.m chabbidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.730: [03] cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V0.0118^ea^ loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha  nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati. sotavi~n~naa.na.m loke...pe0... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m loke...  jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m loke... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m loke... manovi~n~naa.na.m loke piyaruupa.m  saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.731: [03] cakkhusamphasso loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa  nirujjhati. sotasamphasso loke...pe0... ghaanasamphasso loke... jivhaasamphasso  loke... kaayasamphasso loke... manosamphasso loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa  ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.732: [03] cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati,  ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati. sotasamphassajaa vedanaa loke...pe0... ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa loke... jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa loke... kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa  loke... manosamphassajaa vedanaa loke ^a^P0.0104^ea^ piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.733: [03] ruupasa~n~naa loke... ^a^T0.0135^ea^ saddasa~n~naa loke... gandhasa~n~naa loke... rasasa~n~naa loke... pho.t.thabbasa~n~naa  loke... dhammasa~n~naa loke piyaruupa.m ^a^M0.0110^ea^ saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa  pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.734: [03] ruupasa~ncetanaa loke... saddasa~ncetanaa loke... gandhasa~ncetanaa loke... rasasa~ncetanaa loke...  pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaa loke... dhammasa~ncetanaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.735: [03] ruupata.nhaa loke... saddata.nhaa loke... gandhata.nhaa loke... rasata.nhaa loke...  pho.t.thabbata.nhaa loke... dhammata.nhaa loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa  pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.736: [03] ruupavitakko ^a^V0.0119^ea^ loke... saddavitakko loke... gandhavitakko loke... rasavitakko  loke... pho.t.thabbavitakko loke... dhammavitakko loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa  ta.nhaa pahiiyamaanaa pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.737: [03] ruupavicaaro loke... saddavicaaro loke... gandhavicaaro loke... rasavicaaro loke...  pho.t.thabbavicaaro loke... dhammavicaaro loke piyaruupa.m saataruupa.m. etthesaa ta.nhaa  pahiiyamaanaa ^a^T0.0136^ea^ pahiiyati, ettha nirujjhamaanaa nirujjhati.
text.74: [03] sattavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m,  jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manodhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuvi~n~neyya.m  ruupa.m. eva.m sattavidhena ruupakkhandho ^a^T0.0020^ea^.
text.740: [03] 205^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m? ayameva ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko  maggo, seyyathida.m -- sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo,  sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.
text.741: [03] tattha katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? dukkhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe ~naa.na.m,  dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''.
text.742: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0111^ea^ katamo sammaasa"nkappo? nekkhammasa"nkappo, abyaapaadasa"nkappo, avihi.msaasa"nkappo --  aya.m vuccati ``sammaasa"nkappo''.
text.743: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0105^ea^ katamaa sammaavaacaa? musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii,  pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaacaa''.
