text.744: [03] tattha katamo sammaakammanto? paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa  verama.nii -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaakammanto''.
text.745: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0120^ea^ katamo sammaaaajiivo? idha ariyasaavako micchaaaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivika.m  kappeti -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaaaajiivo''.
text.746: [03] tattha ^a^T0.0137^ea^ katamo sammaavaayaamo? idha bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m  anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati.  uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m  aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati. anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya  chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati. uppannaana.m  kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa  chanda.m janeti, vaayamati, viiriya.m aarabhati, citta.m pagga.nhaati, padahati. aya.m vuccati  ``sammaavaayaamo''.
text.747: [03] tattha katamaa sammaasati? idha bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano  satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu...pe0... citte...pe0... dhammesu  dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.  aya.m vuccati ``sammaasati''.
text.748: [03] tattha katamo sammaasamaadhi? idha bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi, vivicca akusalehi  dhammehi, savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.  vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa, ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m, cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m  avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa,  upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m  ariyaa aacikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti, tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja  ^a^T0.0138^ea^ viharati. sukhassa ^a^M0.0112^ea^ ca pahaanaa, dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva   somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m   upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''.
text.75: [03] a.t.thavidhena ^a^M0.0015^ea^ ^a^V0.0016^ea^ ruupakkhandho -- cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, sotavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, ghaanavi~n~neyya.m  ruupa.m, jivhaavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, kaayavi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m atthi sukhasamphassa.m, atthi dukkhasamphassa.m,  manodhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatuvi~n~neyya.m ruupa.m. eva.m a.t.thavidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.752: [03] 206^b^.^eb^ cattaari ^a^V0.0121^ea^ saccaani -- dukkha.m, dukkhasamudayo, dukkhanirodho, dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa.
text.753: [03] tattha katamo dukkhasamudayo? ta.nhaa -- aya.m vuccati ``dukkhasamudayo''.
text.754: [03] tattha katama.m dukkha.m? avasesaa ca kilesaa, avasesaa ca akusalaa dhammaa, tii.ni ca  kusalamuulaani saasavaani, avasesaa ca saasavaa kusalaa dhammaa, saasavaa ca kusalaakusalaana.m  dhammaana.m vipaakaa, ye ca dhammaa kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca kammavipaakaa,  sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ``dukkha.m''.
text.755: [03] tattha katamo dukkhanirodho? ta.nhaaya pahaana.m -- aya.m vuccati ``dukkhanirodho''.
text.756: [03] tattha katamaa dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa,  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m ^a^T0.0139^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye a.t.tha"ngiko maggo hoti sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi.
text.757: [03] tattha katamaa sammaadi.t.thi? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi  dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaadi.t.thi''.
text.758: [03] tattha katamo sammaasa"nkappo? yo takko vitakko...pe0... sammaasa"nkappo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasa"nkappo''.
text.759: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0113^ea^ katamaa sammaavaacaa? yaa catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati  verama.nii {verama.ni (ka0) evamuparipi} akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaavaacaa magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaacaa''.
text.76: [03] navavidhena ruupakkhandho -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m,  kaayindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, ya~nca ruupa.m na indriya.m.  eva.m navavidhena ruupakkhandho.
text.760: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0122^ea^ katamo sammaakammanto? yaa tiihi kaayaduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati  verama.nii akiriyaa akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaakammanto  ^a^P0.0107^ea^ magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaakammanto''.
text.761: [03] tattha katamo sammaaaajiivo? yaa micchaa aajiivaa aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii akiriyaa  akara.na.m anajjhaapatti velaaanatikkamo setughaato sammaaaajiivo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m --  aya.m vuccati ^a^T0.0140^ea^ ``sammaaaajiivo''.
text.762: [03] tattha katamo sammaavaayaamo? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho {viriyaarambho (sii0 syaa0)}   ...pe0... sammaavaayaamo viiriyasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaavaayaamo''.
text.763: [03] tattha katamaa sammaasati? yaa sati anussati...pe0... sammaasati satisambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m  maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasati''.
text.764: [03] tattha katamo sammaasamaadhi? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti...pe0... sammaasamaadhi samaadhisambojjha"ngo  magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- aya.m vuccati ``sammaasamaadhi''. aya.m vuccati ``dukkhanirodhagaaminii  pa.tipadaa''. avasesaa dhammaa dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya sampayuttaa.
text.765: [03] 207^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo dukkhasamudayo? ta.nhaa ca avasesaa ca kilesaa -- aya.m vuccati  ``dukkhasamudayo''.
text.766: [03] tattha katama.m dukkha.m? avasesaa ca akusalaa dhammaa, tii.ni ca kusalamuulaani saasavaani,  avasesaa ca saasavaa kusalaa dhammaa, saasavaa ca kusalaakusalaana.m dhammaana.m vipaakaa, ye  ca dhammaa kiriyaa neva kusalaa naakusalaa na ca kammavipaakaa, sabba~nca ruupa.m -- ida.m  vuccati ``dukkha.m''.
text.767: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0114^ea^ ^a^V0.0123^ea^ katamo dukkhanirodho? ta.nhaaya ca, avasesaana~nca kilesaana.m   ^a^T0.0141^ea^ pahaana.m -- aya.m vuccati ``dukkhanirodho''.
text.768: [03] tattha katamaa dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa? idha bhikkhu yasmi.m samaye lokuttara.m  jhaana.m bhaaveti niyyaanika.m apacayagaami.m di.t.thigataana.m pahaanaaya pa.thamaaya bhuumiyaa pattiyaa,  vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati dukkhapa.tipada.m dandhaabhi~n~na.m,  tasmi.m samaye a.t.tha"ngiko maggo hoti -- sammaadi.t.thi...pe0... sammaasamaadhi. aya.m  vuccati -- ``dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''. avasesaa ^a^P0.0108^ea^ dhammaa dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa  pa.tipadaaya sampayuttaa.
text.769: [03] 208^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo dukkhasamudayo? ta.nhaa ca avasesaa ca kilesaa, avasesaa ca akusalaa  dhammaa -- aya.m vuccati ``dukkhasamudayo''.

text.809: [03] 217^b^.^eb^ samudayasacca.m ^a^M0.0119^ea^ akusala.m. maggasacca.m kusala.m. nirodhasacca.m abyaakata.m.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa kusala.m, siyaa akusala.m, siyaa abyaakata.m. dve saccaa siyaa sukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya ^a^P0.0113^ea^ vedanaaya sampayuttaa. nirodhasacca.m  na vattabba.m -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi,  ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m,  siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa  na vattabba.m -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi,  ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi. dve saccaa vipaakadhammadhammaa. nirodhasacca.m  nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa vipaaka.m, siyaa vipaakadhammadhamma.m,  siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhamma.m. samudayasacca.m ^a^V0.0129^ea^ anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. dve saccaa  anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniya.m, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m.
text.81: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0015^ea^ katamo vedanaakkhandho? ekavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- phassasampayutto.
text.810: [03] samudayasacca.m sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m. dve saccaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. dukkhasacca.m ^a^T0.0149^ea^  siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m. samudayasacca.m savitakkasavicaara.m.  nirodhasacca.m avitakkaavicaara.m. maggasacca.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m, siyaa avitakkavicaaramatta.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``savitakkasavicaara''ntipi, ``avitakkavicaaramatta''ntipi,  ``avitakkaavicaara''ntipi. dve saccaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa  upekkhaasahagataa. nirodhasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``piitisahagata''ntipi, ``sukhasahagata''ntipi,  ``upekkhaasahagata''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa piitisahagata.m, siyaa sukhasahagata.m, siyaa  upekkhaasahagata.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``piitisahagata''ntipi, ``sukhasahagata''ntipi, ``upekkhaasahagata''ntipi.
text.811: [03] dve saccaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. samudayasacca.m siyaa dassanena pahaatabba.m,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa dassanena pahaatabba.m, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m,  siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m. dve saccaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.  samudayasacca.m siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetuka.m, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m ^a^M0.0120^ea^.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetuka.m, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m, siyaa neva  dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m. samudayasacca.m aacayagaami. maggasacca.m apacayagaami.  nirodhasacca.m ^a^P0.0114^ea^ nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aacayagaami,  siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami. maggasacca.m sekkha.m. tii.ni saccaani nevasekkhanaasekkhaa.  samudayasacca.m paritta.m ^a^T0.0150^ea^. dve saccaa appamaa.naa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa paritta.m, siyaa  mahaggata.m. nirodhasacca.m anaaramma.na.m. maggasacca.m appamaa.naaramma.na.m. samudayasacca.m siyaa  parittaaramma.na.m, siyaa mahaggataaramma.na.m na appamaa.naaramma.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``parittaaramma.na''ntipi,  ``mahaggataaramma.na''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa parittaaramma.na.m, siyaa mahaggataaramma.na.m,  siyaa appamaa.naaramma.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``parittaaramma.na''ntipi, ``mahaggataaramma.na''ntipi,  ``appamaa.naaramma.na''ntipi.
text.812: [03] samudayasacca.m ^a^V0.0130^ea^ hiina.m. dve saccaa pa.niitaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa hiina.m, siyaa majjhima.m.  nirodhasacca.m aniyata.m. maggasacca.m sammattaniyata.m. dve saccaa siyaa micchattaniyataa,  siyaa aniyataa. nirodhasacca.m anaaramma.na.m. samudayasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``maggaaramma.na''ntipi,  ``maggahetuka''ntipi, ``maggaadhipatii''tipi. maggasacca.m na maggaaramma.na.m maggahetuka.m,  siyaa maggaadhipati, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``maggaadhipatii''ti. dukkhasacca.m siyaa maggaaramma.na.m  na maggahetuka.m, siyaa maggaadhipati, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``maggaaramma.na''ntipi, ``maggaadhipatii''tipi.  dve saccaa siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, na vattabbaa -- ``uppaadino''ti. nirodhasacca.m  na vattabba.m -- ``uppanna''ntipi, ``anuppanna''ntipi, ``uppaadii''tipi. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa uppanna.m, siyaa anuppanna.m, siyaa uppaadi. tii.ni saccaani siyaa atiitaa, siyaa  anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa. nirodhasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``atiita''ntipi, ``anaagata''ntipi,  ``paccuppanna''ntipi. nirodhasacca.m anaaramma.na.m. maggasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``atiitaaramma.na''ntipi,   ^a^T0.0151^ea^ ``anaagataaramma.na''ntipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.na''ntipi. dve saccaa siyaa atiitaaramma.naa,  siyaa anaagataaramma.naa, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi,  ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi. nirodhasacca.m ^a^P0.0115^ea^  bahiddhaa. tii.ni saccaani siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. nirodhasacca.m  anaaramma.na.m. maggasacca.m bahiddhaaramma.na.m. samudayasacca.m siyaa ajjhattaaramma.na.m, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.na.m,  siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.na.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa ajjhattaaramma.na.m, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.na.m,  siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.na.m ^a^M0.0121^ea^, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``ajjhattaaramma.na''ntipi,  ``bahiddhaaramma.na''ntipi, ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.na''ntipi. tii.ni saccaani anidassanaappa.tighaa.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa sanidassanasappa.tigha.m, siyaa anidassanasappa.tigha.m, siyaa anidassanaappa.tigha.m.
text.814: [03] 218^b^.^eb^ samudayasacca.m hetu. nirodhasacca.m na hetu. dve saccaa siyaa hetuu, siyaa  na hetuu. dve saccaa sahetukaa. nirodhasacca.m ahetuka.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sahetuka.m,  siyaa ahetuka.m. dve saccaa hetusampayuttaa. nirodhasacca.m hetuvippayutta.m. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa hetusampayutta.m, siyaa hetuvippayutta.m. samudayasacca.m hetu ceva sahetuka~nca.  nirodhasacca.m na vattabba.m ^a^V0.0131^ea^ -- ``hetu ceva sahetuka~ncaa''tipi, ``sahetuka~nceva na  ca hetuu''tipi. maggasacca.m siyaa hetu ceva sahetuka~nca, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na  ca hetu. dukkhasacca.m siyaa hetu ceva sahetuka~nca, siyaa sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu,  siyaa ^a^T0.0152^ea^ na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva sahetuka~ncaa''tipi, ``sahetuka~nceva na ca hetuu''tipi.  samudayasacca.m hetu ceva hetusampayutta~nca. nirodhasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``hetu  ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetuu''tipi. maggasacca.m  siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutta~nca, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetu. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa hetu ceva hetusampayutta~nca, siyaa hetusampayutta~nceva na ca hetu, siyaa  na vattabba.m -- ``hetu ceva hetusampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``hetusampayutta~nceva na ca  hetuu''tipi. nirodhasacca.m na hetuahetuka.m. samudayasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``na  hetusahetuka''ntipi, ``na hetuahetuka''ntipi. maggasacca.m siyaa na hetusahetuka.m,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``na hetusahetuka''ntipi, ``na hetuahetuka''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa na hetusahetuka.m, siyaa na hetuahetuka.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``na hetusahetuka''ntipi,  ``na hetuahetuka''ntipi.
text.815: [03] tii.ni ^a^P0.0116^ea^ saccaani sappaccayaa. nirodhasacca.m appaccaya.m. tii.ni saccaani  sa"nkhataa. nirodhasacca.m asa"nkhata.m. tii.ni saccaani anidassanaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa  sanidassana.m, siyaa anidassana.m. tii.ni saccaani appa.tighaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sappa.tigha.m,  siyaa appa.tigha.m. tii.ni saccaani aruupaani. dukkhasacca.m siyaa ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m.  dve saccaa ^a^M0.0122^ea^ lokiyaa. dve saccaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci  na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.816: [03] samudayasacca.m aasavo. dve saccaa no aasavaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aasavo, siyaa no  aasavo. dve saccaa saasavaa. dve saccaa anaasavaa ^a^T0.0153^ea^. samudayasacca.m aasavasampayutta.m.  dve saccaa aasavavippayuttaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aasavasampayutta.m, siyaa aasavavippayutta.m.  samudayasacca.m aasavo ceva saasava~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa  caa''tipi, ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aasavo ceva  saasava~nca, siyaa saasava~nceva no ca aasavo. samudayasacca.m aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~nca.  dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayuttaa  ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~nca ^a^V0.0132^ea^, siyaa  aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~ncaa''tipi,  ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''tipi. dve saccaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa. samudayasacca.m  na vattabba.m -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasava''ntipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasava''ntipi.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasava.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasava''ntipi,  ``aasavavippayuttaanaasava''ntipi.
text.817: [03] samudayasacca.m sa.myojana.m. dve saccaa no sa.myojanaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sa.myojana.m, siyaa  no sa.myojana.m. dve saccaa sa.myojaniyaa. dve saccaa asa.myojaniyaa. samudayasacca.m sa.myojanasampayutta.m.  dve saccaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sa.myojanasampayutta.m, siyaa sa.myojanavippayutta.m.  samudayasacca.m sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniya~nca. dve saccaa ^a^P0.0117^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa  ceva ^a^T0.0154^ea^ sa.myojaniyaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojaniya~nca, siyaa sa.myojaniya~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m. samudayasacca.m  sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa  caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa  sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~nca, siyaa sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m, siyaa  na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no  ca sa.myojana''ntipi ^a^M0.0123^ea^. dve saccaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa. samudayasacca.m  na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniya''ntipi, ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniya''ntipi.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniya.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniya''ntipi,  ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniya''ntipi.
text.818: [03] samudayasacca.m gantho. dve saccaa no ganthaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa gantho, siyaa no gantho.  dve saccaa ganthaniyaa. dve saccaa aganthaniyaa. dve saccaa ganthavippayuttaa. dve saccaa  siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. samudayasacca.m gantho ceva ganthaniya~nca.  dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''tipi, ``ganthaniyaa ceva no  ca ganthaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa gantho ceva ganthaniya~nca, siyaa ganthaniya~nceva no ca  gantho. samudayasacca.m gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~nca ^a^T0.0155^ea^, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva  ganthasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho''tipi. dve saccaa na vattabbaa --  ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi.  dukkhasacca.m ^a^V0.0133^ea^ siyaa gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~nca, siyaa ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``ganthasampayutta~nceva no  ca gantho''tipi. dve saccaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa. dve saccaa siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.
text.819: [03] samudayasacca.m ogho...pe0... yogo...pe0... niivara.na.m. dve saccaa no niivara.naa.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa niivara.na.m, siyaa no niivara.na.m. dve saccaa niivara.niyaa dve saccaa  aniivara.niyaa. samudayasacca.m ^a^P0.0118^ea^ niivara.nasampayutta.m. dve saccaa niivara.navippayuttaa.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa niivara.nasampayutta.m, siyaa niivara.navippayutta.m. samudayasacca.m niivara.na~nceva  niivara.niya~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.niyaa  ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.niya~nca, siyaa niivara.niya~nceva  no ca niivara.na.m. samudayasacca.m niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa --  ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~nca, siyaa niivara.nasampayutta~nceva  ^a^T0.0156^ea^ no ca niivara.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''tipi   ^a^M0.0124^ea^, ``niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na''ntipi. dve saccaa   niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa. samudayasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niya''ntipi,   ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niya''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niya.m,   siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niya''ntipi, ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niya''ntipi.
text.82: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko.
text.820: [03] tii.ni saccaani no paraamaasaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa paraamaaso, siyaa no paraamaaso.  dve saccaa paraama.t.thaa. dve saccaa aparaama.t.thaa. dve saccaa paraamaasavippayuttaa. samudayasacca.m  siyaa paraamaasasampayutta.m, siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa paraamaasasampayutta.m,  siyaa paraamaasavippayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaasasampayutta''ntipi, ``paraamaasavippayutta''ntipi.  samudayasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~ncaa''ti, paraama.t.tha~nceva no ca  paraamaaso. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''tipi ^a^V0.0134^ea^, ``paraama.t.thaa  ceva no ca paraamaasaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa paraamaaso ceva paraama.t.tha~nca, siyaa paraama.t.tha~nceva  no ca paraamaaso. dve saccaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa. dve saccaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi, ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.
text.821: [03] dve saccaa saaramma.naa. nirodhasacca.m anaaramma.na.m. dukkhasacca.m ^a^T0.0157^ea^ siyaa saaramma.na.m, siyaa  anaaramma.na.m. tii.ni saccaani no cittaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa citta.m, siyaa no citta.m.  dve saccaa cetasikaa. nirodhasacca.m acetasika.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cetasika.m, siyaa  acetasika.m. dve saccaa cittasampayuttaa ^a^P0.0119^ea^. nirodhasacca.m cittavippayutta.m.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasampayutta.m, siyaa cittavippayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``cittena  sampayutta''ntipi, ``cittena vippayutta''ntipi. dve saccaa cittasa.msa.t.thaa. nirodhasacca.m  cittavisa.msa.t.tha.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.tha.m, siyaa cittavisa.msa.t.tha.m, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``cittena sa.msa.t.tha''ntipi, ``cittena visa.msa.t.tha''ntipi. dve saccaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa.  nirodhasacca.m no cittasamu.t.thaana.m. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaana.m.  dve saccaa cittasahabhuno. nirodhasacca.m no cittasahabhuu. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasahabhuu,  siyaa no cittasahabhuu. dve saccaa cittaanuparivattino. nirodhasacca.m no cittaanuparivatti.  dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti. dve saccaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa.  nirodhasacca.m no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m,  siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m. dve saccaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. nirodhasacca.m  no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu, siyaa no  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. dve saccaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. nirodhasacca.m  no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti ^a^T0.0158^ea^. dukkhasacca.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti,  siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti. tii.ni saccaani baahiraa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa  ajjhatta.m, siyaa baahira.m.
text.822: [03] tii.ni saccaani no upaadaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadaa, siyaa no upaadaa. tii.ni saccaani  anupaadinnaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadinna.m, siyaa anupaadinna.m. samudayasacca.m  upaadaana.m. dve saccaa no upaadaanaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadaana.m, siyaa no upaadaana.m.  dve saccaa upaadaaniyaa. dve saccaa anupaadaaniyaa. dve saccaa upaadaanavippayuttaa.  dve saccaa siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa, siyaa ^a^V0.0135^ea^ upaadaanavippayuttaa. samudayasacca.m upaadaana~nceva  upaadaaniya~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaaniyaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaaniya~nca, siyaa upaadaaniya~nceva  no ca upaadaana.m. samudayasacca.m siyaa upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~nca, siyaa na  vattabba.m -- ``upaadaana~nceva ^a^P0.0120^ea^ upaadaanasampayutta~ncaa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutta~nceva  no ca upaadaana''ntipi. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa  caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa upaadaana~nceva  upaadaanasampayutta~nca, siyaa upaadaanasampayutta~nceva no ca upaadaana.m, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~ncaa'' tipi, ``upaadaanasampayutta~nceva no ca upaadaana''ntipi.  dve saccaa ^a^T0.0159^ea^ upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa. dve saccaa siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi, ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.
text.823: [03] samudayasacca.m kileso. dve saccaa no kilesaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kileso, siyaa  no kileso. dve saccaa sa.mkilesikaa. dve saccaa asa.mkilesikaa. samudayasacca.m  sa.mkili.t.tha.m. dve saccaa asa.mkili.t.thaa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m, siyaa  asa.mkili.t.tha.m. samudayasacca.m kilesasampayutta.m. dve saccaa kilesavippayuttaa. dukkhasacca.m  siyaa kilesasampayutta.m, siyaa ^a^M0.0126^ea^ kilesavippayutta.m. samudayasacca.m kileso  ceva sa.mkilesika~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''tipi,  ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kileso ceva  sa.mkilesika~nca, siyaa sa.mkilesika~nceva no ca kileso. samudayasacca.m kileso  ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~nca. dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''tipi,  ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~nca,  siyaa sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~ncaa''tipi,  ``sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso''tipi. samudayasacca.m kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~nca.  dve saccaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~nca ^a^T0.0160^ea^,  siyaa kilesasampayutta~nceva no ca kileso, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva  kilesasampayutta~ncaa'' tipi, ``kilesasampayutta~nceva no ca kileso''tipi. dve ^a^V0.0136^ea^   saccaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa. samudayasacca.m na vattabba.m -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesika''ntipi,  ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesika''ntipi. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesika.m,  siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesika''ntipi, ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesika''ntipi.
text.824: [03] dve ^a^P0.0121^ea^ saccaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa. dve saccaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa,  siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa. dve saccaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dve saccaa siyaa bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. dve saccaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.  dve saccaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa.  dve saccaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. dve saccaa siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa,  siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. samudayasacca.m savitakka.m. nirodhasacca.m avitakka.m.  dve saccaa siyaa savitakkaa, siyaa avitakkaa. samudayasacca.m savicaara.m. nirodhasacca.m  avicaara.m. dve saccaa siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. nirodhasacca.m appiitika.m.  tii.ni saccaani siyaa sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. nirodhasacca.m na piitisahagata.m.  tii.ni saccaani siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. nirodhasacca.m ^a^M0.0127^ea^  na sukhasahagata.m. tii.ni ^a^T0.0161^ea^ saccaani siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. nirodhasacca.m  na upekkhaasahagata.m. tii.ni saccaani siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.825: [03] samudayasacca.m kaamaavacara.m. dve saccaa na kaamaavacaraa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa kaamaavacara.m,  siyaa na kaamaavacara.m. tii.ni saccaani na ruupaavacaraa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa ruupaavacara.m,  siyaa na ruupaavacara.m. tii.ni saccaani na aruupaavacaraa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa aruupaavacara.m,  siyaa na aruupaavacara.m. dve saccaa pariyaapannaa. dve saccaa apariyaapannaa. maggasacca.m  niyyaanika.m. tii.ni saccaani aniyyaanikaa. maggasacca.m niyata.m. nirodhasacca.m aniyata.m.  dve saccaa siyaa niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. dve saccaa sauttaraa. dve saccaa anuttaraa.  samudayasacca.m sara.na.m. dve saccaa ara.naa. dukkhasacca.m siyaa sara.na.m, siyaa ara.nanti.
text.83: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi kusalo, atthi akusalo, atthi abyaakato.
text.830: [03] 219^b^.^eb^ baaviisatindriyaani ^a^M0.0128^ea^ ^a^P0.0122^ea^ ^a^V0.0137^ea^ -- cakkhundriya.m,   sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m,  sukhindriya.m, dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m,  saddhindriya.m ^a^T0.0162^ea^, viiriyindriya.m {viriyindriya.m (sii0 syaa0)}, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m,  a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m.
text.831: [03] 220^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m cakkhundriya.m? ya.m cakkhu catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0...  su~n~no gaamopeso -- ida.m vuccati ``cakkhundriya.m''.
text.832: [03] tattha katama.m sotindriya.m...pe0... ghaanindriya.m...pe0... jivhindriya.m...pe0...  kaayindriya.m? yo kaayo catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado...pe0... su~n~no  gaamopeso -- ida.m vuccati ``kaayindriya.m''.
text.833: [03] tattha katama.m manindriya.m? ekavidhena manindriya.m -- phassasampayutta.m. duvidhena  manindriya.m -- atthi sahetuka.m, atthi ahetuka.m. tividhena manindriya.m -- atthi  kusala.m, atthi akusala.m, atthi abyaakata.m. catubbidhena manindriya.m -- atthi kaamaavacara.m,  atthi ruupaavacara.m, atthi aruupaavacara.m, atthi apariyaapanna.m. pa~ncavidhena manindriya.m -- atthi  sukhindriyasampayutta.m, atthi dukkhindriyasampayutta.m, atthi somanassindriyasampayutta.m,  atthi domanassindriyasampayutta.m, atthi upekkhindriyasampayutta.m ^a^V0.0138^ea^. chabbidhena manindriya.m --  cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... manovi~n~naa.na.m. eva.m chabbidhena manindriya.m.
text.834: [03] sattavidhena manindriya.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu.  eva.m sattavidhena manindriya.m.
text.835: [03] a.t.thavidhena manindriya.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m atthi sukhasahagata.m,  atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu. eva.m a.t.thavidhena manindriya.m.
text.836: [03] navavidhena ^a^M0.0129^ea^ manindriya.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m,  manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu atthi kusalaa, atthi akusalaa, atthi abyaakataa.  eva.m navavidhena manindriya.m.
text.837: [01] dasavidhena manindriya.m -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m atthi sukhasahagata.m,  atthi dukkhasahagata.m, manodhaatu, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu atthi kusalaa, atthi akusalaa,  atthi abyaakataa. eva.m dasavidhena manindriya.m...pe0... eva.m bahuvidhena manindriya.m.  ida.m vuccati ``manindriya.m''.
text.838: [03] tattha katama.m itthindriya.m? ya.m itthiyaa itthili"nga.m itthinimitta.m itthikutta.m itthaakappo  itthatta.m itthibhaavo -- ida.m vuccati ``itthindriya.m''.
text.839: [03] tattha katama.m purisindriya.m? ya.m purisassa purisali"nga.m purisanimitta.m purisakutta.m  purisaakappo ^a^P0.0123^ea^ purisatta.m purisabhaavo -- ida.m vuccati ``purisindriya.m''.
text.84: [03] catubbidhena vedanaakkhandho ^a^T0.0021^ea^ -- atthi kaamaavacaro, atthi ruupaavacaro, atthi aruupaavacaro,  atthi apariyaapanno.
text.840: [03] tattha katama.m jiivitindriya.m? jiivitindriya.m duvidhena -- atthi ruupajiivitindriya.m,  atthi aruupajiivitindriya.m.
text.841: [03] tattha katama.m ruupajiivitindriya.m? yo tesa.m ruupiina.m dhammaana.m aayu .thiti yapanaa yaapanaa  iriyanaa vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m vuccati ``ruupajiivitindriya.m''.
text.842: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0139^ea^ katama.m aruupajiivitindriya.m? yo tesa.m aruupiina.m dhammaana.m ^a^T0.0163^ea^ aayu .thiti   yapanaa yaapanaa iriyanaa vattanaa paalanaa jiivita.m jiivitindriya.m -- ida.m vuccati ``aruupajiivatindriya.m''.  ida.m vuccati ``jiivitindriya.m''.
text.843: [03] tattha katama.m sukhindriya.m? ya.m kaayika.m saata.m kaayika.m sukha.m kaayasamphassaja.m saata.m  sukha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``sukhindriya.m''.
text.844: [01] tattha katama.m dukkhindriya.m? ya.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``dukkhindriya.m''.
text.845: [03] tattha katama.m somanassindriya.m? ya.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m  saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``somanassindriya.m''.
text.846: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0130^ea^ katama.m domanassindriya.m? ya.m cetasika.m asaata.m cetasika.m dukkha.m  cetosamphassaja.m asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa --  ida.m vuccati ``domanassindriya.m''.
text.847: [03] tattha katama.m upekkhindriya.m? ya.m cetasika.m neva saata.m naasaata.m cetosamphassaja.m adukkhamasukha.m  vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa adukkhamasukhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``upekkhindriya.m''.
text.848: [03] tattha katama.m saddhindriya.m? yaa saddhaa saddahanaa okappanaa abhippasaado saddhaa saddhindriya.m  saddhaabala.m -- ida.m vuccati ``saddhindriya.m''.
text.849: [03] tattha katama.m viiriyindriya.m? yo cetasiko viiriyaarambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyaamo  vaayaamo ussaaho usso.lhii thaamo .thiti asithilaparakkamataa anikkhittachandataa anikkhittadhurataa  dhurasampaggaaho ^a^T0.0164^ea^ viiriya.m ^a^P0.0124^ea^ viiriyindriya.m viiriyabala.m -- ida.m vuccati  ``viiriyindriya.m''.
text.85: [03] pa~ncavidhena ^a^V0.0017^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sukhindriya.m, atthi dukkhindriya.m, atthi somanassindriya.m,  atthi domanassindriya.m, atthi upekkhindriya.m. eva.m pa~ncavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.850: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0140^ea^ katama.m satindriya.m? yaa sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa apilaapanataa  asammussanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati -- ida.m vuccati ``satindriya.m''.
text.851: [03] tattha katama.m samaadhindriya.m? yaa cittassa .thiti sa.n.thiti ava.t.thiti avisaahaaro avikkhepo  avisaaha.tamaanasataa samatho samaadhindriya.m samaadhibala.m sammaasamaadhi -- ida.m vuccati  ``samaadhindriya.m''.
text.852: [03] tattha katama.m pa~n~nindriya.m? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi --  ida.m vuccati ``pa~n~nindriya.m''.
text.853: [03] tattha katama.m ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m? yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m ana~n~naataana.m adi.t.thaana.m appattaana.m  aviditaana.m asacchikataana.m sacchikiriyaaya pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo  sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m vuccati ``ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m''.
text.854: [03] tattha katama.m a~n~nindriya.m? yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m ~naataana.m di.t.thaana.m pattaana.m viditaana.m  sacchikataana.m sacchikiriyaaya pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi  dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m vuccati a~n~nindriya.m.
text.855: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0131^ea^ katama.m a~n~naataavindriya.m? yaa tesa.m dhammaana.m a~n~naataaviina.m di.t.thaana.m  pattaana.m viditaana.m sacchikataana.m sacchikiriyaaya pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho  dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo magga"nga.m maggapariyaapanna.m -- ida.m ^a^T0.0165^ea^   vuccati ``a~n~naataavindriya.m''.
text.858: [03] 221^b^.^eb^ baaviisatindriyaani ^a^V0.0141^ea^ -- cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m,  kaayindriya.m, manindriya.m, itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m, jiivitindriya.m, sukhindriya.m,  dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m, saddhindriya.m,  viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^P0.0125^ea^, ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m,  a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m.
text.859: [03] 222^b^.^eb^ baaviisatiina.m indriyaana.m kati kusalaa, kati akusalaa, kati abyaakataa...pe0...  kati sara.naa, kati ara.naa?
text.86: [03] chabbidhena ^a^M0.0016^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa,  ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manosamphassajaa  vedanaa. eva.m chabbidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.861: [03] 223^b^.^eb^ dasindriyaa abyaakataa. domanassindriya.m akusala.m. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m  kusala.m. cattaarindriyaa siyaa kusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa. cha indriyaa siyaa kusalaa,  siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa.
text.862: [03] dvaadasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya  sampayuttaa''tipi, ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa''tipi. cha indriyaa siyaa  sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa. tii.nindriyaa  siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayuttaa, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya  vedanaaya sampayuttaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa dukkhaaya  vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta.m, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``sukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi ^a^T0.0166^ea^, ``dukkhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi,   ``adukkhamasukhaaya vedanaaya sampayutta''ntipi.
text.863: [03] sattindriyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. tii.nindriyaa vipaakaa. dvindriyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa.  a~n~nindriya.m siyaa vipaaka.m, siyaa vipaakadhammadhamma.m. navindriyaa siyaa ^a^M0.0132^ea^  vipaakaa, siyaa vipaakadhammadhammaa, siyaa nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammaa. navindriyaa  upaadinnupaadaaniyaa ^a^V0.0142^ea^. domanassindriya.m anupaadinnupaadaaniya.m. tii.nindriyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.  navindriyaa siyaa upaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnupaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyaa.
text.864: [03] navindriyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa. domanassindriya.m sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesika.m.  tii.nindriyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. tii.nindriyaa siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. cha indriyaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesikaa. navindriyaa  avitakkaavicaaraa. domanassindriya.m savitakkasavicaara.m. upekkhindriya.m siyaa savitakkasavicaara.m,  siyaa avitakkaavicaara.m. ekaadasindriyaa siyaa savitakkasavicaaraa, siyaa avitakkavicaaramattaa,  siyaa avitakkaavicaaraa.
text.865: [03] ekaadasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi, ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.  somanassindriya.m siyaa piitisahagata.m na sukhasahagata.m na upekkhaasahagata.m, siyaa ^a^P0.0126^ea^  na vattabba.m -- ``piitisahagata''nti. cha indriyaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa,  siyaa upekkhaasahagataa. cattaarindriyaa siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa  upekkhaasahagataa ^a^T0.0167^ea^, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``piitisahagataa''tipi, ``sukhasahagataa''tipi,  ``upekkhaasahagataa''tipi.
text.866: [03] pannarasindriyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. domanassindriya.m siyaa dassanena  pahaatabba.m, siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabba.m. cha indriyaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa, siyaa bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. pannarasindriyaa neva dassanena  na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. domanassindriya.m siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetuka.m,  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuka.m. cha indriyaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.867: [03] dasindriyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino. domanassindriya.m aacayagaami. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m  apacayagaami. a~n~nindriya.m siyaa apacayagaami, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaami ^a^V0.0143^ea^. navindriyaa  siyaa aacayagaamino, siyaa ^a^M0.0133^ea^ apacayagaamino, siyaa nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamino.  dasindriyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa. dvindriyaa sekkhaa. a~n~naataavindriya.m asekkha.m.  navindriyaa siyaa sekkhaa, siyaa asekkhaa, siyaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa.
text.868: [03] dasindriyaa parittaa. tii.nindriyaa appamaa.naa. navindriyaa siyaa parittaa, siyaa mahaggataa,  siyaa appamaa.naa. sattindriyaa anaaramma.naa. dvindriyaa parittaaramma.naa. tii.nindriyaa  appamaa.naaramma.naa. domanassindriya.m siyaa parittaaramma.na.m siyaa mahaggataaramma.na.m, na  appamaa.naaramma.na.m, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``parittaaramma.na''ntipi ^a^T0.0168^ea^, ``mahaggataaramma.na''nti  pi. navindriyaa siyaa parittaaramma.naa, siyaa mahaggataaramma.naa, siyaa appamaa.naaramma.naa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``parittaaramma.naa''tipi, ``mahaggataaramma.naa''tipi, ``appamaa.naaramma.naa''tipi.
text.869: [03] navindriyaa majjhimaa. domanassindriya.m hiina.m. tii.nindriyaa pa.niitaa. tii.nindriyaa siyaa  majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa. cha indriyaa siyaa hiinaa, siyaa majjhimaa, siyaa pa.niitaa.  dasindriyaa aniyataa. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m sammattaniyata.m. cattaarindriyaa siyaa  sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa. domanassindriya.m siyaa micchattaniyata.m, siyaa aniyata.m  ^a^P0.0127^ea^. cha indriyaa siyaa micchattaniyataa, siyaa sammattaniyataa, siyaa aniyataa.  sattindriyaa anaaramma.naa. cattaarindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi,  ``maggaadhipatino''tipi. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m na maggaaramma.na.m, siyaa maggahetuka.m,  siyaa maggaadhipati, siyaa na vattabba.m -- ``maggahetuka''ntipi, ``maggaadhipatii''tipi.  a~n~nindriya.m na maggaaramma.na.m, siyaa maggahetuka.m, siyaa maggaadhipati, siyaa na vattabba.m --  ``maggahetuka''ntipi, ``maggaadhipatii''tipi. navindriyaa siyaa maggaaramma.naa, siyaa  maggahetukaa, siyaa maggaadhipatino, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``maggaaramma.naa''tipi, ``maggahetukaa''tipi,  ``maggaadhipatino''tipi.
text.87: [03] sattavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa,  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa. eva.m sattavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.870: [03] dasindriyaa siyaa uppannaa, siyaa uppaadino, na vattabbaa -- ``anuppannaa''ti. dvindriyaa  siyaa uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, na vattabbaa -- ``uppaadino''ti. dasindriyaa siyaa  uppannaa, siyaa anuppannaa, siyaa uppaadino ^a^T0.0169^ea^; siyaa atiitaa, siyaa anaagataa, siyaa paccuppannaa.  sattindriyaa ^a^V0.0144^ea^ anaaramma.naa. dvindriyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi ^a^M0.0134^ea^, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi.  dasindriyaa siyaa atiitaaramma.naa, siyaa anaagataaramma.naa, siyaa paccuppannaaramma.naa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``atiitaaramma.naa''tipi, ``anaagataaramma.naa''tipi, ``paccuppannaaramma.naa''tipi;  siyaa ajjhattaa, siyaa bahiddhaa, siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaa. sattindriyaa anaaramma.naa. tii.nindriyaa  bahiddhaaramma.naa. cattaarindriyaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa  ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, a.t.thindriyaa siyaa ajjhattaaramma.naa, siyaa bahiddhaaramma.naa,  siyaa ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ajjhattaaramma.naa''tipi, ``bahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi,  ``ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.naa''tipi. pa~ncindriyaa anidassanasappa.tighaa. sattarasindriyaa anidassanaappa.tighaa.
text.872: [03] 224^b^.^eb^ cattaarindriyaa hetuu. a.t.thaarasindriyaa na hetuu. sattindriyaa sahetukaa. navindriyaa  ahetukaa. cha indriyaa siyaa sahetukaa, siyaa ahetukaa. sattindriyaa hetusampayuttaa.  navindriyaa hetuvippayuttaa. cha indriyaa siyaa hetusampayuttaa, siyaa hetuvippayuttaa.  cattaarindriyaa hetuu ceva sahetukaa ca. navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva sahetukaa  caa''tipi, ``sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu  ceva sahetukaa caa''ti. sahetukaa ^a^T0.0170^ea^ ceva na ca hetuu. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu  ceva sahetukaa caa''ti, siyaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetuu''ti.
text.873: [03] cattaarindriyaa hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa ca ^a^P0.0128^ea^. navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu  ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''tipi. tii.nindriyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''ti, ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''.  cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetuu ceva hetusampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa hetusampayuttaa  ceva na ca hetuu, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``hetusampayuttaa ceva na ca hetuu''ti.
text.874: [03] navindriyaa ^a^V0.0145^ea^ na hetuu ahetukaa. tii.nindriyaa na hetuu sahetukaa. cattaarindriyaa na  vattabbaa -- ``na hetuu sahetukaa''tipi, ``na hetuu ahetukaa''tipi ^a^M0.0135^ea^.  cha indriyaa siyaa na hetuu sahetukaa, siyaa na hetuu ahetukaa.
text.875: [03] sappaccayaa. sa"nkhataa. anidassanaa. pa~ncindriyaa sappa.tighaa. sattarasindriyaa appa.tighaa.  sattindriyaa ruupaa. cuddasindriyaa aruupaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa ruupa.m, siyaa aruupa.m.  dasindriyaa lokiyaa. tii.nindriyaa lokuttaraa. navindriyaa siyaa lokiyaa,  siyaa lokuttaraa; kenaci vi~n~neyyaa, kenaci na vi~n~neyyaa.
text.876: [03] no aasavaa. dasindriyaa saasavaa. tii.nindriyaa anaasavaa. navindriyaa siyaa saasavaa,  siyaa anaasavaa. pannarasindriyaa aasavavippayuttaa. domanassindriya.m aasavasampayutta.m.  cha indriyaa ^a^T0.0171^ea^ siyaa aasavasampayuttaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''. tii.nindriyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''tipi, ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi.  navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva saasavaa caa''ti, siyaa saasavaa ceva no ca  aasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``saasavaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti.
text.877: [03] pannarasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva aasavasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``aasavasampayuttaa  ceva no ca aasavaa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``aasavo ceva aasavasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  ``aasavasampayutta~nceva no ca aasavo''. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavaa ceva  aasavasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``aasavasampayuttaa ceva no ca aasavaa''ti. navindriyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa.  tii.nindriyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasava''ntipi,  ``aasavavippayuttaanaasava''ntipi. tii.nindriyaa siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa  aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa. cha indriyaa siyaa aasavavippayuttasaasavaa, siyaa aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``aasavavippayuttasaasavaa''tipi, ``aasavavippayuttaanaasavaa''tipi.
text.878: [03] no ^a^V0.0146^ea^ sa.myojanaa. dasindriyaa sa.myojaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa asa.myojaniyaa. navindriyaa siyaa  sa.myojaniyaa, siyaa asa.myojaniyaa. pannarasindriyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. domanassindriya.m  sa.myojanasampayutta.m ^a^T0.0172^ea^. cha ^a^M0.0136^ea^ indriyaa siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ^a^P0.0129^ea^,  siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti,  sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa  caa''tipi, ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. navindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojaniyaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti.
text.879: [01] pannarasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojana~nceva sa.myojanasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  sa.myojanasampayutta~nceva no ca sa.myojana.m. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanaa ceva  sa.myojanasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanasampayuttaa ceva no ca sa.myojanaa''ti.
text.88: [03] a.t.thavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa atthi sukhaa, atthi dukkhaa,  manodhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa. eva.m a.t.thavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.880: [03] navindriyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa.  domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniya''ntipi, ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniya''ntipi.  tii.nindriyaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa.  cha indriyaa siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa, siyaa sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.myojanavippayuttasa.myojaniyaa''tipi,   ``sa.myojanavippayuttaasa.myojaniyaa''tipi ^a^T0.0173^ea^.
text.881: [03] no ganthaa. dasindriyaa ganthaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa aganthaniyaa. navindriyaa siyaa ganthaniyaa,  siyaa aganthaniyaa. pannarasindriyaa ganthavippayuttaa. domanassindriya.m ganthasampayutta.m.  cha indriyaa siyaa ganthasampayuttaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa. tii.nindriyaa na  vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthaniyaa caa''tipi, ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi.  navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ^a^V0.0147^ea^ ceva ganthaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa ganthaniyaa ceva  no ca ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaniyaa ceva no ca ganthaa''ti.
text.882: [03] pannarasindriyaa ^a^M0.0137^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``ganthasampayuttaa  ceva no ca ganthaa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``gantho ceva ganthasampayutta''~ncaati,  ganthasampayutta~nceva no ca gantho. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthaa ceva ganthasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa ganthasampayuttaa ceva no ca ganthaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``ganthasampayuttaa  ceva no ca ganthaa''ti.
text.883: [03] navindriyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa ^a^P0.0130^ea^.  domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniya''ntipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniya''ntipi.  tii.nindriyaa siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa. cha indriyaa  siyaa ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa, siyaa ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa ^a^T0.0174^ea^ --  ``ganthavippayuttaganthaniyaa''tipi, ``ganthavippayuttaaganthaniyaa''tipi.
text.884: [03] no oghaa...pe0... no yogaa...pe0... no niivara.naa. dasindriyaa niivara.niyaa.  tii.nindriyaa aniivara.niyaa. navindriyaa siyaa niivara.niyaa, siyaa aniivara.niyaa. pannarasindriyaa  niivara.navippayuttaa. domanassindriya.m niivara.nasampayutta.m. cha indriyaa siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa,  siyaa niivara.navippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti,  niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa  caa''tipi, ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi. navindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.niyaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.niyaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti.
text.885: [03] pannarasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``niivara.nasampayuttaa  ceva no ca niivara.naa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.na~nceva niivara.nasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  niivara.nasampayutta~nceva no ca niivara.na.m. cha indriyaa na ^a^V0.0148^ea^ vattabbaa -- ``niivara.naa ceva  niivara.nasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa, siyaa na vattabbaa --  ``niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa''ti.
text.886: [03] navindriyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa. tii.nindriyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa. domanassindriya.m  na vattabba.m -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niya''ntipi, ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niya''ntipi.  tii.nindriyaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa ^a^T0.0175^ea^.  cha indriyaa siyaa niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa ^a^M0.0138^ea^, siyaa niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa,  siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``niivara.navippayuttaniivara.niyaa''tipi, ``niivara.navippayuttaaniivara.niyaa''tipi.
text.887: [03] no paraamaasaa. dasindriyaa paraama.t.thaa. tii.nindriyaa aparaama.t.thaa. navindriyaa siyaa paraama.t.thaa,  siyaa aparaama.t.thaa. so.lasindriyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa. cha indriyaa siyaa paraamaasasampayuttaa,  siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti,  paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa  ^a^P0.0131^ea^ caa''tipi, ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''tipi. navindriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``paraamaasaa ceva paraama.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa, siyaa na  vattabbaa -- ``paraama.t.thaa ceva no ca paraamaasaa''ti. dasindriyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa.  tii.nindriyaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa. tii.nindriyaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa,  siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa. cha indriyaa siyaa paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa  paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``paraamaasavippayuttaparaama.t.thaa''tipi,  ``paraamaasavippayuttaaparaama.t.thaa''tipi.
text.888: [03] sattindriyaa anaaramma.naa. cuddasindriyaa saaramma.naa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa saaramma.na.m,  siyaa anaaramma.na.m. ekaviisatindriyaa no ^a^T0.0176^ea^ cittaa. manindriya.m citta.m. terasindriyaa  cetasikaa. a.t.thindriyaa acetasikaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa cetasika.m, siyaa acetasika.m.  terasindriyaa cittasampayuttaa. sattindriyaa cittavippayuttaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa  cittasampayutta.m, siyaa cittavippayutta.m. manindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sampayutta''ntipi,  ``cittena vippayutta''ntipi.
text.889: [03] terasindriyaa ^a^V0.0149^ea^ cittasa.msa.t.thaa. sattindriyaa cittavisa.msa.t.thaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.tha.m,  siyaa cittavisa.msa.t.tha.m. manindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``cittena sa.msa.t.tha''ntipi, ``cittena  visa.msa.t.tha''ntipi. terasindriyaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa. a.t.thindriyaa no cittasamu.t.thaanaa. jiivitindriya.m  siyaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m, siyaa no cittasamu.t.thaana.m.
text.89: [03] navavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manodhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa,  manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa atthi kusalaa, atthi akusalaa, atthi abyaakataa.  eva.m navavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.890: [03] terasindriyaa cittasahabhuno. a.t.thindriyaa no cittasahabhuno. jiivitindriya.m siyaa  cittasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasahabhuu. terasindriyaa cittaanuparivattino. a.t.thindriyaa no  cittaanuparivattino. jiivitindriya.m siyaa cittaanuparivatti, siyaa no cittaanuparivatti.
text.891: [03] terasindriyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. a.t.thindriyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa. jiivitindriya.m  siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m. terasindriyaa ^a^M0.0139^ea^  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. a.t.thindriyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuno. jiivitindriya.m  siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu, siyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanasahabhuu. terasindriyaa   cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino. a.t.thindriyaa no cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivattino.   jiivitindriya.m siyaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti ^a^T0.0177^ea^, siyaa no   cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaanuparivatti. cha indriyaa ajjhattikaa. so.lasindriyaa  baahiraa.
text.892: [03] sattindriyaa ^a^P0.0132^ea^ upaadaa. cuddasindriyaa no upaadaa. jiivitindriya.m siyaa  upaadaa, siyaa no upaadaa. navindriyaa upaadinnaa. cattaarindriyaa anupaadinnaa.  navindriyaa siyaa upaadinnaa, siyaa anupaadinnaa. no upaadaanaa. dasindriyaa upaadaaniyaa.  tii.nindriyaa anupaadaaniyaa. navindriyaa siyaa upaadaaniyaa, siyaa anupaadaaniyaa.  so.lasindriyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa. cha indriyaa siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa, siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaa.  dasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, upaadaaniyaa ceva  no ca upaadaanaa. tii.nindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa caa''tipi,  ``upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa  ceva upaadaaniyaa caa''ti, siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa. dasindriyaa  siyaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaaniyaa ceva  no ca upaadaanaa''ti.
text.893: [03] so.lasindriyaa ^a^V0.0150^ea^ na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``upaadaanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaa''tipi. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa  caa''ti, siyaa upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanasampayuttaa  ceva no ca upaadaanaa''ti. dasindriyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa  upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa. tii.nindriyaa ^a^T0.0378^ea^ siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa. cha indriyaa siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa,  siyaa upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaa''tipi,  ``upaadaanavippayuttaanupaadaaniyaa''tipi.
text.894: [03] no ^a^M0.0140^ea^ kilesaa. dasindriyaa sa.mkilesikaa. tii.nindriyaa asa.mkilesikaa.  navindriyaa siyaa sa.mkilesikaa, siyaa asa.mkilesikaa. pannarasindriyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa.  domanassindriya.m sa.mkili.t.tha.m. cha indriyaa siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa, siyaa asa.mkili.t.thaa.  pannarasindriyaa kilesavippayuttaa. domanassindriya.m kilesasampayutta.m. cha indriyaa  siyaa kilesasampayuttaa, siyaa kilesavippayuttaa. dasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa  ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''ti, sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa. tii.nindriyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa caa''tipi, ``sa.mkilesikaa ceva  no ca kilesaa''tipi. navindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkilesikaa  caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkilesikaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkilesikaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''ti.
text.895: [03] pannarasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''tipi, ``sa.mkili.t.thaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ^a^P0.0133^ea^  ceva sa.mkili.t.tha~ncaa''ti, sa.mkili.t.tha~nceva no ca kileso. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa --  ``kilesaa ceva sa.mkili.t.thaa caa''ti, siyaa sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa  na vattabbaa -- ``sa.mkili.t.thaa ceva ^a^T0.0179^ea^ no ca kilesaa''ti.
text.896: [03] pannarasindriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ceva kilesasampayuttaa caa''tipi, ``kilesasampayuttaa  ceva no ca kilesaa''tipi. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``kileso ceva kilesasampayutta~ncaa''ti,  kilesasampayutta~nceva no ca kileso. cha indriyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesaa ^a^V0.0151^ea^ ceva  kilesasampayuttaa caa''ti, siyaa kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa, siyaa na  vattabbaa -- ``kilesasampayuttaa ceva no ca kilesaa''ti. navindriyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa.  tii.nindriyaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa. domanassindriya.m na vattabba.m -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesika''ntipi,  ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesika''ntipi. tii.nindriyaa siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa. cha indriyaa siyaa kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa,  siyaa kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa, siyaa na vattabbaa -- ``kilesavippayuttasa.mkilesikaa''tipi,  ``kilesavippayuttaasa.mkilesikaa''tipi.
text.897: [03] pannarasindriyaa ^a^M0.0141^ea^ na dassanena pahaatabbaa. sattindriyaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbaa,  siyaa na dassanena pahaatabbaa. pannarasindriyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. sattindriyaa  siyaa bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbaa. pannarasindriyaa na dassanena  pahaatabbahetukaa. sattindriyaa siyaa dassanena pahaatabbahetukaa, siyaa na dassanena  pahaatabbahetukaa. pannarasindriyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa. sattindriyaa siyaa  bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa ^a^T0.0180^ea^, siyaa na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetukaa.
text.898: [03] navindriyaa avitakkaa. domanassindriya.m savitakka.m. dvaadasindriyaa siyaa savitakkaa,  siyaa avitakkaa. navindriyaa avicaaraa. domanassindriya.m savicaara.m. dvaadasindriyaa  siyaa savicaaraa, siyaa avicaaraa. ekaadasindriyaa appiitikaa. ekaadasindriyaa  siyaa sappiitikaa, siyaa appiitikaa. ekaadasindriyaa na piitisahagataa. ekaadasindriyaa  siyaa piitisahagataa, siyaa na piitisahagataa. dvaadasindriyaa na sukhasahagataa. dasindriyaa  siyaa sukhasahagataa, siyaa na sukhasahagataa. dvaadasindriyaa na upekkhaasahagataa. dasindriyaa  siyaa upekkhaasahagataa, siyaa na upekkhaasahagataa.
text.899: [03] dasindriyaa kaamaavacaraa. tii.nindriyaa na kaamaavacaraa. navindriyaa siyaa kaamaavacaraa,  siyaa na kaamaavacaraa. terasindriyaa na ruupaavacaraa. navindriyaa siyaa ruupaavacaraa, siyaa  na ruupaavacaraa. cuddasindriyaa na aruupaavacaraa. a.t.thindriyaa siyaa aruupaavacaraa, siyaa na  aruupaavacaraa. dasindriyaa pariyaapannaa. tii.nindriyaa apariyaapannaa. navindriyaa siyaa  pariyaapannaa, siyaa apariyaapannaa. ekaadasindriyaa ^a^P0.0134^ea^ aniyyaanikaa.  ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m ^a^V0.0152^ea^ niyyaanika.m. dasindriyaa siyaa niyyaanikaa, siyaa aniyyaanikaa.  dasindriyaa aniyataa. ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m niyata.m. ekaadasindriyaa siyaa  niyataa, siyaa aniyataa. dasindriyaa sauttaraa. tii.nindriyaa anuttaraa. navindriyaa  siyaa sauttaraa, siyaa anuttaraa. pannarasindriyaa ara.naa. domanassindriya.m sara.na.m.  cha ^a^T0.0181^ea^ indriyaa siyaa sara.naa, siyaa ara.naati.
text.9: [03] tattha katama.m ruupa.m anaagata.m? ya.m ruupa.m ajaata.m abhuuta.m asa~njaata.m anibbatta.m anabhinibbatta.m  apaatubhuuta.m anuppanna.m asamuppanna.m anu.t.thita.m asamu.t.thita.m anaagata.m anaagata.msena sa"ngahita.m,  cattaaro ca mahaabhuutaa catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaayaruupa.m -- ida.m vuccati ruupa.m anaagata.m.
text.90: [03] dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho -- cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa  vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa atthi sukhaa, atthi dukkhaa,  manodhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa, manovi~n~naa.nadhaatusamphassajaa vedanaa atthi kusalaa, atthi  akusalaa, atthi abyaakataa. eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.904: [03] 225^b^.^eb^ avijjaapaccayaa ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^a^P0.0135^ea^ ^a^V0.0153^ea^ sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa,  vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati,  jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti. evametassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.905: [03] 226^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? dukkhe a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe  a~n~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya a~n~naa.na.m -- aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
text.906: [03] tattha katame avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa? pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro, apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro, aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro,  kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa"nkhaaro, cittasa"nkhaaro.
text.907: [03] tattha katamo pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro? kusalaa cetanaa kaamaavacaraa ruupaavacaraa daanamayaa siilamayaa  bhaavanaamayaa -- aya.m vuccati ``pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro''.
text.908: [03] tattha katamo apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro? akusalaa cetanaa kaamaavacaraa ^a^T0.0182^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati   ``apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro''.
text.909: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0154^ea^ katamo aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro? kusalaa cetanaa aruupaavacaraa -- aya.m vuccati ``aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro''.
text.910: [03] tattha katamo kaayasa"nkhaaro? kaayasa~ncetanaa kaayasa"nkhaaro, vaciisa~ncetanaa vaciisa"nkhaaro,  manosa~ncetanaa cittasa"nkhaaro. ime vuccanti ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa''.
text.911: [03] 227^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P0.0136^ea^ katama.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m? cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m,  ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m -- ida.m vuccati  ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m''.
text.912: [03] 228^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m? atthi naama.m, atthi ruupa.m. tattha katama.m  naama.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati ``naama.m'' ^a^M0.0143^ea^.  tattha katama.m ruupa.m? cattaaro mahaabhuutaa, catunna~nca mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya ruupa.m -- ida.m  vuccati ``ruupa.m''. iti ida~nca naama.m, ida~nca ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupa.m''.
text.913: [03] 229^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m? cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m,  jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m -- ida.m vuccati ``naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m''.
text.914: [03] 230^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso? cakkhusamphasso sotasamphasso ghaanasamphasso  jivhaasamphasso kaayasamphasso manosamphasso -- aya.m vuccati ``sa.laayatanapaccayaa phasso''.
text.915: [03] 231^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^T0.0183^ea^ katamaa phassapaccayaa vedanaa? cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa vedanaa,  ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manosamphassajaa  vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``phassapaccayaa vedanaa''.
text.916: [03] 232^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0155^ea^ katamaa vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa? ruupata.nhaa, saddata.nhaa, gandhata.nhaa, rasata.nhaa,  pho.t.thabbata.nhaa, dhammata.nhaa -- aya.m vuccati ``vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa''.
text.917: [03] 233^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m? kaamupaadaana.m, di.t.thupaadaana.m, siilabbatupaadaana.m,  attavaadupaadaana.m -- ida.m vuccati ``ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m''.
text.918: [03] 234^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo? bhavo duvidhena ^a^P0.0137^ea^ -- atthi kammabhavo,  atthi upapattibhavo. tattha katamo kammabhavo? pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro, apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro,  aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro -- aya.m vuccati ``kammabhavo''. sabbampi bhavagaamikamma.m kammabhavo.
text.919: [03] tattha katamo upapattibhavo? kaamabhavo, ruupabhavo, aruupabhavo, sa~n~naabhavo, asa~n~naabhavo, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naabhavo,  ekavokaarabhavo, catuvokaarabhavo, pa~ncavokaarabhavo -- aya.m vuccati ``upapattibhavo''.  iti aya~nca kammabhavo, aya~nca upapattibhavo. aya.m vuccati ``upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo''.
text.92: [03] duvidhena ^a^P0.0016^ea^ ^a^V0.0018^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sahetuko, atthi ahetuko.
text.920: [03] 235^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0144^ea^ katamaa bhavapaccayaa jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi  sattanikaaye jaati sa~njaati okkanti abhinibbatti, khandhaana.m paatubhaavo ^a^T0.0184^ea^, aayatanaana.m  pa.tilaabho -- aya.m vuccati ``bhavapaccayaa jaati''.
text.921: [03] 236^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m? atthi jaraa, atthi mara.na.m. tattha katamaa  jaraa? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhi tamhi sattanikaaye jaraa jiira.nataa kha.n.dicca.m paalicca.m  valittacataa aayuno sa.mhaani indriyaana.m paripaako -- aya.m vuccati ``jaraa''.
text.922: [03] tattha katama.m mara.na.m? yaa tesa.m tesa.m sattaana.m tamhaa tamhaa sattanikaayaa cuti cavanataa  bhedo antaradhaana.m maccu mara.na.m kaalakiriyaa {kaala.mkiriyaa (ka0)} khandhaana.m bhedo ka.levarassa nikkhepo jiivitindriyassupacchedo --  ida.m vuccati ``mara.na.m''. iti aya~nca jaraa, ida~nca mara.na.m. ida.m vuccati ``jaatipaccayaa  jaraamara.na.m''.
text.923: [03] 237^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V0.0156^ea^ katamo soko? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa,  rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena  byasanena samannaagatassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa soko socanaa socitatta.m  antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parijjhaayanaa domanassa.m sokasalla.m -- aya.m vuccati  ``soko''.
text.924: [03] 238^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo paridevo? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa  ^a^P0.0138^ea^, rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, di.t.thibyasanena vaa  phu.t.thassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena byasanena samannaagatassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa  aadevo paridevo ^a^T0.0185^ea^ aadevanaa paridevanaa aadevitatta.m paridevitatta.m vaacaa palaapo vippalaapo  laalappo laalappanaa laalappitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati paridevo''.
text.925: [03] 239^b^.^eb^ tattha katama.m dukkha.m? ya.m kaayika.m asaata.m kaayika.m dukkha.m kaayasamphassaja.m  asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m kaayasamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa -- ida.m vuccati ``dukkha.m''.
text.926: [03] 240^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0145^ea^ katama.m domanassa.m? ya.m cetasika.m asaata.m, cetasika.m dukkha.m,  cetosamphassaja.m asaata.m dukkha.m vedayita.m, cetosamphassajaa asaataa dukkhaa vedanaa --  ida.m vuccati ``domanassa.m''.
text.927: [03] 241^b^.^eb^ tattha katamo upaayaaso? ~naatibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, bhogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa,  rogabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, siilabyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, di.t.thibyasanena vaa phu.t.thassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena  byasanena samannaagatassa, a~n~natara~n~natarena dukkhadhammena phu.t.thassa aayaaso upaayaaso aayaasitatta.m  upaayaasitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati ``upaayaaso''.
text.928: [03] 242^b^.^eb^ evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotiiti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa  sa"ngati hoti, samaagamo hoti, samodhaana.m hoti, paatubhaavo hoti. tena vuccati ``evametassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti.
text.93: [03] tividhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi vipaako, atthi vipaakadhammadhammo, atthi nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo.  atthi upaadinnupaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadinnupaadaaniyo, atthi anupaadinnaanupaadaaniyo.  atthi sa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko, atthi asa.mkili.t.thasa.mkilesiko, atthi asa.mkili.t.thaasa.mkilesiko.  atthi savitakkasavicaaro, atthi avitakkavicaaramatto, atthi ^a^M0.0017^ea^ avitakkaavicaaro.  atthi dassanena pahaatabbo, atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbo, atthi neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya  pahaatabbo. atthi dassanena pahaatabbahetuko, atthi bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko, atthi  neva dassanena na bhaavanaaya pahaatabbahetuko. atthi aacayagaamii, atthi apacayagaamii, atthi  nevaacayagaaminaapacayagaamii. atthi sekkho, atthi asekkho, atthi nevasekkhanaasekkho.  atthi paritto, atthi mahaggato, atthi appamaa.no. atthi ^a^P0.0017^ea^ parittaaramma.no,  atthi mahaggataaramma.no, atthi appamaa.naaramma.no. atthi hiino, atthi majjhimo, atthi  pa.niito. atthi micchattaniyato, atthi sammattaniyato, atthi aniyato. atthi maggaaramma.no,  atthi maggahetuko, atthi maggaadhipati. atthi uppanno, atthi anuppanno, atthi  uppaadii. atthi atiito, atthi anaagato, atthi paccuppanno. atthi atiitaaramma.no, atthi  anaagataaramma.no, atthi paccuppannaaramma.no. atthi ajjhatto, atthi bahiddho, atthi ajjhattabahiddho.  atthi ^a^T0.0023^ea^ ajjhattaaramma.no, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no, atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0.... eva.m  dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.932: [03] 243^b^.^eb^ avijjaapaccayaa ^a^V0.0157^ea^ sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m,  naamapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m, cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa,  ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

text.950: [03] 246^b^.^eb^ avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaapi avijjaa; sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m,  vi~n~naa.napaccayaapi sa"nkhaaro; vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m, naamapaccayaapi vi~n~naa.na.m; naamapaccayaa  cha.t.thaayatana.m, cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaapi naama.m; cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaapi cha.t.thaayatana.m;  phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaapi phasso; vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaapi  vedanaa; ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaapi ta.nhaa; upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa  jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.

text.959: [03] 248^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^P0.0144^ea^ ^a^V0.0162^ea^ dhammaa akusalaa? yasmi.m samaye akusala.m citta.m uppanna.m  hoti somanassasahagata.m di.t.thigatasampayutta.m ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa gandhaaramma.na.m  vaa rasaaramma.na.m vaa pho.t.thabbaaramma.na.m vaa dhammaaramma.na.m vaa ya.m ya.m vaa panaarabbha, tasmi.m  samaye avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m,  naamapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m, cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa,  ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
