text.960: [03] 249^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m...pe0... avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m --  aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
text.961: [03] tattha katamo avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro? yaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa ^a^T0.0193^ea^ sa~ncetayitatta.m {cetayitatta.m (sii0  ka0)} -- aya.m vuccati ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro''.
text.962: [03] tattha katama.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano  manaayatana.m manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m  vuccati ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m''.
text.963: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho --  ida.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m''.
text.964: [03] tattha katama.m naamapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m hadaya.m pa.n.dara.m mano manaayatana.m  manindriya.m vi~n~naa.na.m vi~n~naa.nakkhandho tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m vuccati ``naamapaccayaa  cha.t.thaayatana.m''.
text.965: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0151^ea^ ^a^V0.0163^ea^ katamo cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso? yo phasso phusanaa samphusanaa  samphusitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati ``cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso''.
text.966: [03] tattha katamaa phassapaccayaa vedanaa? ya.m cetasika.m saata.m cetasika.m sukha.m cetosamphassaja.m  saata.m sukha.m vedayita.m cetosamphassajaa saataa sukhaa vedanaa -- aya.m vuccati ``phassapaccayaa  vedanaa''.
text.967: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0145^ea^ katamaa vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa? yo raago saaraago anunayo anurodho  nandii nandiraago cittassa saaraago -- aya.m vuccati ``vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa''.
text.968: [03] tattha katama.m ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m? yaa di.t.thi di.t.thigata.m ^a^T0.0194^ea^ di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro  di.t.thivisuukaayika.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m gaaho pati.t.thaaho abhiniveso paraamaaso  kummaggo micchaapatho micchatta.m titthaayatana.m vipariyaasaggaaho {vipariyesaggaaho (bahuusu)} -- ida.m vuccati ``ta.nhaapaccayaa  upaadaana.m''.
text.969: [03] tattha katamo upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo? .thapetvaa upaadaana.m, vedanaakkhandho sa~n~naakkhandho sa"nkhaarakkhandho  vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- aya.m vuccati ``upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo''.
text.970: [03] tattha katamaa bhavapaccayaa jaati? yaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m jaati sa~njaati nibbatti abhinibbatti  paatubhaavo -- aya.m vuccati ``bhavapaccayaa jaati''.
text.971: [03] tattha katama.m jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m? atthi jaraa, atthi mara.na.m. tattha katamaa jaraa?  yaa tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m jaraa jiira.nataa aayuno sa.mhaani -- aya.m vuccati ``jaraa''. tattha  katama.m mara.na.m? yo tesa.m tesa.m dhammaana.m khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccataa antaradhaana.m --  ida.m vuccati ``mara.na.m''. iti aya~nca jaraa, ida~nca mara.na.m. ida.m vuccati ``jaatipaccayaa  jaraamara.na.m''.
text.972: [03] evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotiiti. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa  ^a^V0.0164^ea^ sa"ngati hoti, samaagamo hoti, samodhaana.m hoti, paatubhaavo hoti. tena vuccati ``evametassa  kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti.
text.973: [03] 250^b^.^eb^ tasmi.m ^a^M0.0152^ea^ samaye avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naama.m, naamapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa ^a^T0.0195^ea^ vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa  ^a^P0.0146^ea^ upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m.  evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.974: [03] 251^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m...pe0... avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m --  aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
text.975: [03] tattha katamo avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro? yaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa sa~ncetayitatta.m -- aya.m  vuccati ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro''.
text.976: [03] tattha katama.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0... tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  ida.m vuccati ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m''.
text.977: [03] tattha katama.m vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho --  ida.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m''.
text.978: [03] naamapaccayaa phassoti. tattha katama.m naama.m? .thapetvaa phassa.m, vedanaakkhandho sa~n~naakkhandho  sa"nkhaarakkhandho vi~n~naa.nakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati ``naama.m''.
text.979: [03] tattha katamo naamapaccayaa phasso? yo phasso phusanaa samphusanaa samphusitatta.m -- aya.m  vuccati ``naamapaccayaa phasso''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa  samudayo hotii''ti.
text.98: [03] duvidhena vedanaakkhandho -- atthi sara.no, atthi ara.no.
text.980: [03] tasmi.m samaye avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m  ^a^V0.0165^ea^, naamaruupapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m, cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa  ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati ^a^T0.0196^ea^, jaatipaccayaa  jaraamara.na.m. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.981: [03] 253^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m...pe0... avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m --  aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
text.982: [03] tattha katamo avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro? yaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa sa~ncetayitatta.m -- aya.m  vuccati ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro''.
text.983: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0153^ea^ katama.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0...  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m vuccati ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m''.
text.984: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0147^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m? atthi naama.m, atthi ruupa.m.  tattha katama.m naama.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati  ``naama.m''. tattha katama.m ruupa.m? cakkhaayatanassa upacayo, sotaayatanassa upacayo, ghaanaayatanassa  upacayo, jivhaayatanassa upacayo, kaayaayatanassa upacayo, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m cittaja.m  cittahetuka.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m -- ida.m vuccati ``ruupa.m''. iti ida~nca naama.m, ida~nca  ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m''.
text.985: [03] naamaruupapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatananti. atthi naama.m, atthi ruupa.m. tattha katama.m naama.m? vedanaakkhandho,  sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati ``naama.m''. tattha katama.m ruupa.m? ya.m  ruupa.m nissaaya manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu vattati -- ida.m vuccati ``ruupa.m''. iti ida~nca naama.m,  ida~nca ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ``naamaruupa.m''.
text.986: [03] tattha katama.m naamaruupapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m? ya.m ^a^T0.0197^ea^ citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0... tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu --  ida.m vuccati ``naamaruupapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m''.
text.987: [03] tattha ^a^V0.0166^ea^ katamo cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso? yo phasso phusanaa samphusanaa samphusitatta.m --  aya.m vuccati ``cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti.
text.988: [03] 254^b^.^eb^ tasmi.m samaye avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa  naamaruupa.m, naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m, cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa,  vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo, bhavapaccayaa jaati,  jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
text.989: [03] 255^b^.^eb^ tattha katamaa avijjaa? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m...pe0... avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m --  aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
text.99: [03] tividhena ^a^V0.0020^ea^ vedanaakkhandho -- atthi vipaako, atthi vipaakadhammadhammo, atthi nevavipaakanavipaakadhammadhammo.  atthi upaadinnupaadaaniyo...pe0... atthi ajjhattaaramma.no ^a^M0.0019^ea^, atthi bahiddhaaramma.no,  atthi ajjhattabahiddhaaramma.no...pe0.... eva.m dasavidhena vedanaakkhandho.
text.990: [03] tattha katamo avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro? yaa cetanaa sa~ncetanaa sa~ncetayitatta.m -- aya.m  vuccati ``avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro''.
text.991: [03] tattha ^a^M0.0154^ea^ katama.m sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m? ya.m citta.m mano maanasa.m...pe0...  tajjaamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatu -- ida.m vuccati ``sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m''.
text.992: [03] tattha ^a^P0.0148^ea^ katama.m vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m? atthi naama.m, atthi ruupa.m.  tattha katama.m naama.m? vedanaakkhandho, sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati  ``naama.m''. tattha katama.m ruupa.m? cakkhaayatanassa upacayo, sotaayatanassa upacayo, ghaanaayatanassa  upacayo, jivhaayatanassa upacayo, kaayaayatanassa upacayo ^a^T0.0198^ea^, ya.m vaa pana~n~nampi atthi ruupa.m cittaja.m  cittahetuka.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m -- ida.m vuccati ``ruupa.m''. iti ida~nca naama.m, ida~nca  ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ``vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naamaruupa.m''.
text.993: [03] naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatananti. atthi naama.m, atthi ruupa.m. tattha katama.m naama.m? vedanaakkhandho,  sa~n~naakkhandho, sa"nkhaarakkhandho -- ida.m vuccati ``naama.m''. tattha katama.m ruupa.m? cattaaro ^a^V0.0167^ea^   ca mahaabhuutaa, ya~nca ruupa.m nissaaya manovi~n~naa.nadhaatu vattati -- ida.m vuccati ``ruupa.m''.  iti ida~nca naama.m, ida~nca ruupa.m. ida.m vuccati ``naamaruupa.m''.
text.994: [03] tattha katama.m naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m? cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m,  kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m -- ida.m vuccati ``naamaruupapaccayaa sa.laayatana.m''.
text.995: [03] tattha katamo cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso? yo phasso phusanaa samphusanaa samphusitatta.m --  aya.m vuccati ``cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso''...pe0... tena vuccati ``evametassa kevalassa  dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotii''ti.
text.998: [03] 256^b^.^eb^ tasmi.m samaye avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaro avijjaahetuko, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m  sa"nkhaarahetuka.m, vi~n~naa.napaccayaa naama.m vi~n~naa.nahetuka.m, naamapaccayaa cha.t.thaayatana.m naamahetuka.m,  cha.t.thaayatanapaccayaa phasso cha.t.thaayatanahetuko, phassapaccayaa vedanaa phassahetukaa, vedanaapaccayaa  ta.nhaa vedanaahetukaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m ta.nhaahetuka.m; upaadaanapaccayaa bhavo,  bhavapaccayaa jaati, jaatipaccayaa jaraamara.na.m ^a^T0.0199^ea^. evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo  hoti.
text.999: [03] 257^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^M0.0155^ea^ ^a^P0.0149^ea^ katamaa avijjaa? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m...pe0...  avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m -- aya.m vuccati ``avijjaa''.
